39/*********************************************************/
40/* INCLUDES */
41/*******************************************************/
42#include "../Drivers/BNO055/bno055.h"
43
44#ifdef __KERNEL__
45#include <linux/types.h>
46#include <linux/kernel.h>
47#else
48#include <stdint.h>
49#include <stddef.h>
50#endif
51
52#ifndef NULL
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54#define NULL 0
55#else
56#define NULL ((void *) 0)
57#endif
58#endif
59
62
63/* STRUCTURE DEFINITIONS */
64static struct bno055_t *p_bno055;
65
66/* LOCAL FUNCTIONS */
67
91BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_init(struct bno055_t *bno055)
92{
93 /* Variable used to return value of
94 * communication routine*/
95 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
96 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
97 u8 bno055_page_zero_u8 = BNO055_PAGE_ZERO;
98
99 /* Array holding the Software revision id
100 */
101 u8 a_SW_ID_u8[BNO055_REV_ID_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
102
103 /* stuct parameters are assign to bno055*/
104 p_bno055 = bno055;
105
106 /* Write the default page as zero*/
107 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
108 BNO055_PAGE_ID_REG,
109 &bno055_page_zero_u8,
110 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
111
112 /* Read the chip id of the sensor from page
113 * zero 0x00 register*/
114 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
115 BNO055_CHIP_ID_REG,
116 &data_u8,
117 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
118 p_bno055->chip_id = data_u8;
119
120 /* Read the accel revision id from page
121 * zero 0x01 register*/
122 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
123 BNO055_ACCEL_REV_ID_REG,
124 &data_u8,
125 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
126 p_bno055->accel_rev_id = data_u8;
127
128 /* Read the mag revision id from page
129 * zero 0x02 register*/
130 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
131 BNO055_MAG_REV_ID_REG,
132 &data_u8,
133 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
134 p_bno055->mag_rev_id = data_u8;
135
136 /* Read the gyro revision id from page
137 * zero 0x02 register*/
138 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
139 BNO055_GYRO_REV_ID_REG,
140 &data_u8,
141 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
142 p_bno055->gyro_rev_id = data_u8;
143
144 /* Read the boot loader revision from page
145 * zero 0x06 register*/
146 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
147 BNO055_BL_REV_ID_REG,
148 &data_u8,
149 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
150 p_bno055->bl_rev_id = data_u8;
151
152 /* Read the software revision id from page
153 * zero 0x04 and 0x05 register( 2 bytes of data)*/
154 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
155 BNO055_SW_REV_ID_LSB_REG,
156 a_SW_ID_u8,
157 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
158 a_SW_ID_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(a_SW_ID_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB], BNO055_SW_REV_ID_LSB);
159 p_bno055->sw_rev_id =
160 (u16)((((u32)((u8)a_SW_ID_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) | (a_SW_ID_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB]));
161
162 /* Read the page id from the register 0x07*/
163 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
164 BNO055_PAGE_ID_REG,
165 &data_u8,
166 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
167 p_bno055->page_id = data_u8;
168
169 return com_rslt;
170}
171
187BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_register(u8 addr_u8, u8 *data_u8, u8 len_u8)
188{
189 /* Variable used to return value of
190 * communication routine*/
191 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
192
193 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
194 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
195 {
196 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
197 }
198 else
199 {
200 /* Write the values of respective given register */
201 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr, addr_u8, data_u8, len_u8);
202 }
203
204 return com_rslt;
205}
206
222BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_register(u8 addr_u8, u8 *data_u8, u8 len_u8)
223{
224 /* Variable used to return value of
225 * communication routine*/
226 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
227
228 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
229 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
230 {
231 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
232 }
233 else
234 {
235 /* Read the value from given register*/
236 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr, addr_u8, data_u8, len_u8);
237 }
238
239 return com_rslt;
240}
241
253BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_chip_id(u8 *chip_id_u8)
254{
255 /* Variable used to return value of
256 * communication routine*/
257 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
258 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
259 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
260
261 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
262 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
263 {
264 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
265 }
266 else
267 {
268 /*condition check for page, chip id is
269 * available in the page zero*/
270 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
271 {
272 /* Write the page zero*/
273 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
274 }
275 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
276 {
277 /* Read the chip id*/
278 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
279 BNO055_CHIP_ID_REG,
280 &data_u8,
281 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
282 *chip_id_u8 = data_u8;
283 }
284 else
285 {
286 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
287 }
288 }
289
290 return com_rslt;
291}
292
305BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_sw_rev_id(u16 *sw_id_u8)
306{
307 /* Variable used to return value of
308 * communication routine*/
309 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
310
311 /* array having the software revision id
312 * data_u8[0] - LSB
313 * data_u8[1] - MSB*/
314 u8 data_u8[BNO055_REV_ID_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
315 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
316
317 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty*/
318 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
319 {
320 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
321 }
322 else
323 {
324 /*condition check for page, chip id is
325 * available in the page zero*/
326 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
327 {
328 /* Write the page zero*/
329 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
330 }
331 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
332 {
333 /* Read the two byte value of software
334 * revision id*/
335 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
336 BNO055_SW_REV_ID_LSB_REG,
337 data_u8,
338 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
339 data_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB], BNO055_SW_REV_ID_LSB);
340 *sw_id_u8 =
341 (u16)((((u32)((u8)data_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
342 (data_u8[BNO055_SW_ID_LSB]));
343 }
344 else
345 {
346 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
347 }
348 }
349
350 return com_rslt;
351}
352
369BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_page_id(u8 *page_id_u8)
370{
371 /* Variable used to return value of
372 * communication routine*/
373 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
374 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
375
376 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
377 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
378 {
379 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
380 }
381 else
382 {
383 /* Read the page id form 0x07*/
384 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
385 BNO055_PAGE_ID_REG,
386 &data_u8,
387 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
388 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
389 {
390 data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8, BNO055_PAGE_ID);
391 *page_id_u8 = data_u8;
392 p_bno055->page_id = data_u8;
393 }
394 else
395 {
396 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
397 }
398 }
399
400 return com_rslt;
401}
402
418BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_page_id(u8 page_id_u8)
419{
420 /* Variable used to return value of
421 * communication routine*/
422 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
423 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
424
425 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
426 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
427 {
428 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
429 }
430 else
431 {
432 /* Read the current page*/
433 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
434 BNO055_PAGE_ID_REG,
435 &data_u8r,
436 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
437
438 /* Check condition for communication BNO055_SUCCESS*/
439 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
440 {
441 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_PAGE_ID, page_id_u8);
442
443 /* Write the page id*/
444 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
445 BNO055_PAGE_ID_REG,
446 &data_u8r,
447 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
448 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
449 {
450 p_bno055->page_id = page_id_u8;
451 }
452 }
453 else
454 {
455 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
456 }
457 }
458
459 return com_rslt;
460}
461
474BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_rev_id(u8 *accel_rev_id_u8)
475{
476 /* Variable used to return value of
477 * communication routine*/
478 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
479 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
480 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
481
482 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
483 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
484 {
485 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
486 }
487 else
488 {
489 /*condition check for page, chip id is
490 * available in the page zero*/
491 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
492 {
493 /* Write the page zero*/
494 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
495 }
496 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
497 {
498 /* Read the accel revision id */
499 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
500 BNO055_ACCEL_REV_ID_REG,
501 &data_u8,
502 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
503 *accel_rev_id_u8 = data_u8;
504 }
505 else
506 {
507 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
508 }
509 }
510
511 return com_rslt;
512}

526BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_rev_id(u8 *mag_rev_id_u8)
527{
528 /* Variable used to return value of
529 * communication routine*/
530 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
531 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
532 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
533
534 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
535 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
536 {
537 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
538 }
539 else
540 {
541 /*condition check for page, chip id is
542 * available in the page zero*/
543 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
544 {
545 /* Write the page zero*/
546 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
547 }
548 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
549 {
550 /* Read the mag revision id */
551 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
552 BNO055_MAG_REV_ID_REG,
553 &data_u8,
554 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
555 *mag_rev_id_u8 = data_u8;

557 else

559 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
560 }
561 }
562
563 return com_rslt;

580BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_rev_id(u8 *gyro_rev_id_u8)
581{
582 /* Variable used to return value of
583 * communication routine*/
584 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
585 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
586 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
587
588 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
589 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
590 {
591 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
592 }
593 else
594 {
595 /*condition check for page, chip id is
596 * available in the page zero*/
597 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
598 {
599 /* Write the page zero*/
600 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
601 }
602 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
603 {
604 /* Read the gyro revision id */
605 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
606 BNO055_GYRO_REV_ID_REG,
607 &data_u8,
608 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
609 *gyro_rev_id_u8 = data_u8;
610 }
611 else
612 {
613 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
614 }
615 }
616
617 return com_rslt;

633BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_bl_rev_id(u8 *bl_rev_id_u8)
634{
635 /* Variable used to return value of
636 * communication routine*/
637 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
638 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
639 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
640
641 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
642 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
643 {
644 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
645 }
646 else
647 {
648 /*condition check for page, chip id is
649 * available in the page zero*/
650 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
651 {
652 /* Write the page zero*/
653 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
654 }
655 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
656 {
657 /* Read the boot loader revision id */
658 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
659 BNO055_BL_REV_ID_REG,
660 &data_u8,
661 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
662 *bl_rev_id_u8 = data_u8;
663 }
664 else
665 {
666 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
667 }
668 }
669
670 return com_rslt;
671}
672
690BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_x(s16 *accel_x_s16)
691{
692 /* Variable used to return value of
693 * communication routine*/
694 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
695
696 /* Array holding the accel x value
697 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - x-LSB
698 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - x-MSB
699 */
700 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
701 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
702
703 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
704 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
705 {
706 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
707 }
708 else
709 {
710 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
711 {
712 /* Write the page zero*/
713 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
714 }
715 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
716 {
717 /* Read the accel x axis two byte value*/
718 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
719 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
720 data_u8,
721 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
722 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
723 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
724 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
725 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
726 *accel_x_s16 =
727 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
728 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
729 }
730 else
731 {
732 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
733 }
734 }
735
736 return com_rslt;
737}
738
756BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_y(s16 *accel_y_s16)
757{
758 /* Variable used to return value of
759 * communication routine*/
760 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
761
762 /* Array holding the accel y value
763 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - y-LSB
764 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - y-MSB
765 */
766 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
767 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
768
769 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
770 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
771 {
772 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
773 }
774 else
775 {
776 /*condition check for page, chip id is
777 * available in the page zero*/
778 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
779 {
780 /* Write the page zero*/
781 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
782 }
783 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
784 {
785 /* Read the accel y axis two byte value*/
786 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
787 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY_REG,
788 data_u8,
789 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
790 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
791 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
792 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
793 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
794 *accel_y_s16 =
795 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
796 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
797 }
798 else
799 {
800 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
801 }
802 }
803
804 return com_rslt;
805}
806
824BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_z(s16 *accel_z_s16)
825{
826 /* Variable used to return value of
827 * communication routine*/
828 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
829
830 /* Array holding the accel z value
831 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - z-LSB
832 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - z-MSB
833 */
834 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
835 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
836
837 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
838 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
839 {
840 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
841 }
842 else
843 {
844 /*condition check for page, chip id is
845 * available in the page zero*/
846 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
847 {
848 /* Write the page zero*/
849 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
850 }
851 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
852 {
853 /* Read the accel z axis two byte value*/
854 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
855 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
856 data_u8,
857 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
858 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
859 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
860 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
861 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
862 *accel_z_s16 =
863 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
864 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
865 }
866 else
867 {
868 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
869 }
870 }
871
872 return com_rslt;
873}
874
895BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_xyz(struct bno055_accel_t *accel)
896{
897 /* Variable used to return value of
898 * communication routine*/
899 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
900
901 /* Array holding the accel xyz value
902 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
903 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
904 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
905 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
906 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
907 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
908 */
909 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_XYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
910 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
911 };
912 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
913
914 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
915 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
916 {
917 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
918 }
919 else
920 {
921 /*condition check for page, chip id is
922 * available in the page zero*/
923 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
924 {
925 /* Write the page zero*/
926 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
927 }
928 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
929 {
930 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
931 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
932 data_u8,
933 BNO055_ACCEL_XYZ_DATA_SIZE);
934
935 /* Data X*/
936 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB],
937 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
938 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB],
939 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
940 accel->x =
941 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
942 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB]));
943
944 /* Data Y*/
945 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB],
946 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
947 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB],
948 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
949 accel->y =
950 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
951 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB]));
952
953 /* Data Z*/
954 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB],
955 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
956 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB],
957 BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
958 accel->z =
959 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
960 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB]));
961 }
962 else
963 {
964 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
965 }
966 }
967
968 return com_rslt;
969}
970
989BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_x(s16 *mag_x_s16)
990{
991 /* Variable used to return value of
992 * communication routine*/
993 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
994
995 /* Array holding the mag x value
996 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - x->LSB
997 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - x->MSB
998 */
999 u8 data_u8[BNO055_MAG_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1000 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1001
1002 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1003 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1004 {
1005 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1006 }
1007 else
1008 {
1009 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1010 * available in the page zero*/
1011 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1012 {
1013 /* Write the page zero*/
1014 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1015 }
1016 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1017 {
1018 /*Read the mag x two bytes of data */
1019 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1020 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
1021 data_u8,
1022 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1023 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1024 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
1025 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1026 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
1027 *mag_x_s16 =
1028 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1029 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1030 }
1031 else
1032 {
1033 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1034 }
1035 }
1036
1037 return com_rslt;
1038}
1039
1057BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_y(s16 *mag_y_s16)
1058{
1059 /* Variable used to return value of
1060 * communication routine*/
1061 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1062
1063 /* Array holding the mag y value
1064 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - y->LSB
1065 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - y->MSB
1066 */
1067 u8 data_u8[BNO055_MAG_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1068 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1069
1070 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1071 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1072 {
1073 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1074 }
1075 else
1076 {
1077 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1078 * available in the page zero*/
1079 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1080 {
1081 /* Write the page zero*/
1082 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1083 }
1084 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1085 {
1086 /*Read the mag y two bytes of data */
1087 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1088 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY_REG,
1089 data_u8,
1090 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1091 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1092 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
1093 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1094 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
1095 *mag_y_s16 =
1096 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1097 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1098 }
1099 else
1100 {
1101 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1102 }
1103 }
1104
1105 return com_rslt;
1106}
1107
1126BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_z(s16 *mag_z_s16)
1127{
1128 /* Variable used to return value of
1129 * communication routine*/
1130 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1131
1132 /* Array holding the mag z value
1133 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - z->LSB
1134 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - z->MSB
1135 */
1136 u8 data_u8[BNO055_MAG_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1137 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1138
1139 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1140 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1141 {
1142 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1143 }
1144 else
1145 {
1146 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1147 * available in the page zero*/
1148 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1149 {
1150 /* Write the page zero*/
1151 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1152 }
1153 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1154 {
1155 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1156 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
1157 data_u8,
1158 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1159
1160 /*Read the mag z two bytes of data */
1161 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1162 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
1163 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1164 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
1165 *mag_z_s16 =
1166 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1167 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1168 }
1169 else
1170 {
1171 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1172 }
1173 }
1174
1175 return com_rslt;
1176}
1177
1198BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_xyz(struct bno055_mag_t *mag)
1199{
1200 /* Variable used to return value of
1201 * communication routine*/
1202 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1203
1204 /* Array holding the mag xyz value
1205 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
1206 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
1207 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
1208 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
1209 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
1210 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
1211 */
1212 u8 data_u8[BNO055_MAG_XYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
1213 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
1214 };
1215 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1216
1217 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1218 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1219 {
1220 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1221 }
1222 else
1223 {
1224 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1225 * available in the page zero*/
1226 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1227 {
1228 /* Write the page zero*/
1229 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1230 }
1231 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1232 {
1233 /*Read the six byte value of mag xyz*/
1234 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1235 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
1236 data_u8,
1237 BNO055_MAG_XYZ_DATA_SIZE);
1238
1239 /* Data X*/
1240 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB],
1241 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
1242 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB],
1243 BNO055_MAG_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
1244 mag->x =
1245 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1246 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB]));
1247
1248 /* Data Y*/
1249 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB],
1250 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
1251 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB],
1252 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
1253 mag->y =
1254 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1255 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB]));
1256
1257 /* Data Z*/
1258 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB],
1259 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
1260 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB],
1261 BNO055_MAG_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
1262 mag->z =
1263 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1264 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB]));
1265 }
1266 else
1267 {
1268 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1269 }
1270 }
1271
1272 return com_rslt;
1273}
1274
1292BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_x(s16 *gyro_x_s16)
1293{
1294 /* Variable used to return value of
1295 * communication routine*/
1296 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1297 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GYRO_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1298 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1299
1300 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1301 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1302 {
1303 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1304 }
1305 else
1306 {
1307 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1308 * available in the page zero*/
1309 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1310 {
1311 /* Write the page zero*/
1312 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1313 }
1314 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1315 {
1316 /* Read the gyro 16 bit x value*/
1317 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1318 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
1319 data_u8,
1320 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1321 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1322 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
1323 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1324 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
1325 *gyro_x_s16 =
1326 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1327 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1328 }
1329 else
1330 {
1331 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1332 }
1333 }
1334
1335 return com_rslt;
1336}
1337
1355BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_y(s16 *gyro_y_s16)
1356{
1357 /* Variable used to return value of
1358 * communication routine*/
1359 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1360 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GYRO_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1361 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1362
1363 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1364 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1365 {
1366 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1367 }
1368 else
1369 {
1370 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1371 * available in the page zero*/
1372 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1373 {
1374 /* Write the page zero*/
1375 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1376 }
1377 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1378 {
1379 /* Read the value of gyro y */
1380 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1381 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY_REG,
1382 data_u8,
1383 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1384 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1385 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
1386 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1387 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
1388 *gyro_y_s16 =
1389 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1390 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1391 }
1392 else
1393 {
1394 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1395 }
1396 }
1397
1398 return com_rslt;
1399}
1400
1413BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_z(s16 *gyro_z_s16)
1414{
1415 /* Variable used to return value of
1416 * communication routine*/
1417 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1418 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GYRO_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1419 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1420
1421 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1422 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1423 {
1424 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1425 }
1426 else
1427 {
1428 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1429 * available in the page zero*/
1430 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1431 {
1432 /* Write the page zero*/
1433 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1434 }
1435 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1436 {
1437 /* Read the gyro z 16 bit value*/
1438 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1439 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
1440 data_u8,
1441 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1442 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
1443 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
1444 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
1445 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
1446 *gyro_z_s16 =
1447 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1448 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
1449 }
1450 else
1451 {
1452 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1453 }
1454 }
1455
1456 return com_rslt;
1457}
1458
1479BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_xyz(struct bno055_gyro_t *gyro)
1480{
1481 /* Variable used to return value of
1482 * communication routine*/
1483 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1484
1485 /* Array holding the gyro xyz value
1486 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
1487 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
1488 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
1489 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
1490 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
1491 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
1492 */
1493 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GYRO_XYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
1494 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
1495 };
1496 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1497
1498 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1499 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1500 {
1501 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1502 }
1503 else
1504 {
1505 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1506 * available in the page zero*/
1507 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1508 {
1509 /* Write the page zero*/
1510 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1511 }
1512 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1513 {
1514 /* Read the six bytes data of gyro xyz*/
1515 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1516 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
1517 data_u8,
1518 BNO055_GYRO_XYZ_DATA_SIZE);
1519
1520 /* Data x*/
1521 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB],
1522 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
1523 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB],
1524 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
1525 gyro->x =
1526 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1527 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB]));
1528
1529 /* Data y*/
1530 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB],
1531 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
1532 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB],
1533 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
1534 gyro->y =
1535 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1536 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB]));
1537
1538 /* Data z*/
1539 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB],
1540 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
1541 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB],
1542 BNO055_GYRO_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
1543 gyro->z =
1544 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1545 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB]));
1546 }
1547 else
1548 {
1549 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1550 }
1551 }
1552
1553 return com_rslt;
1554}
1555
1567BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_euler_h(s16 *euler_h_s16)
1568{
1569 /* Variable used to return value of
1570 * communication routine*/
1571 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1572
1573 /* Array holding the Euler h value
1574 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] - h->LSB
1575 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] - h->MSB
1576 */
1577 u8 data_u8[BNO055_EULER_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1578 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1579
1580 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1581 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1582 {
1583 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1584 }
1585 else
1586 {
1587 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1588 * available in the page zero*/
1589 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1590 {
1591 /* Write the page zero*/
1592 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1593 }
1594 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1595 {
1596 /* Read the eulre heading data*/
1597 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1598 BNO055_EULER_H_LSB_VALUEH_REG,
1599 data_u8,
1600 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1601 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB],
1602 BNO055_EULER_H_LSB_VALUEH);
1603 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB],
1604 BNO055_EULER_H_MSB_VALUEH);
1605 *euler_h_s16 =
1606 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1607 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB]));
1608 }
1609 else
1610 {
1611 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1612 }
1613 }
1614
1615 return com_rslt;
1616}
1617
1629BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_euler_r(s16 *euler_r_s16)
1630{
1631 /* Variable used to return value of
1632 * communication routine*/
1633 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1634
1635 /* Array holding the Euler r value
1636 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] - r->LSB
1637 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] - r->MSB
1638 */
1639 u8 data_u8[BNO055_EULER_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1640 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1641
1642 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1643 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1644 {
1645 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1646 }
1647 else
1648 {
1649 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1650 * available in the page zero*/
1651 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1652 {
1653 /* Write the page zero*/
1654 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1655 }
1656 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1657 {
1658 /* Read the Euler roll data*/
1659 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1660 BNO055_EULER_R_LSB_VALUER_REG,
1661 data_u8,
1662 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1663 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB],
1664 BNO055_EULER_R_LSB_VALUER);
1665 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB],
1666 BNO055_EULER_R_MSB_VALUER);
1667 *euler_r_s16 =
1668 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1669 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB]));
1670 }
1671 else
1672 {
1673 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1674 }
1675 }
1676
1677 return com_rslt;
1678}
1679
1692BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_euler_p(s16 *euler_p_s16)
1693{
1694 /* Variable used to return value of
1695 * communication routine*/
1696 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1697
1698 /* Array holding the Euler p value
1699 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] - p->LSB
1700 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] - p->MSB
1701 */
1702 u8 data_u8[BNO055_EULER_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1703 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1704
1705 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1706 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1707 {
1708 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1709 }
1710 else
1711 {
1712 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1713 * available in the page zero*/
1714 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1715 {
1716 /* Write the page zero*/
1717 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1718 }
1719 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1720 {
1721 /* Read the Euler p data*/
1722 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1723 BNO055_EULER_P_LSB_VALUEP_REG,
1724 data_u8,
1725 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1726 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB],
1727 BNO055_EULER_P_LSB_VALUEP);
1728 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB],
1729 BNO055_EULER_P_MSB_VALUEP);
1730 *euler_p_s16 =
1731 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1732 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_LSB]));
1733 }
1734 else
1735 {
1736 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1737 }
1738 }
1739
1740 return com_rslt;
1741}
1742
1762BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_euler_hrp(struct bno055_euler_t *euler)
1763{
1764 /* Variable used to return value of
1765 * communication routine*/
1766 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1767
1768 /* Array holding the Euler hrp value
1769 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_LSB] - h->LSB
1770 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_MSB] - h->MSB
1771 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_LSB] - r->MSB
1772 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_MSB] - r->MSB
1773 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_LSB] - p->MSB
1774 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_MSB] - p->MSB
1775 */
1776 u8 data_u8[BNO055_EULER_HRP_DATA_SIZE] = {
1777 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
1778 };
1779 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1780
1781 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1782 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1783 {
1784 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1785 }
1786 else
1787 {
1788 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1789 * available in the page zero*/
1790 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1791 {
1792 /* Write the page zero*/
1793 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1794 }
1795 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1796 {
1797 /* Read the six byte of Euler hrp data*/
1798 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1799 BNO055_EULER_H_LSB_VALUEH_REG,
1800 data_u8,
1801 BNO055_EULER_HRP_DATA_SIZE);
1802
1803 /* Data h*/
1804 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1805 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_LSB],
1806 BNO055_EULER_H_LSB_VALUEH);
1807 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1808 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_MSB],
1809 BNO055_EULER_H_MSB_VALUEH);
1810 euler->h =
1811 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1812 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_H_LSB]));
1813
1814 /* Data r*/
1815 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1816 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_LSB],
1817 BNO055_EULER_R_LSB_VALUER);
1818 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1819 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_MSB],
1820 BNO055_EULER_R_MSB_VALUER);
1821 euler->r =
1822 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1823 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_R_LSB]));
1824
1825 /* Data p*/
1826 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1827 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_LSB],
1828 BNO055_EULER_P_LSB_VALUEP);
1829 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(
1830 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_MSB],
1831 BNO055_EULER_P_MSB_VALUEP);
1832 euler->p =
1833 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1834 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_EULER_HRP_P_LSB]));
1835 }
1836 else
1837 {
1838 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1839 }
1840 }
1841
1842 return com_rslt;
1843}
1844
1857BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_quaternion_w(s16 *quaternion_w_s16)
1858{
1859 /* Variable used to return value of
1860 * communication routine*/
1861 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1862
1863 /* Array holding the Quaternion w value
1864 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] - w->LSB
1865 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] - w->MSB
1866 */
1867 u8 data_u8[BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1868 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1869
1870 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1871 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1872 {
1873 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1874 }
1875 else
1876 {
1877 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1878 * available in the page zero*/
1879 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1880 {
1881 /* Write the page zero*/
1882 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1883 }
1884 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1885 {
1886 /* Read the two byte value
1887 * of quaternion w data*/
1888 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1889 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_LSB_VALUEW_REG,
1890 data_u8,
1891 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1892 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB],
1893 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_LSB_VALUEW);
1894 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB],
1895 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_MSB_VALUEW);
1896 *quaternion_w_s16 =
1897 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1898 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB]));
1899 }
1900 else
1901 {
1902 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1903 }
1904 }
1905
1906 return com_rslt;
1907}
1908
1921BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_quaternion_x(s16 *quaternion_x_s16)
1922{
1923 /* Variable used to return value of
1924 * communication routine*/
1925 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1926
1927 /* Array holding the quaternion x value
1928 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] - x->LSB
1929 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] - x->MSB
1930 */
1931 u8 data_u8[BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1932 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1933
1934 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1935 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
1936 {
1937 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
1938 }
1939 else
1940 {
1941 /*condition check for page, chip id is
1942 * available in the page zero*/
1943 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
1944 {
1945 /* Write the page zero*/
1946 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
1947 }
1948 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
1949 {
1950 /* Read the two byte value
1951 * of quaternion x data*/
1952 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
1953 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
1954 data_u8,
1955 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
1956 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB],
1957 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
1958 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB],
1959 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
1960 *quaternion_x_s16 =
1961 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
1962 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB]));
1963 }
1964 else
1965 {
1966 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1967 }
1968 }
1969
1970 return com_rslt;
1971}

1985BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_quaternion_y(s16 *quaternion_y_s16)
1986{
1987 /* Variable used to return value of
1988 * communication routine*/
1989 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
1990
1991 /* Array holding the quaternion y value
1992 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] - y->LSB
1993 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] - y->MSB
1994 */
1995 u8 data_u8[BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
1996 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
1997
1998 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
1999 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2000 {
2001 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2002 }
2003 else
2004 {
2005 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2006 * available in the page zero*/
2007 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2008 {
2009 /* Write the page zero*/
2010 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2011 }
2012 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2013 {
2014 /* Read the two byte value
2015 * of quaternion y data*/
2016 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2017 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY_REG,
2018 data_u8,
2019 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2020 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB],
2021 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
2022 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB],
2023 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
2024 *quaternion_y_s16 =
2025 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2026 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB]));
2027 }
2028 else
2029 {
2030 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2031 }
2032 }
2033
2034 return com_rslt;
2035}
2036
2049BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_quaternion_z(s16 *quaternion_z_s16)
2050{
2051 /* Variable used to return value of
2052 * communication routine*/
2053 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2054
2055 /* Array holding the quaternion z value
2056 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] - z->LSB
2057 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] - z->MSB
2058 */
2059 u8 data_u8[BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
2060 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2061
2062 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2063 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2064 {
2065 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2066 }
2067 else
2068 {
2069 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2070 * available in the page zero*/
2071 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2072 {
2073 /* Write the page zero*/
2074 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2075 }
2076 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2077 {
2078 /* Read the two byte value
2079 * of quaternion z data*/
2080 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2081 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
2082 data_u8,
2083 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2084 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB],
2085 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
2086 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB],
2087 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
2088 *quaternion_z_s16 =
2089 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2090 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_LSB]));
2091 }
2092 else
2093 {
2094 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2095 }
2096 }
2097
2098 return com_rslt;
2099}
2100
2122BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_quaternion_wxyz(struct bno055_quaternion_t *quaternion)
2123{
2124 /* Variable used to return value of
2125 * communication routine*/
2126 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2127
2128 /* Array holding the quaternion wxyz value
2129 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_LSB] - w->LSB
2130 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_MSB] - w->MSB
2131 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
2132 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
2133 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
2134 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
2135 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
2136 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
2137 */
2138 u8 data_u8[BNO055_QUATERNION_WXYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
2139 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE,
2140 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
2141 };
2142 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2143
2144 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2145 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2146 {
2147 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2148 }
2149 else
2150 {
2151 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2152 * available in the page zero*/
2153 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2154 {
2155 /* Write the page zero*/
2156 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2157 }
2158 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2159 {
2160 /* Read the eight byte value
2161 * of quaternion wxyz data*/
2162 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2163 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_LSB_VALUEW_REG,
2164 data_u8,
2165 BNO055_QUATERNION_WXYZ_DATA_SIZE);
2166
2167 /* Data W*/
2168 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_LSB] =
2169 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_LSB],
2170 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_LSB_VALUEW);
2171 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_MSB] =
2172 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_MSB],
2173 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_W_MSB_VALUEW);
2174 quaternion->w =
2175 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2176 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_W_LSB]));
2177
2178 /* Data X*/
2179 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_LSB] =
2180 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_LSB],
2181 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
2182 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_MSB] =
2183 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_MSB],
2184 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
2185 quaternion->x =
2186 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2187 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_X_LSB]));
2188
2189 /* Data Y*/
2190 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_LSB] =
2191 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_LSB],
2192 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
2193 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_MSB] =
2194 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_MSB],
2195 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
2196 quaternion->y =
2197 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2198 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Y_LSB]));
2199
2200 /* Data Z*/
2201 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_LSB] =
2202 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_LSB],
2203 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
2204 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_MSB] =
2205 BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_MSB],
2206 BNO055_QUATERNION_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
2207 quaternion->z =
2208 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2209 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_QUATERNION_WXYZ_Z_LSB]));
2210 }
2211 else
2212 {
2213 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2214 }
2215 }
2216
2217 return com_rslt;
2218}
2219
2232BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_linear_accel_x(s16 *linear_accel_x_s16)
2233{
2234 /* Variable used to return value of
2235 * communication routine*/
2236 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2237
2238 /* Array holding the linear accel x value
2239 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - x->LSB
2240 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - x->MSB
2241 */
2242 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
2243 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2244
2245 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2246 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2247 {
2248 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2249 }
2250 else
2251 {
2252 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2253 * available in the page zero*/
2254 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2255 {
2256 /* Write the page zero*/
2257 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2258 }
2259 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2260 {
2261 /* Read the two byte value
2262 * of linear accel x data*/
2263 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2264 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
2265 data_u8,
2266 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2267 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
2268 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
2269 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
2270 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
2271 *linear_accel_x_s16 =
2272 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2273 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
2274 }
2275 else
2276 {
2277 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2278 }
2279 }
2280
2281 return com_rslt;
2282}

2360BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_linear_accel_z(s16 *linear_accel_z_s16)
2361{
2362 /* Variable used to return value of
2363 * communication routine*/

2365

2369 */

2371 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2372

2374 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2375 {
2376 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2377 }

2392 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
2393 data_u8,
2394 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);

2406 }

2411
2430BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_linear_accel_xyz(struct bno055_linear_accel_t *linear_accel)
2431{
2432 /* Variable used to return value of
2433 * communication routine*/
2434 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2435
2436 /* Array holding the linear accel xyz value
2437 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
2438 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
2439 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
2440 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
2441 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
2442 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
2443 */
2444 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_XYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
2445 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
2446 };
2447 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2448
2449 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2450 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2451 {
2452 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2453 }
2454 else
2455 {
2456 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2457 * available in the page zero*/
2458 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2459 {
2460 /* Write the page zero*/
2461 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2462 }
2463 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2464 {
2465 /* Read the six byte value
2466 * of linear accel xyz data*/
2467 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2468 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
2469 data_u8,
2470 BNO055_ACCEL_XYZ_DATA_SIZE);
2471
2472 /* Data x*/
2473 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB],
2474 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
2475 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB],
2476 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
2477 linear_accel->x =
2478 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2479 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB]));
2480
2481 /* Data y*/
2482 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB],
2483 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
2484 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB],
2485 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
2486 linear_accel->y =
2487 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2488 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB]));
2489
2490 /* Data z*/
2491 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB],
2492 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
2493 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB],
2494 BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
2495 linear_accel->z =
2496 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2497 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB]));
2498 }
2499 else
2500 {
2501 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2502 }
2503 }
2504
2505 return com_rslt;
2506}
2507
2520BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gravity_x(s16 *gravity_x_s16)
2521{
2522 /* Variable used to return value of
2523 * communication routine*/
2524 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2525
2526 /* Array holding the gravity x value
2527 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - x->LSB
2528 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - x->MSB
2529 */
2530 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
2531 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2532
2533 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2534 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2535 {
2536 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2537 }
2538 else
2539 {
2540 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2541 * available in the page zero*/
2542 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2543 {
2544 /* Write the page zero*/
2545 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2546 }
2547 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2548 {
2549 /* Read the two byte value
2550 * of gravity x data*/
2551 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2552 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
2553 data_u8,
2554 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2555 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
2556 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
2557 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
2558 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
2559 *gravity_x_s16 =
2560 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2561 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
2562 }
2563 else
2564 {
2565 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2566 }
2567 }
2568
2569 return com_rslt;
2570}
2571
2584BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gravity_y(s16 *gravity_y_s16)
2585{
2586 /* Variable used to return value of
2587 * communication routine*/
2588 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2589
2590 /* Array holding the gravity y value
2591 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - y->LSB
2592 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - y->MSB
2593 */
2594 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
2595 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2596
2597 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2598 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2599 {
2600 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2601 }
2602 else
2603 {
2604 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2605 * available in the page zero*/
2606 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2607 {
2608 /* Write the page zero*/
2609 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2610 }
2611 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2612 {
2613 /* Read the two byte value
2614 * of gravity y data*/
2615 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2616 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY_REG,
2617 data_u8,
2618 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2619 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
2620 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
2621 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
2622 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
2623 *gravity_y_s16 =
2624 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2625 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
2626 }
2627 else
2628 {
2629 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2630 }
2631 }
2632
2633 return com_rslt;
2634}
2635
2648BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gravity_z(s16 *gravity_z_s16)
2649{
2650 /* Variable used to return value of
2651 * communication routine*/
2652 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2653
2654 /* Array holding the gravity z value
2655 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] - z->LSB
2656 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] - z->MSB
2657 */
2658 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_SIZE] = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
2659 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2660
2661 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2662 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2663 {
2664 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2665 }
2666 else
2667 {
2668 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2669 * available in the page zero*/
2670 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2671 {
2672 /* Write the page zero*/
2673 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2674 }
2675 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2676 {
2677 /* Read the two byte value
2678 * of gravity z data*/
2679 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2680 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ_REG,
2681 data_u8,
2682 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
2683 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB],
2684 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
2685 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB],
2686 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
2687 *gravity_z_s16 =
2688 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2689 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_LSB]));
2690 }
2691 else
2692 {
2693 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2694 }
2695 }
2696
2697 return com_rslt;
2698}
2699
2719BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gravity_xyz(struct bno055_gravity_t *gravity)
2720{
2721 /* Variable used to return value of
2722 * communication routine*/
2723 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2724
2725 /* Array holding the gravity xyz value
2726 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] - x->LSB
2727 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] - x->MSB
2728 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] - y->MSB
2729 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] - y->MSB
2730 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] - z->MSB
2731 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] - z->MSB
2732 */
2733 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GRAVITY_XYZ_DATA_SIZE] = {
2734 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
2735 };
2736 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2737
2738 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2739 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2740 {
2741 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2742 }
2743 else
2744 {
2745 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2746 * available in the page zero*/
2747 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2748 {
2749 /* Write the page zero*/
2750 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2751 }
2752 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2753 {
2754 /* Read the six byte value
2755 * of gravity xyz data*/
2756 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2757 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX_REG,
2758 data_u8,
2759 BNO055_GRAVITY_XYZ_DATA_SIZE);
2760
2761 /* Data x*/
2762 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB],
2763 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_LSB_VALUEX);
2764 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB],
2765 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_X_MSB_VALUEX);
2766 gravity->x =
2767 (s16)(((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_MSB]) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2768 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_X_LSB]));
2769
2770 /* Data y*/
2771 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB],
2772 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Y_LSB_VALUEY);
2773 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB],
2774 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Y_MSB_VALUEY);
2775 gravity->y =
2776 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2777 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Y_LSB]));
2778
2779 /* Data z*/
2780 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB],
2781 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Z_LSB_VALUEZ);
2782 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB],
2783 BNO055_GRAVITY_DATA_Z_MSB_VALUEZ);
2784 gravity->z =
2785 (s16)((((s32)((s8)data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_MSB])) << BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) |
2786 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_DATA_XYZ_Z_LSB]));
2787 }
2788 else
2789 {
2790 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2791 }
2792 }
2793
2794 return com_rslt;
2795}
2796
2809BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_temp_data(s8 *temp_s8)
2810{
2811 /* Variable used to return value of
2812 * communication routine*/
2813 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2814 u8 data_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2815 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
2816
2817 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
2818 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
2819 {
2820 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
2821 }
2822 else
2823 {
2824 /*condition check for page, chip id is
2825 * available in the page zero*/
2826 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
2827 {
2828 /* Write the page zero*/
2829 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
2830 }
2831 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
2832 {
2833 /* Read the raw temperature data */
2834 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
2835 BNO055_TEMP_REG,
2836 &data_u8,
2837 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
2838 *temp_s8 = data_u8;
2839 }
2840 else
2841 {
2842 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2843 }
2844 }
2845
2846 return com_rslt;
2847}
2848#ifdef BNO055_FLOAT_ENABLE
2849
2864BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_x_msq(float *accel_x_f)
2865{
2866 /* Variable used to return value of
2867 * communication routine*/
2868 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2869 s16 reg_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2870 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2871 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2872
2873 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
2874 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
2875 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
2876 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
2877 {
2878 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
2879 }
2880 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2881 {
2882 /* Read the accel raw x data*/
2883 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_x(&reg_accel_x_s16);
2884 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
2885 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2886 {
2887 /* Convert the raw accel x to m/s2*/
2888 data_f = (float)(reg_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
2889 *accel_x_f = data_f;
2890 }
2891 else
2892 {
2893 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2894 }
2895 }
2896 else
2897 {
2898 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2899 }
2900
2901 return com_rslt;
2902}
2903
2919BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_x_mg(float *accel_x_f)
2920{
2921 /* Variable used to return value of
2922 * communication routine*/
2923 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2924 s16 reg_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2925 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2926 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2927
2928 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
2929 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2*/
2930 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
2931 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
2932 {
2933 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
2934 }
2935 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2936 {
2937 /* Read the accel raw x data*/
2938 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_x(&reg_accel_x_s16);
2939 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2940 {
2941 /* Convert the raw accel x to m/s2*/
2942 data_f = (float)(reg_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
2943 *accel_x_f = data_f;
2944 }
2945 else
2946 {
2947 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2948 }
2949 }
2950 else
2951 {
2952 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2953 }
2954
2955 return com_rslt;
2956}
2957
2972BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_y_msq(float *accel_y_f)
2973{
2974 /* Variable used to return value of
2975 * communication routine*/
2976 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
2977 s16 reg_accel_y_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2978 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2979 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
2980
2981 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
2982 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
2983 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
2984 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
2985 {
2986 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
2987 }
2988 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2989 {
2990 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_y(&reg_accel_y_s16);
2991 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
2992 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
2993 {
2994 /* Convert the raw accel y to m/s2*/
2995 data_f = (float)(reg_accel_y_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
2996 *accel_y_f = data_f;
2997 }
2998 else
2999 {
3000 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3001 }
3002 }
3003 else
3004 {
3005 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3006 }
3007
3008 return com_rslt;
3009}
3010
3024BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_y_mg(float *accel_y_f)
3025{
3026 /* Variable used to return value of
3027 * communication routine*/
3028 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3029 s16 reg_accel_y_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3030 float data = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3031 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3032
3033 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
3034 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2*/
3035 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
3036 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
3037 {
3038 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
3039 }
3040 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3041 {
3042 /* Read the accel raw z data*/
3043 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_y(&reg_accel_y_s16);
3044 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3045 {
3046 /* Convert the raw accel z to mg*/
3047 data = (float)(reg_accel_y_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
3048 *accel_y_f = data;
3049 }
3050 else
3051 {
3052 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3053 }
3054 }
3055 else
3056 {
3057 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3058 }
3059
3060 return com_rslt;
3061}

3077BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_z_msq(float *accel_z_f)
3078{
3079 /* Variable used to return value of
3080 * communication routine*/
3081 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3082 s16 reg_accel_z_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3083 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3084 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3085
3086 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
3087 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
3088 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
3089 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
3090 {
3091 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
3092 }
3093 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3094 {
3095 /* Read the accel raw z data*/
3096 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_z(&reg_accel_z_s16);
3097 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
3098 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3099 {

3101 data_f = (float)(reg_accel_z_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
3102 *accel_z_f = data_f;
3103 }
3104 else
3105 {
3106 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3107 }
3108 }
3109 else
3110 {

3112 }
3113
3114 return com_rslt;
3115}
