3131BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_z_mg(float *accel_z_f)
3132{
3133 /* Variable used to return value of
3134 * communication routine*/
3135 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3136 s16 reg_accel_z_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3137 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3138 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3139
3140 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
3141 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2 */
3142 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
3143 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
3144 {
3145 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
3146 }
3147 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3148 {
3149 /* Read the accel raw z data*/
3150 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_z(&reg_accel_z_s16);
3151 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3152 {
3153 /* Convert the raw accel x to mg*/
3154 data_f = (float)(reg_accel_z_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
3155 *accel_z_f = data_f;
3156 }
3157 else
3158 {
3159 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3160 }
3161 }
3162 else
3163 {
3164 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3165 }
3166
3167 return com_rslt;
3168}
3169
3188BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_xyz_msq(struct bno055_accel_float_t *accel_xyz)
3189{
3190 /* Variable used to return value of
3191 * communication routine*/
3192 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3193 struct bno055_accel_t reg_accel_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
3194 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3195
3196 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
3197 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
3198 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
3199 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
3200 {
3201 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
3202 }
3203 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3204 {
3205 /* Read the accel raw xyz data*/
3206 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_xyz(&reg_accel_xyz);
3207 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3208 {
3209 /* Convert the accel raw xyz to meterpersecseq*/
3210 accel_xyz->x = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.x / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
3211 accel_xyz->y = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.y / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
3212 accel_xyz->z = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.z / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
3213 }
3214 else
3215 {
3216 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3217 }
3218 }
3219 else
3220 {
3221 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3222 }
3223
3224 return com_rslt;
3225}
3226
3246BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_accel_xyz_mg(struct bno055_accel_float_t *accel_xyz)
3247{
3248 /* Variable used to return value of
3249 * communication routine*/
3250 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3251 struct bno055_accel_t reg_accel_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
3252 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3253
3254 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
3255 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2*/
3256 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
3257 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
3258 {
3259 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
3260 }
3261 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3262 {
3263 /* Read the accel raw y data*/
3264 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_xyz(&reg_accel_xyz);
3265 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3266 {
3267 /*Convert the accel raw xyz to millig */
3268 accel_xyz->x = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.x / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
3269 accel_xyz->y = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.y / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
3270 accel_xyz->z = (float)(reg_accel_xyz.z / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
3271 }
3272 else
3273 {
3274 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3275 }
3276 }
3277 else
3278 {
3279 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3280 }
3281
3282 return com_rslt;
3283}
3284
3299BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_mag_x_uT(float *mag_x_f)
3300{
3301 /* Variable used to return value of
3302 * communication routine*/
3303 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3304 s16 reg_mag_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3305 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3306
3307 /* Read raw mag x data */
3308 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_x(&reg_mag_x_s16);
3309 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3310 {
3311 /* Convert the raw mag x to microTesla*/
3312 data_f = (float)(reg_mag_x_s16 / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3313 *mag_x_f = data_f;
3314 }
3315 else
3316 {
3317 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3318 }
3319
3320 return com_rslt;
3321}
3322
3336BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_mag_y_uT(float *mag_y_f)
3337{
3338 /* Variable used to return value of
3339 * communication routine*/
3340 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3341 s16 reg_mag_y_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3342 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3343
3344 /* Read raw mag y data */
3345 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_y(&reg_mag_y_s16);
3346 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3347 {
3348 /* Convert the raw mag y to microTesla*/
3349 data_f = (float)(reg_mag_y_s16 / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3350 *mag_y_f = data_f;
3351 }
3352 else
3353 {
3354 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3355 }
3356
3357 return com_rslt;
3358}
3359
3373BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_mag_z_uT(float *mag_z_f)
3374{
3375 /* Variable used to return value of
3376 * communication routine*/
3377 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3378 s16 reg_mag_z_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3379 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3380
3381 /* Read raw mag z data */
3382 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_z(&reg_mag_z_s16);
3383 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3384 {
3385 /* Convert the raw mag z to microTesla*/
3386 data_f = (float)(reg_mag_z_s16 / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3387 *mag_z_f = data_f;
3388 }
3389 else
3390 {
3391 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3392 }
3393
3394 return com_rslt;
3395}
3396
3415BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_mag_xyz_uT(struct bno055_mag_float_t *mag_xyz_data)
3416{
3417 /* Variable used to return value of
3418 * communication routine*/
3419 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3420 struct bno055_mag_t mag_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
3421
3422 /* Read raw mag x data */
3423 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_xyz(&mag_xyz);
3424 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3425 {
3426 /* Convert mag raw xyz to microTesla*/
3427 mag_xyz_data->x = (float)(mag_xyz.x / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3428 mag_xyz_data->y = (float)(mag_xyz.y / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3429 mag_xyz_data->z = (float)(mag_xyz.z / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
3430 }
3431 else
3432 {
3433 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3434 }
3435
3436 return com_rslt;
3437}
3438
3451BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gyro_x_dps(float *gyro_x_f)
3452{
3453 /* Variable used to return value of
3454 * communication routine*/
3455 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3456 s16 reg_gyro_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3457 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3458 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3459
3460 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
3461 * unit as dps if the unit is in rps */
3462 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
3463 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS)
3464 {
3465 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS);
3466 }
3467 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3468 {
3469 /* Read gyro raw x data */
3470 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_x(&reg_gyro_x_s16);
3471 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3472 {
3473 /* Convert the raw gyro x to dps*/
3474 data_f = (float)(reg_gyro_x_s16 / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
3475 *gyro_x_f = data_f;
3476 }
3477 else
3478 {
3479 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3480 }
3481 }
3482 else
3483 {
3484 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3485 }
3486
3487 return com_rslt;
3488}
3489
3503BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gyro_x_rps(float *gyro_x_f)
3504{
3505 /* Variable used to return value of
3506 * communication routine*/
3507 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;

3509 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3510 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;

3512 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
3513 * unit as rps if the unit is in dps */
3514 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
3515 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS)
3516 {
3517 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS);
3518 }
3519 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3520 {
3521 /* Read gyro raw x data */
3522 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_x(&reg_gyro_x_s16);
3523 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3524 {
3525 /* Convert the raw gyro x to rps*/
3526 data_f = (float)(reg_gyro_x_s16 / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_RPS);
3527 *gyro_x_f = data_f;
3528 }
3529 else
3530 {
3531 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3532 }
3533 }

3537 }
3538
3539 return com_rslt;
3540}

3770BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gyro_xyz_dps(struct bno055_gyro_float_t *gyro_xyz_data)
3771{
3772 /* Variable used to return value of
3773 * communication routine*/
3774 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3775 struct bno055_gyro_t gyro_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
3776 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3777
3778 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
3779 * unit as dps if the unit is in rps */
3780 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
3781 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS)
3782 {
3783 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS);
3784 }
3785 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3786 {
3787 /* Read gyro raw xyz data */
3788 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_xyz(&gyro_xyz);
3789 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3790 {
3791 /* Convert gyro raw xyz to dps*/
3792 gyro_xyz_data->x = (float)(gyro_xyz.x / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
3793 gyro_xyz_data->y = (float)(gyro_xyz.y / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
3794 gyro_xyz_data->z = (float)(gyro_xyz.z / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
3795 }
3796 else
3797 {
3798 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3799 }
3800 }
3801 else
3802 {
3803 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3804 }
3805
3806 return com_rslt;
3807}

3828BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gyro_xyz_rps(struct bno055_gyro_float_t *gyro_xyz_data)

3839 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS)
3840 {
3841 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS);
3842 }
3843 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3844 {
3845 /* Read gyro raw xyz data */
3846 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_xyz(&gyro_xyz);
3847 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)

3879BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_euler_h_deg(float *euler_h_f)
3880{
3881 /* Variable used to return value of
3882 * communication routine*/
3883 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3884 s16 reg_euler_h_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3885 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3886 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3887
3888 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
3889 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
3890 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
3891 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
3892 {
3893 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
3894 }
3895 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3896 {
3897 /* Read Euler raw h data*/
3898 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_h(&reg_euler_h_s16);
3899 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3900 {
3901 /* Convert raw Euler h data to degree*/
3902 data_f = (float)(reg_euler_h_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
3903 *euler_h_f = data_f;
3904 }
3905 else
3906 {
3907 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3908 }
3909 }
3910 else
3911 {
3912 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3913 }
3914
3915 return com_rslt;
3916}
3917
3930BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_euler_h_rad(float *euler_h_f)
3931{
3932 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3933 s16 reg_euler_h_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3934 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3935 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
3936
3937 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
3938 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
3939 {
3940 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
3941 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
3942 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
3943 }
3944 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3945 {
3946 /* Read Euler raw h data*/
3947 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_h(&reg_euler_h_s16);
3948 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
3949 {
3950 /* Convert raw Euler h data to degree*/
3951 data_f = (float)(reg_euler_h_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
3952 *euler_h_f = data_f;
3953 }
3954 else
3955 {
3956 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3957 }
3958 }
3959 else
3960 {
3961 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
3962 }
3963
3964 return com_rslt;
3965}

3989 {

3991 }

4178BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_euler_hpr_deg(struct bno055_euler_float_t *euler_hpr)
4179{
4180 /* Variable used to return value of
4181 * communication routine*/
4182 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4183 struct bno055_euler_t reg_euler = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
4184 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4185
4186 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
4187 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
4188 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
4189 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
4190 {
4191 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
4192 }
4193 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4194 {
4195 /* Read Euler raw hrp data*/
4196 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_hrp(&reg_euler);
4197 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4198 {
4199 /* Convert raw Euler hrp to degree*/
4200 euler_hpr->h = (float)(reg_euler.h / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
4201 euler_hpr->p = (float)(reg_euler.p / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
4202 euler_hpr->r = (float)(reg_euler.r / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
4203 }
4204 else
4205 {
4206 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4207 }
4208 }
4209 else
4210 {
4211 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4212 }
4213
4214 return com_rslt;
4215}
4216
4235BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_euler_hpr_rad(struct bno055_euler_float_t *euler_hpr)
4236{
4237 /* Variable used to return value of
4238 * communication routine*/
4239 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4240 struct bno055_euler_t reg_euler = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
4241 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4242
4243 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
4244 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
4245 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
4246 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
4247 {
4248 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
4249 }
4250 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4251 {
4252 /* Read Euler raw hrp data*/
4253 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_hrp(&reg_euler);
4254 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4255 {
4256 /* Convert raw hrp to radians */
4257 euler_hpr->h = (float)(reg_euler.h / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
4258 euler_hpr->p = (float)(reg_euler.p / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
4259 euler_hpr->r = (float)(reg_euler.r / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
4260 }
4261 else
4262 {
4263 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4264 }
4265 }
4266 else
4267 {
4268 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4269 }
4270
4271 return com_rslt;
4272}
4273
4284BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_linear_accel_x_msq(float *linear_accel_x_f)
4285{
4286 /* Variable used to return value of
4287 * communication routine*/
4288 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4289 s16 reg_linear_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4290 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4291
4292 /* Read the raw x of linear accel */
4293 com_rslt = bno055_read_linear_accel_x(&reg_linear_accel_x_s16);
4294 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4295 {
4296 /* Convert the raw linear accel x to m/s2*/
4297 data_f = (float)(reg_linear_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4298 *linear_accel_x_f = data_f;
4299 }
4300 else
4301 {
4302 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4303 }
4304
4305 return com_rslt;
4306}
4307

4327 {
4328 /* Convert the raw linear accel x to m/s2*/
4329 data_f = (float)(reg_linear_accel_y / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4330 *linear_accel_y_f = data_f;
4331 }

4334 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;

4372
4392BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_linear_accel_xyz_msq(
4393 struct bno055_linear_accel_float_t *linear_accel_xyz)
4394{
4395 /* Variable used to return value of
4396 * communication routine*/
4397 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4398 struct bno055_linear_accel_t reg_linear_accel = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
4399
4400 /* Read the raw x of linear accel */
4401 com_rslt = bno055_read_linear_accel_xyz(&reg_linear_accel);
4402 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4403 {
4404 linear_accel_xyz->x = (float)(reg_linear_accel.x / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4405 linear_accel_xyz->y = (float)(reg_linear_accel.y / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4406 linear_accel_xyz->z = (float)(reg_linear_accel.z / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4407 }
4408 else
4409 {
4410 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4411 }
4412
4413 return com_rslt;
4414}

4428BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_gravity_float_x_msq(float *gravity_x_f)
4429{
4430 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4431 s16 reg_gravity_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4432 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4433
4434 /* Read raw gravity of x*/
4435 com_rslt = bno055_read_gravity_x(&reg_gravity_x_s16);
4436 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4437 {
4438 /* Convert the raw gravity x to m/s2*/
4439 data_f = (float)(reg_gravity_x_s16 / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
4440 *gravity_x_f = data_f;
4441 }
4442 else
4443 {
4444 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4445 }
4446
4447 return com_rslt;
4448}

4536BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gravity_xyz_msq(struct bno055_gravity_float_t *gravity_xyz)
4537{
4538 /* Variable used to return value of
4539 * communication routine*/
4540 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4541 struct bno055_gravity_t reg_gravity_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
4542
4543 /* Read raw gravity of xyz */
4544 com_rslt = bno055_read_gravity_xyz(&reg_gravity_xyz);
4545 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4546 {
4547 /* Convert raw gravity xyz to meterpersecseq */
4548 gravity_xyz->x = (float)(reg_gravity_xyz.x / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
4549 gravity_xyz->y = (float)(reg_gravity_xyz.y / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
4550 gravity_xyz->z = (float)(reg_gravity_xyz.z / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
4551 }
4552 else
4553 {
4554 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4555 }
4556
4557 return com_rslt;
4558}
4559
4572BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_temp_fahrenheit(float *temp_f)
4573{
4574 /* Variable used to return value of
4575 * communication routine*/
4576 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4577 s8 reg_temp_s8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4578 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4579 u8 temp_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4580
4581 /* Read the current temperature unit and set the
4582 * unit as Fahrenheit if the unit is in Celsius */
4583 com_rslt = bno055_get_temp_unit(&temp_unit_u8);
4584 if (temp_unit_u8 != BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_FAHRENHEIT)
4585 {
4586 com_rslt += bno055_set_temp_unit(BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_FAHRENHEIT);
4587 }
4588 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4589 {
4590 /* Read the raw temperature data */
4591 com_rslt += bno055_read_temp_data(&reg_temp_s8);
4592 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4593 {
4594 /* Convert raw temperature data to Fahrenheit*/
4595 data_f = (float)(reg_temp_s8 / BNO055_TEMP_DIV_FAHRENHEIT);
4596 *temp_f = data_f;
4597 }
4598 else
4599 {
4600 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4601 }
4602 }
4603 else
4604 {
4605 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4606 }
4607
4608 return com_rslt;
4609}
4610
4624BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_temp_celsius(float *temp_f)
4625{
4626 /* Variable used to return value of
4627 * communication routine*/
4628 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4629 s8 reg_temp_s8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4630 float data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4631 u8 temp_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4632
4633 /* Read the current temperature unit and set the
4634 * unit as Fahrenheit if the unit is in Celsius */
4635 com_rslt = bno055_get_temp_unit(&temp_unit_u8);
4636 if (temp_unit_u8 != BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_CELSIUS)
4637 {
4638 com_rslt += bno055_set_temp_unit(BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_CELSIUS);
4639 }
4640 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4641 {
4642 /* Read the raw temperature data */
4643 com_rslt += bno055_read_temp_data(&reg_temp_s8);
4644 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4645 {
4646 /* Convert raw temperature data to Fahrenheit*/
4647 data_f = (float)(reg_temp_s8 / BNO055_TEMP_DIV_CELSIUS);
4648 *temp_f = data_f;
4649 }
4650 else
4651 {
4652 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4653 }
4654 }
4655 else
4656 {
4657 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4658 }
4659
4660 return com_rslt;
4661}
4662#endif
4663#ifdef BNO055_DOUBLE_ENABLE
4664
4679BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_x_msq(double *accel_x_d)
4680{
4681 /* Variable used to return value of
4682 * communication routine*/
4683 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4684 s16 reg_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4685 double data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4686 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4687
4688 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
4689 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
4690 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
4691 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
4692 {
4693 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
4694 }
4695 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4696 {
4697 /* Read the accel raw y data*/
4698 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_x(&reg_accel_x_s16);
4699 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4700 {
4701 /* Convert the raw x to m/s2 */
4702 data_f = (double)(reg_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4703 *accel_x_d = data_f;
4704 }
4705 else
4706 {
4707 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4708 }
4709 }
4710 else
4711 {
4712 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4713 }
4714
4715 return com_rslt;
4716}

4733BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_x_mg(double *accel_x_d)
4734{
4735 /* Variable used to return value of
4736 * communication routine*/
4737 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4738 s16 reg_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4739 double data_f = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4740 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4741
4742 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
4743 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2*/
4744 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
4745 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
4746 {
4747 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
4748 }
4749 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4750 {
4751 /* Read the accel raw y data*/
4752 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_x(&reg_accel_x_s16);
4753 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4754 {
4755 /* Convert the raw x to mg */
4756 data_f = (double)(reg_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
4757 *accel_x_d = data_f;
4758 }
4759 else
4760 {
4761 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4762 }
4763 }
4764 else
4765 {
4766 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4767 }
4768
4769 return com_rslt;
4770}

4802 }

4876 return com_rslt;

4894 * communication routine*/

4901 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/

4903 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
4904 {
4905 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
4906 }

4908 {

4912 {

4914 data_d = (double)(reg_accel_z_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
4915 *accel_z_d = data_d;
4916 }

4925 }

4943BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_z_mg(double *accel_z_d)
4944{
4945 /* Variable used to return value of
4946 * communication routine*/
4947 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4948 s16 reg_accel_z_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4949 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4950 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
4951
4952 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
4953 * unit as mg if the unit is in m/s2*/
4954 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
4955 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
4956 {
4957 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
4958 }
4959 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4960 {
4961 /* Read the accel raw z data*/
4962 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_z(&reg_accel_z_s16);
4963 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
4964 {
4965 /* Convert the raw z to mg */
4966 data_d = (double)(reg_accel_z_s16 / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
4967 *accel_z_d = data_d;
4968 }
4969 else
4970 {
4971 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4972 }
4973 }
4974 else
4975 {
4976 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
4977 }
4978
4979 return com_rslt;
4980}
4981
5001BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_xyz_msq(struct bno055_accel_double_t *accel_xyz)
5002{
5003 /* Variable used to return value of
5004 * communication routine*/
5005 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5006 struct bno055_accel_t reg_accel_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
5007 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5008
5009 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
5010 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
5011 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
5012 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ)
5013 {
5014 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MSQ);
5015 }
5016 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5017 {
5018 /* Read the accel raw xyz data*/
5019 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_xyz(&reg_accel_xyz);
5020 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5021 {
5022 /* Convert raw xyz to m/s2*/
5023 accel_xyz->x = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.x / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
5024 accel_xyz->y = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.y / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
5025 accel_xyz->z = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.z / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
5026 }
5027 else
5028 {
5029 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5030 }
5031 }
5032 else
5033 {
5034 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5035 }
5036
5037 return com_rslt;
5038}
5039
5058BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_xyz_mg(struct bno055_accel_double_t *accel_xyz)
5059{
5060 /* Variable used to return value of
5061 * communication routine*/
5062 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5063 struct bno055_accel_t reg_accel_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
5064 u8 accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5065
5066 /* Read the current accel unit and set the
5067 * unit as m/s2 if the unit is in mg*/
5068 com_rslt = bno055_get_accel_unit(&accel_unit_u8);
5069 if (accel_unit_u8 != BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG)
5070 {
5071 com_rslt += bno055_set_accel_unit(BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_MG);
5072 }
5073 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5074 {
5075 /* Read the accel raw xyz data*/
5076 com_rslt += bno055_read_accel_xyz(&reg_accel_xyz);
5077 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5078 {
5079 /* Convert raw xyz to mg*/
5080 accel_xyz->x = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.x / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
5081 accel_xyz->y = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.y / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
5082 accel_xyz->z = (double)(reg_accel_xyz.z / BNO055_ACCEL_DIV_MG);
5083 }
5084 else
5085 {
5086 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5087 }
5088 }
5089 else
5090 {
5091 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5092 }
5093
5094 return com_rslt;
5095}
5096
5112BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_mag_x_uT(double *mag_x_d)
5113{
5114 /* Variable used to return value of
5115 * communication routine*/
5116 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5117 s16 reg_mag_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5118 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5119
5120 /* Read raw mag x data */
5121 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_x(&reg_mag_x_s16);
5122 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5123 {
5124 /* Convert raw mag x to microTesla */
5125 data_d = (double)(reg_mag_x_s16 / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
5126 *mag_x_d = data_d;
5127 }
5128 else
5129 {
5130 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5131 }
5132
5133 return com_rslt;
5134}

5230BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_mag_xyz_uT(struct bno055_mag_double_t *mag_xyz)
5231{
5232 /* Variable used to return value of
5233 * communication routine*/
5234 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5235 struct bno055_mag_t reg_mag_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
5236
5237 /* Read raw mag xyz data */
5238 com_rslt = bno055_read_mag_xyz(&reg_mag_xyz);
5239 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5240 {
5241 /* Convert raw mag xyz to microTesla*/
5242 mag_xyz->x = (double)(reg_mag_xyz.x / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
5243 mag_xyz->y = (double)(reg_mag_xyz.y / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
5244 mag_xyz->z = (double)(reg_mag_xyz.z / BNO055_MAG_DIV_UT);
5245 }
5246 else
5247 {
5248 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5249 }
5250
5251 return com_rslt;

5253
5268BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_gyro_x_dps(double *gyro_x_d)
5269{
5270 /* Variable used to return value of
5271 * communication routine*/
5272 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5273 s16 reg_gyro_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5274 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5275 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5276
5277 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
5278 * unit as dps if the unit is in rps */
5279 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
5280 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS)
5281 {
5282 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS);
5283 }
5284 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5285 {
5286 /* Read gyro raw x data */
5287 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_x(&reg_gyro_x_s16);
5288 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5289 {
5290 /* Convert raw gyro x to dps */
5291 data_d = (double)(reg_gyro_x_s16 / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
5292 *gyro_x_d = data_d;
5293 }
5294 else
5295 {
5296 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5297 }
5298 }
5299 else
5300 {
5301 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5302 }
5303
5304 return com_rslt;
5305}

5481{

5490 * unit as dps if the unit is in rps */

5493 {

5495 }
5496 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5497 {

5499 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_z(&reg_gyro_z_s16);
5500 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5501 {

5503 data_d = (double)(reg_gyro_z_s16 / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);

5571
5590BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_gyro_xyz_dps(struct bno055_gyro_double_t *gyro_xyz)
5591{
5592 /* Variable used to return value of
5593 * communication routine*/
5594 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5595 struct bno055_gyro_t reg_gyro_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
5596 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5597
5598 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
5599 * unit as dps if the unit is in rps */
5600 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
5601 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS)
5602 {
5603 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_DPS);
5604 }
5605 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5606 {
5607 /* Read gyro raw xyz data */
5608 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_xyz(&reg_gyro_xyz);
5609 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5610 {
5611 /* Convert gyro raw xyz to dps*/
5612 gyro_xyz->x = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.x / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
5613 gyro_xyz->y = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.y / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
5614 gyro_xyz->z = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.z / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_DPS);
5615 }
5616 else
5617 {
5618 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5619 }
5620 }
5621 else
5622 {
5623 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5624 }
5625
5626 return com_rslt;
5627}
5628
5647BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_gyro_xyz_rps(struct bno055_gyro_double_t *gyro_xyz)
5648{
5649 /* Variable used to return value of
5650 * communication routine*/
5651 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5652 struct bno055_gyro_t reg_gyro_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
5653 u8 gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5654
5655 /* Read the current gyro unit and set the
5656 * unit as rps if the unit is in dps */
5657 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_unit(&gyro_unit_u8);
5658 if (gyro_unit_u8 != BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS)
5659 {
5660 com_rslt += bno055_set_gyro_unit(BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_RPS);
5661 }
5662 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5663 {
5664 /* Read gyro raw x data */
5665 com_rslt += bno055_read_gyro_xyz(&reg_gyro_xyz);
5666 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5667 {
5668 /* Convert the raw gyro xyz to rps*/
5669 gyro_xyz->x = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.x / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_RPS);
5670 gyro_xyz->y = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.y / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_RPS);
5671 gyro_xyz->z = (double)(reg_gyro_xyz.z / BNO055_GYRO_DIV_RPS);
5672 }
5673 else
5674 {
5675 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5676 }
5677 }
5678 else
5679 {
5680 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5681 }
5682
5683 return com_rslt;
5684}
5685
5698BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_h_deg(double *euler_h_d)
5699{
5700 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5701 s16 reg_euler_h_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5702 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5703 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5704
5705 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5706 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
5707 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5708 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
5709 {
5710 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
5711 }
5712 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5713 {
5714 /* Read Euler raw h data*/
5715 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_h(&reg_euler_h_s16);
5716 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5717 {
5718 /* Convert raw Euler h to degree */
5719 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_h_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
5720 *euler_h_d = data_d;
5721 }
5722 else
5723 {
5724 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5725 }
5726 }
5727 else
5728 {
5729 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5730 }
5731
5732 return com_rslt;
5733}
5734
5747BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_h_rad(double *euler_h_d)
5748{
5749 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5750 s16 reg_euler_h_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5751 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5752 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5753
5754 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5755 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
5756 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5757 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
5758 {
5759 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
5760 }
5761 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5762 {
5763 /* Read Euler raw h data*/
5764 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_h(&reg_euler_h_s16);
5765 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5766 {
5767 /* Convert raw Euler h to radians */
5768 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_h_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
5769 *euler_h_d = data_d;
5770 }
5771 else
5772 {
5773 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5774 }
5775 }
5776 else
5777 {
5778 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5779 }
5780
5781 return com_rslt;
5782}

5796BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_r_deg(double *euler_r_d)
5797{
5798 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5799 s16 reg_euler_r_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5800 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5801 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5802
5803 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5804 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
5805 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5806 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
5807 {
5808 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
5809 }
5810 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5811 {
5812 /* Read Euler raw r data*/
5813 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_r(&reg_euler_r_s16);
5814 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5815 {
5816 /* Convert raw Euler r to degree */
5817 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_r_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
5818 *euler_r_d = data_d;
5819 }
5820 else
5821 {
5822 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5823 }
5824 }
5825 else
5826 {
5827 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5828 }
5829
5830 return com_rslt;
5831}
5832
5845BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_r_rad(double *euler_r_d)
5846{
5847 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5848 s16 reg_euler_r_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5849 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5850 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5851
5852 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5853 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
5854 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5855 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
5856 {
5857 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
5858 }
5859 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5860 {
5861 /* Read Euler raw r data*/
5862 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_r(&reg_euler_r_s16);
5863 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5864 {
5865 /* Convert raw Euler r to radians */
5866 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_r_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
5867 *euler_r_d = data_d;
5868 }
5869 else
5870 {
5871 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5872 }
5873 }
5874 else
5875 {
5876 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5877 }
5878
5879 return com_rslt;
5880}
5881
5894BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_p_deg(double *euler_p_d)
5895{
5896 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5897 s16 reg_euler_p_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5898 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5899 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5900
5901 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5902 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
5903 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5904 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
5905 {
5906 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
5907 }
5908 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5909 {
5910 /* Read Euler raw p data*/
5911 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_p(&reg_euler_p_s16);
5912 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5913 {
5914 /* Convert raw Euler p to degree*/
5915 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_p_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
5916 *euler_p_d = data_d;
5917 }
5918 else
5919 {
5920 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5921 }
5922 }
5923 else
5924 {
5925 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5926 }
5927
5928 return com_rslt;
5929}
5930
5943BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_p_rad(double *euler_p_d)
5944{
5945 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5946 s16 reg_euler_p_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5947 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5948 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
5949
5950 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
5951 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
5952 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
5953 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
5954 {
5955 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
5956 }
5957 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5958 {
5959 /* Read Euler raw p data*/
5960 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_p(&reg_euler_p_s16);
5961 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
5962 {
5963 /* Convert raw p to radians*/
5964 data_d = (double)(reg_euler_p_s16 / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
5965 *euler_p_d = data_d;
5966 }
5967 else
5968 {
5969 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5970 }
5971 }
5972 else
5973 {
5974 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
5975 }
5976
5977 return com_rslt;
5978}
5979
5998BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_hpr_deg(struct bno055_euler_double_t *euler_hpr)
5999{
6000 /* Variable used to return value of
6001 * communication routine*/
6002 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6003 struct bno055_euler_t reg_euler = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
6004 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6005
6006 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
6007 * unit as degree if the unit is in radians */
6008 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
6009 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG)
6010 {
6011 com_rslt += bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_DEG);
6012 }
6013 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6014 {
6015 /* Read Euler raw h data*/
6016 com_rslt += bno055_read_euler_hrp(&reg_euler);
6017 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6018 {
6019 /* Convert raw Euler hrp to degree*/
6020 euler_hpr->h = (double)(reg_euler.h / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
6021 euler_hpr->p = (double)(reg_euler.p / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
6022 euler_hpr->r = (double)(reg_euler.r / BNO055_EULER_DIV_DEG);
6023 }
6024 else
6025 {
6026 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6027 }
6028 }
6029 else
6030 {
6031 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6032 }
6033
6034 return com_rslt;
6035}
6036
6055BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_hpr_rad(struct bno055_euler_double_t *euler_hpr)
6056{
6057 /* Variable used to return value of
6058 * communication routine*/
6059 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6060 struct bno055_euler_t reg_euler = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
6061 u8 euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6062
6063 /* Read the current Euler unit and set the
6064 * unit as radians if the unit is in degree */
6065 com_rslt = bno055_get_euler_unit(&euler_unit_u8);
6066 if (euler_unit_u8 != BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD)
6067 {
6068 com_rslt = bno055_set_euler_unit(BNO055_EULER_UNIT_RAD);
6069 }
6070 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6071 {
6072 /* Read the raw hrp */
6073 com_rslt = bno055_read_euler_hrp(&reg_euler);
6074 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6075 {
6076 /* Convert raw Euler hrp to radians*/
6077 euler_hpr->h = (double)(reg_euler.h / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
6078 euler_hpr->p = (double)(reg_euler.p / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
6079 euler_hpr->r = (double)(reg_euler.r / BNO055_EULER_DIV_RAD);
6080 }
6081 else
6082 {
6083 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6084 }
6085 }
6086 else
6087 {
6088 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6089 }
6090
6091 return com_rslt;
6092}
6093
6107BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_linear_accel_x_msq(double *linear_accel_x_d)
6108{
6109 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6110 s16 reg_linear_accel_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6111 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6112
6113 /* Read the raw x of linear accel */
6114 com_rslt = bno055_read_linear_accel_x(&reg_linear_accel_x_s16);
6115 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6116 {
6117 /* Convert the raw x to m/s2 */
6118 data_d = (double)(reg_linear_accel_x_s16 / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
6119 *linear_accel_x_d = data_d;
6120 }
6121 else
6122 {
6123 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6124 }
6125
6126 return com_rslt;
6127}
6128

6143{

6151 {
6152 /* Convert the raw y to m/s2 */
6153 data_d = (double)(reg_linear_accel_y_s16 / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
6154 *linear_accel_y_d = data_d;
6155 }
6156 else
6157 {
6158 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6159 }
6160
6161 return com_rslt;
6162}

6198
6217BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_linear_accel_xyz_msq(
6218 struct bno055_linear_accel_double_t *linear_accel_xyz)
6219{
6220 /* Variable used to return value of
6221 * communication routine*/
6222 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6223 struct bno055_linear_accel_t reg_linear_accel_xyz = { BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE };
6224
6225 /* Read the raw xyz of linear accel */
6226 com_rslt = bno055_read_linear_accel_xyz(&reg_linear_accel_xyz);
6227 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6228 {
6229 /* Convert the raw xyz of linear accel to m/s2 */
6230 linear_accel_xyz->x = (double)(reg_linear_accel_xyz.x / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
6231 linear_accel_xyz->y = (double)(reg_linear_accel_xyz.y / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
6232 linear_accel_xyz->z = (double)(reg_linear_accel_xyz.z / BNO055_LINEAR_ACCEL_DIV_MSQ);
6233 }
6234 else
6235 {
6236 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6237 }
6238
6239 return com_rslt;
6240}

6254BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_gravity_double_x_msq(double *gravity_x_d)
6255{
6256 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6257 s16 reg_gravity_x_s16 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6258 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6259
6260 /* Read raw gravity of x*/
6261 com_rslt = bno055_read_gravity_x(&reg_gravity_x_s16);
6262 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6263 {
6264 /* Convert raw gravity of x to m/s2 */
6265 data_d = (double)(reg_gravity_x_s16 / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
6266 *gravity_x_d = data_d;
6267 }
6268 else
6269 {
6270 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6271 }
6272
6273 return com_rslt;
6274}

6362BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_gravity_xyz_msq(struct bno055_gravity_double_t *gravity_xyz)

6365 * communication routine*/

6370 com_rslt = bno055_read_gravity_xyz(&reg_gravity_xyz);
6371 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6372 {

6374 gravity_xyz->x = (double)(reg_gravity_xyz.x / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
6375 gravity_xyz->y = (double)(reg_gravity_xyz.y / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);
6376 gravity_xyz->z = (double)(reg_gravity_xyz.z / BNO055_GRAVITY_DIV_MSQ);

6381 }

6398BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_temp_fahrenheit(double *temp_d)
6399{
6400 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6401 s8 reg_temp_s8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6402 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6403 u8 temp_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6404
6405 /* Read the current temperature unit and set the
6406 * unit as Fahrenheit if the unit is in Celsius */
6407 com_rslt = bno055_get_temp_unit(&temp_unit_u8);
6408 if (temp_unit_u8 != BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_FAHRENHEIT)
6409 {
6410 com_rslt += bno055_set_temp_unit(BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_FAHRENHEIT);
6411 }
6412 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6413 {
6414 /* Read the raw temperature data */
6415 com_rslt += bno055_read_temp_data(&reg_temp_s8);
6416 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6417 {
6418 /* Convert raw temperature data to Fahrenheit*/
6419 data_d = (double)(reg_temp_s8 / BNO055_TEMP_DIV_FAHRENHEIT);
6420 *temp_d = data_d;
6421 }
6422 else
6423 {
6424 com_rslt += BNO055_ERROR;
6425 }
6426 }
6427 else
6428 {
6429 com_rslt += BNO055_ERROR;
6430 }
6431
6432 return com_rslt;
6433}
6434
6447BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_temp_celsius(double *temp_d)
6448{
6449 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6450 s8 reg_temp_s8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6451 double data_d = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6452 u8 temp_unit_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6453
6454 /* Read the current temperature unit and set the
6455 * unit as Fahrenheit if the unit is in Celsius */
6456 com_rslt = bno055_get_temp_unit(&temp_unit_u8);
6457 if (temp_unit_u8 != BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_CELSIUS)
6458 {
6459 com_rslt += bno055_set_temp_unit(BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_CELSIUS);
6460 }
6461 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6462 {
6463 /* Read the raw temperature data */
6464 com_rslt += bno055_read_temp_data(&reg_temp_s8);
6465 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
6466 {
6467 /* Convert raw temperature data to Fahrenheit*/
6468 data_d = (double)(reg_temp_s8 / BNO055_TEMP_DIV_CELSIUS);
6469 *temp_d = data_d;
6470 }
6471 else
6472 {
6473 com_rslt += BNO055_ERROR;
6474 }
6475 }
6476 else
6477 {
6478 com_rslt += BNO055_ERROR;
6479 }
6480
6481 return com_rslt;
6482}
6483#endif
6484
6497BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_mag_calib_stat(u8 *mag_calib_u8)
6498{
6499 /* Variable used to return value of
6500 * communication routine*/
6501 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6502 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6503 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6504
6505 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
6506 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6507 {
6508 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6509 }
6510 else
6511 {
6512 /*condition check for page, mag calib
6513 * available in the page zero*/
6514 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6515 {
6516 /* Write the page zero*/
6517 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6518 }
6519 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6520 {
6521 /* Read the mag calib stat_s8 */
6522 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6523 BNO055_MAG_CALIB_STAT_REG,
6524 &data_u8r,
6525 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6526 *mag_calib_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_CALIB_STAT);
6527 }
6528 else
6529 {
6530 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6531 }
6532 }
6533
6534 return com_rslt;
6535}
6536
6549BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_calib_stat(u8 *accel_calib_u8)
6550{
6551 /* Variable used to return value of
6552 * communication routine*/
6553 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6554 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6555 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6556
6557 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty*/
6558 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6559 {
6560 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6561 }
6562 else
6563 {
6564 /*condition check for page, accel calib
6565 * available in the page zero*/
6566 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6567 {
6568 /* Write the page zero*/
6569 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6570 }
6571 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6572 {
6573 /* Read the accel calib stat_s8 */
6574 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6575 BNO055_ACCEL_CALIB_STAT_REG,
6576 &data_u8r,
6577 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6578 *accel_calib_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_CALIB_STAT);
6579 }
6580 else
6581 {
6582 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6583 }
6584 }
6585
6586 return com_rslt;
6587}
6588
6601BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_calib_stat(u8 *gyro_calib_u8)
6602{
6603 /* Variable used to return value of
6604 * communication routine*/
6605 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6606 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6607 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6608
6609 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
6610 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6611 {
6612 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6613 }
6614 else
6615 {
6616 /*condition check for page, gyro calib
6617 * available in the page zero*/
6618 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6619 {
6620 /* Write the page zero*/
6621 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6622 }
6623 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6624 {
6625 /* Read the gyro calib status */
6626 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6627 BNO055_GYRO_CALIB_STAT_REG,
6628 &data_u8r,
6629 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6630 *gyro_calib_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_CALIB_STAT);
6631 }
6632 else
6633 {
6634 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6635 }
6636 }
6637
6638 return com_rslt;
6639}
6640
6653BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_sys_calib_stat(u8 *sys_calib_u8)
6654{
6655 /* Variable used to return value of
6656 * communication routine*/
6657 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6658 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6659 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6660
6661 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty*/
6662 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6663 {
6664 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6665 }
6666 else
6667 {
6668 /*condition check for page,system calib
6669 * available in the page zero*/
6670 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6671 {
6672 /* Write the page zero*/
6673 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6674 }
6675 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6676 {
6677 /* Read the system calib */
6678 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6679 BNO055_SYS_CALIB_STAT_REG,
6680 &data_u8r,
6681 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6682 *sys_calib_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_CALIB_STAT);
6683 }
6684 else
6685 {
6686 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6687 }
6688 }
6689
6690 return com_rslt;
6691}
6692
6709BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_selftest_accel(u8 *selftest_accel_u8)
6710{
6711 /* Variable used to return value of
6712 * communication routine*/
6713 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6714 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6715 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6716
6717 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
6718 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6719 {
6720 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6721 }
6722 else
6723 {
6724 /*condition check for page, accel self test is
6725 * available in the page zero*/
6726 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6727 {
6728 /* Write the page zero*/
6729 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6730 }
6731 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6732 {
6733 /* Read the accel self test */
6734 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6735 BNO055_SELFTEST_ACCEL_REG,
6736 &data_u8r,
6737 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6738 *selftest_accel_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST_ACCEL);
6739 }
6740 else
6741 {
6742 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6743 }
6744 }
6745
6746 return com_rslt;
6747}
6748
6765BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_selftest_mag(u8 *selftest_mag_u8)
6766{
6767 /* Variable used to return value of
6768 * communication routine*/
6769 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6770 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6771 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;

6775 {

6777 }
6778 else
6779 {

6781 * available in the page zero*/

6783 {

6785 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);

6794 *selftest_mag_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST_MAG);
6795 }
6796 else

6799 }
6800 }
6801
6802 return com_rslt;
6803}

6849 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6850 *selftest_gyro_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST_GYRO);

6855 }
6856 }

6878{
6879 /* Variable used to return value of
6880 * communication routine*/
6881 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6882 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6883 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6884

6886 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6887 {
6888 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6889 }
6890 else
6891 {
6892 /*condition check for page self test of micro controller
6893 * is available in the page zero*/
6894 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6895 {
6896 /* Write the page zero*/
6897 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6898 }
6899 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6900 {
6901 /* Read the self test of micro controller*/
6902 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6903 BNO055_SELFTEST_MCU_REG,
6904 &data_u8r,
6905 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6906 *selftest_mcu_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST_MCU);
6907 }
6908 else

6911 }
6912 }
6913
6914 return com_rslt;
6915}
6916
6940BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_stat_gyro_any_motion(u8 *gyro_any_motion_u8)
6941{
6942 /* Variable used to return value of
6943 * communication routine*/
6944 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6945 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
6946 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
6947
6948 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
6949 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
6950 {
6951 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
6952 }
6953 else
6954 {
6955 /*condition check for page, gyro anymotion interrupt
6956 * status is available in the page zero*/
6957 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
6958 {
6959 /* Write the page zero*/
6960 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
6961 }
6962 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
6963 {
6964 /* Read the gyro anymotion interrupt stat_s8*/
6965 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
6966 BNO055_INTR_STAT_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_REG,
6967 &data_u8r,
6968 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
6969 *gyro_any_motion_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_INTR_STAT_GYRO_ANY_MOTION);
6970 }
6971 else
6972 {
6973 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
6974 }
6975 }
6976
6977 return com_rslt;
6978}

7022 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7023 }
7024 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))

7027 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,

7148 }

7157 }

7166
7190BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_stat_accel_no_motion(u8 *accel_no_motion_u8)
7191{
7192 /* Variable used to return value of
7193 * communication routine*/
7194 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7195 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7196 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7197
7198 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7199 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7200 {
7201 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7202 }
7203 else
7204 {
7205 /*condition check for page, accel
7206 * nomotion/slowmotion interrupt
7207 * is available in the page zero*/
7208 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7209 {
7210 /* Write the page zero*/
7211 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7212 }
7213 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7214 {
7215 /* Read the stat_s8 of accel
7216 * nomotion/slowmotion interrupt*/
7217 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7218 BNO055_INTR_STAT_ACCEL_NO_MOTION_REG,
7219 &data_u8r,
7220 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7221 *accel_no_motion_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_INTR_STAT_ACCEL_NO_MOTION);
7222 }
7223 else
7224 {
7225 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7226 }
7227 }
7228
7229 return com_rslt;
7230}
7231
7244BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_stat_main_clk(u8 *stat_main_clk_u8)
7245{
7246 /* Variable used to return value of
7247 * communication routine*/
7248 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7249 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7250 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7251
7252 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7253 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7254 {
7255 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7256 }
7257 else
7258 {
7259 /*condition check for page, status of main clk is
7260 * available in the page zero*/
7261 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7262 {
7263 /* Write the page zero*/
7264 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7265 }
7266 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7267 {
7268 /* Read the status of main clk */
7269 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7270 BNO055_SYS_MAIN_CLK_REG,
7271 &data_u8r,
7272 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7273 *stat_main_clk_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_MAIN_CLK);
7274 }
7275 else
7276 {
7277 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7278 }
7279 }
7280
7281 return com_rslt;
7282}
7283
7296BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_sys_stat_code(u8 *sys_stat_u8)
7297{
7298 /* Variable used to return value of
7299 * communication routine*/
7300 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7301 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7302 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7303
7304 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7305 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7306 {
7307 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7308 }
7309 else
7310 {
7311 /*condition check for page, the status of system is
7312 * available in the page zero*/
7313 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7314 {
7315 /* Write the page zero*/
7316 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7317 }
7318 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7319 {
7320 /* Read the the status of system*/
7321 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7322 BNO055_SYS_STAT_CODE_REG,
7323 &data_u8r,
7324 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7325 *sys_stat_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_STAT_CODE);
7326 }
7327 else
7328 {
7329 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7330 }
7331 }
7332
7333 return com_rslt;
7334}
7335
7349BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_sys_error_code(u8 *sys_error_u8)
7350{
7351 /* Variable used to return value of
7352 * communication routine*/
7353 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7354 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7355 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7356
7357 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7358 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7359 {
7360 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7361 }
7362 else
7363 {
7364 /*condition check for page, system BNO055_ERROR code is
7365 * available in the page zero*/
7366 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7367 {
7368 /* Write the page zero*/
7369 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7370 }
7371 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7372 {
7373 /* Read the system BNO055_ERROR code*/
7374 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7375 BNO055_SYS_ERROR_CODE_REG,
7376 &data_u8r,
7377 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7378 *sys_error_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_ERROR_CODE);
7379 }
7380 else
7381 {
7382 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7383 }
7384 }
7385
7386 return com_rslt;
7387}
7388
7405BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_unit(u8 *accel_unit_u8)
7406{
7407 /* Variable used to return value of
7408 * communication routine*/
7409 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7410 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7411 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7412
7413 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7414 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7415 {
7416 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7417 }
7418 else
7419 {
7420 /*condition check for page, accel unit is
7421 * available in the page zero*/
7422 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7423 {
7424 /* Write the page zero*/
7425 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7426 }
7427 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7428 {
7429 /* Read the accel unit */
7430 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7431 BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_REG,
7432 &data_u8r,
7433 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7434 *accel_unit_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT);
7435 }
7436 else
7437 {
7438 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7439 }
7440 }
7441
7442 return com_rslt;
7443}
7444
7462BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_unit(u8 accel_unit_u8)
7463{
7464 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7465 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7466 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
7467 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7468
7469 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7470 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7471 {
7472 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7473 }
7474 else
7475 {
7476 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
7477 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
7478 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
7479 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
7480 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7481 {
7482 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7483 {
7484 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
7485 }
7486 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7487 {
7488 /* Write the accel unit */
7489 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7490 BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_REG,
7491 &data_u8r,
7492 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7493 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7494 {
7495 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT, accel_unit_u8);
7496 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7497 BNO055_ACCEL_UNIT_REG,
7498 &data_u8r,
7499 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7500 }
7501 }
7502 else
7503 {
7504 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7505 }
7506 }
7507 else
7508 {
7509 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7510 }
7511 }
7512 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7513 {
7514 /* set the operation mode
7515 * of previous operation mode*/
7516 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
7517 }
7518
7519 return com_rslt;
7520}
7521
7539BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_unit(u8 *gyro_unit_u8)
7540{
7541 /* Variable used to return value of
7542 * communication routine*/
7543 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7544 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7545 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7546
7547 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7548 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7549 {
7550 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7551 }
7552 else
7553 {
7554 /*condition check for page, gyro unit is
7555 * available in the page zero*/
7556 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7557 {
7558 /* Write the page zero*/
7559 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7560 }
7561 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7562 {
7563 /* Read the gyro unit */
7564 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7565 BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_REG,
7566 &data_u8r,
7567 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7568 *gyro_unit_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_UNIT);
7569 }
7570 else
7571 {
7572 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7573 }
7574 }
7575
7576 return com_rslt;
7577}
7578
7596BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_unit(u8 gyro_unit_u8)
7597{
7598 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7599 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7600 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
7601 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7602
7603 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7604 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7605 {
7606 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7607 }
7608 else
7609 {
7610 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
7611 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
7612 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
7613 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
7614 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7615 {
7616 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7617 {
7618 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
7619 }
7620 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7621 {
7622 /* Write the gyro unit */
7623 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7624 BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_REG,
7625 &data_u8r,
7626 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7627 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7628 {
7629 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_UNIT, gyro_unit_u8);
7630 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7631 BNO055_GYRO_UNIT_REG,
7632 &data_u8r,
7633 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7634 }
7635 }
7636 else
7637 {
7638 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7639 }
7640 }
7641 else
7642 {
7643 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7644 }
7645 }
7646 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7647 {
7648 /* set the operation mode
7649 * of previous operation mode*/
7650 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
7651 }
7652
7653 return com_rslt;
7654}
7655
7673BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_euler_unit(u8 *euler_unit_u8)
7674{
7675 /* Variable used to return value of
7676 * communication routine*/
7677 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7678 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7679 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7680
7681 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7682 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7683 {
7684 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7685 }
7686 else
7687 {
7688 /*condition check for page, Euler unit is
7689 * available in the page zero*/
7690 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7691 {
7692 /* Write the page zero*/
7693 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7694 }
7695 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7696 {
7697 /* Read the Euler unit */
7698 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7699 BNO055_EULER_UNIT_REG,
7700 &data_u8r,
7701 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7702 *euler_unit_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_EULER_UNIT);
7703 }
7704 else
7705 {
7706 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7707 }
7708 }
7709
7710 return com_rslt;
7711}
7712
7730BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_euler_unit(u8 euler_unit_u8)
7731{
7732 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7733 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7734 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
7735 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7736
7737 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7738 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7739 {
7740 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7741 }
7742 else
7743 {
7744 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
7745 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
7746 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
7747 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
7748 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7749 {
7750 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7751 {
7752 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
7753 }
7754 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7755 {
7756 /* Write the Euler unit*/
7757 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7758 BNO055_EULER_UNIT_REG,
7759 &data_u8r,
7760 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7761 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7762 {
7763 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_EULER_UNIT, euler_unit_u8);
7764 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7765 BNO055_EULER_UNIT_REG,
7766 &data_u8r,
7767 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7768 }
7769 }
7770 else
7771 {
7772 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7773 }
7774 }
7775 else
7776 {
7777 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7778 }
7779 }
7780 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7781 {
7782 /* set the operation mode
7783 * of previous operation mode*/
7784 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
7785 }
7786
7787 return com_rslt;
7788}
7789
7807BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_tilt_unit(u8 *tilt_unit_u8)
7808{
7809 /* Variable used to return value of
7810 * communication routine*/
7811 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7812 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7813 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7814
7815 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7816 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7817 {
7818 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7819 }
7820 else
7821 {
7822 /*condition check for page, chip id is
7823 * available in the page zero*/
7824 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7825 {
7826 /* Write the page zero*/
7827 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7828 }
7829 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7830 {
7831 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7832 BNO055_TILT_UNIT_REG,
7833 &data_u8r,
7834 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7835 *tilt_unit_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TILT_UNIT);
7836 }
7837 else
7838 {
7839 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7840 }
7841 }
7842
7843 return com_rslt;
7844}
7845
7867BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_tilt_unit(u8 tilt_unit_u8)
7868{
7869 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7870 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7871 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
7872 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7873
7874 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7875 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7876 {
7877 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7878 }
7879 else
7880 {
7881 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
7882 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
7883 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
7884 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
7885 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7886 {
7887 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7888 {
7889 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
7890 }
7891 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7892 {
7893 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7894 BNO055_TILT_UNIT_REG,
7895 &data_u8r,
7896 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7897 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
7898 {
7899 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TILT_UNIT, tilt_unit_u8);
7900 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7901 BNO055_TILT_UNIT_REG,
7902 &data_u8r,
7903 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7904 }
7905 }
7906 else
7907 {
7908 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7909 }
7910 }
7911 else
7912 {
7913 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7914 }
7915 }
7916 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
7917 {
7918 /* set the operation mode
7919 * of previous operation mode*/
7920 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
7921 }
7922
7923 return com_rslt;
7924}
