7942BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_temp_unit(u8 *temp_unit_u8)
7943{
7944 /* Variable used to return value of
7945 * communication routine*/
7946 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7947 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
7948 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
7949
7950 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
7951 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
7952 {
7953 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
7954 }
7955 else
7956 {
7957 /*condition check for page, temperature unit is
7958 * available in the page zero*/
7959 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
7960 {
7961 /* Write the page zero*/
7962 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
7963 }
7964 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
7965 {
7966 /* Read the temperature unit */
7967 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
7968 BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_REG,
7969 &data_u8r,
7970 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
7971 *temp_unit_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TEMP_UNIT);
7972 }
7973 else
7974 {
7975 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
7976 }
7977 }
7978
7979 return com_rslt;
7980}
7981
7999BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_temp_unit(u8 temp_unit_u8)
8000{
8001 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8002 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8003 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
8004 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8005
8006 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8007 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8008 {
8009 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8010 }
8011 else
8012 {
8013 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
8014 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
8015 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
8016 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
8017 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8018 {
8019 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8020 {
8021 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
8022 }
8023 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8024 {
8025 /* Write the temperature unit */
8026 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8027 BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_REG,
8028 &data_u8r,
8029 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8030 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8031 {
8032 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TEMP_UNIT, temp_unit_u8);
8033 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8034 BNO055_TEMP_UNIT_REG,
8035 &data_u8r,
8036 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8037 }
8038 }
8039 else
8040 {
8041 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8042 }
8043 }
8044 else
8045 {
8046 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8047 }
8048 }
8049 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8050 {
8051 /* set the operation mode
8052 * of previous operation mode*/
8053 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
8054 }
8055
8056 return com_rslt;
8057}
8058
8075BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_data_output_format(u8 *data_output_format_u8)
8076{
8077 /* Variable used to return value of
8078 * communication routine*/
8079 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8080 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8081 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8082
8083 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8084 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8085 {
8086 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8087 }
8088 else
8089 {
8090 /*condition check for page, data output format is
8091 * available in the page zero*/
8092 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8093 {
8094 /* Write the page zero*/
8095 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8096 }
8097 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8098 {
8099 /* Read the data output format */
8100 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8101 BNO055_DATA_OUTPUT_FORMAT_REG,
8102 &data_u8r,
8103 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8104 *data_output_format_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_DATA_OUTPUT_FORMAT);
8105 }
8106 else
8107 {
8108 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8109 }
8110 }
8111
8112 return com_rslt;
8113}
8114
8132BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_data_output_format(u8 data_output_format_u8)
8133{
8134 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8135 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8136 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
8137 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8138
8139 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8140 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8141 {
8142 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8143 }
8144 else
8145 {
8146 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
8147 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
8148 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
8149 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
8150 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8151 {
8152 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8153 {
8154 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
8155 }
8156 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8157 {
8158 /* Write the data output format */
8159 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8160 BNO055_DATA_OUTPUT_FORMAT_REG,
8161 &data_u8r,
8162 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8163 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8164 {
8165 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_DATA_OUTPUT_FORMAT, data_output_format_u8);
8166 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8167 BNO055_DATA_OUTPUT_FORMAT_REG,
8168 &data_u8r,
8169 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8170 }
8171 }
8172 else
8173 {
8174 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8175 }
8176 }
8177 else
8178 {
8179 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8180 }
8181 }
8182 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8183 {
8184 /* set the operation mode
8185 * of previous operation mode*/
8186 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
8187 }
8188
8189 return com_rslt;
8190}
8191
8230BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_operation_mode(u8 *operation_mode_u8)
8231{
8232 /* Variable used to return value of
8233 * communication routine*/
8234 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8235 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8236 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8237
8238 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8239 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8240 {
8241 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8242 }
8243 else
8244 {
8245 /*condition check for page, operation mode is
8246 * available in the page zero*/
8247 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8248 {
8249 /* Write the page zero*/
8250 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8251 }
8252 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8253 {
8254 /* Read the value of operation mode*/
8255 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8256 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8257 &data_u8r,
8258 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8259 *operation_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_OPERATION_MODE);
8260 }
8261 else
8262 {
8263 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8264 }
8265 }
8266
8267 return com_rslt;
8268}
8269
8310BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_operation_mode(u8 operation_mode_u8)
8311{
8312 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8313 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8314 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
8315 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8316
8317 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8318 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8319 {
8320 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8321 }
8322 else
8323 {
8324 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
8325 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
8326 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
8327 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
8328 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8329 {
8330 /* If the previous operation mode is config it is
8331 * directly write the operation mode */
8332 if (prev_opmode_u8 == BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8333 {
8334 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8335 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8336 &data_u8r,
8337 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8338 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8339 {
8340 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_OPERATION_MODE, operation_mode_u8);
8341 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8342 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8343 &data_u8r,
8344 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8345
8346 /* Config mode to other
8347 * operation mode switching
8348 * required delay of 600ms*/
8349 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_MODE_SWITCHING_DELAY);
8350 }
8351 }
8352 else
8353 {
8354 /* If the previous operation
8355 * mode is not config it is
8356 * write the config mode */
8357 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8358 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8359 &data_u8r,
8360 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8361 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8362 {
8363 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_OPERATION_MODE, BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
8364 com_rslt +=
8365 bno055_write_register(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG, &data_u8r, BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8366
8367 /* other mode to config mode switching
8368 * required delay of 20ms*/
8369 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_CONFIG_MODE_SWITCHING_DELAY);
8370 }
8371
8372 /* Write the operation mode */
8373 if (operation_mode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8374 {
8375 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8376 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8377 &data_u8r,
8378 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8379 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8380 {
8381 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_OPERATION_MODE, operation_mode_u8);
8382 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8383 BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
8384 &data_u8r,
8385 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8386
8387 /* Config mode to other
8388 * operation mode switching
8389 * required delay of 600ms*/
8390 p_bno055->delay_msec(BNO055_MODE_SWITCHING_DELAY);
8391 }
8392 }
8393 }
8394 }
8395 else
8396 {
8397 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8398 }
8399 }
8400
8401 return com_rslt;
8402}
8403
8430BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_power_mode(u8 *power_mode_u8)
8431{
8432 /* Variable used to return value of
8433 * communication routine*/
8434 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8435 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8436 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8437
8438 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8439 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8440 {
8441 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8442 }
8443 else
8444 {
8445 /*condition check for page, power mode is
8446 * available in the page zero*/
8447 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8448 {
8449 /* Write the page zero*/
8450 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8451 }
8452 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8453 {
8454 /* Read the value of power mode */
8455 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8456 BNO055_POWER_MODE_REG,
8457 &data_u8r,
8458 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8459 *power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_POWER_MODE);
8460 }
8461 else
8462 {
8463 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8464 }
8465 }
8466
8467 return com_rslt;
8468}
8469
8497BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_power_mode(u8 power_mode_u8)
8498{
8499 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8500 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8501 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
8502 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8503
8504 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8505 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8506 {
8507 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8508 }
8509 else
8510 {
8511 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
8512 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
8513 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
8514 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
8515 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8516 {
8517 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8518 {
8519 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
8520 }
8521 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8522 {
8523 /* Write the value of power mode */
8524 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8525 BNO055_POWER_MODE_REG,
8526 &data_u8r,
8527 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8528 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8529 {
8530 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_POWER_MODE, power_mode_u8);
8531 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8532 BNO055_POWER_MODE_REG,
8533 &data_u8r,
8534 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8535 }
8536 }
8537 else
8538 {
8539 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8540 }
8541 }
8542 else
8543 {
8544 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8545 }
8546 }
8547 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
8548 {
8549 /* set the operation mode
8550 * of previous operation mode*/
8551 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
8552 }
8553
8554 return com_rslt;
8555}
8556
8574BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_rst(u8 *intr_rst_u8)
8575{
8576 /* Variable used to return value of
8577 * communication routine*/
8578 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8579 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8580 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8581
8582 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8583 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8584 {
8585 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8586 }
8587 else
8588 {
8589 /*condition check for page, reset interrupt is
8590 * available in the page zero*/
8591 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8592 {
8593 /* Write the page zero*/
8594 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8595 }
8596 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8597 {
8598 /* Read the value of reset interrupt*/
8599 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8600 BNO055_INTR_RST_REG,
8601 &data_u8r,
8602 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8603 *intr_rst_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_INTR_RST);
8604 }
8605 else
8606 {
8607 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8608 }
8609 }
8610
8611 return com_rslt;
8612}
8613
8631BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_intr_rst(u8 intr_rst_u8)
8632{
8633 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8634 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8635 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8636
8637 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8638 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8639 {
8640 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8641 }
8642 else
8643 {
8644 /*condition check for page, reset interrupt
8645 * available in the page zero*/
8646 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8647 {
8648 /* Write the page zero*/
8649 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8650 }
8651 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8652 {
8653 /* Write the value of reset interrupt */
8654 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8655 BNO055_INTR_RST_REG,
8656 &data_u8r,
8657 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8658 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8659 {
8660 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_INTR_RST, intr_rst_u8);
8661 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8662 BNO055_INTR_RST_REG,
8663 &data_u8r,
8664 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8665 }
8666 }
8667 else
8668 {
8669 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8670 }
8671 }
8672
8673 return com_rslt;
8674}

8692BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_clk_src(u8 *clk_src_u8)
8693{
8694 /* Variable used to return value of
8695 * communication routine*/
8696 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8697 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8698 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8699
8700 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8701 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8702 {
8703 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8704 }
8705 else
8706 {
8707 /*condition check for page, clk source is
8708 * available in the page zero*/
8709 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8710 {
8711 /* Write the page zero*/
8712 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8713 }
8714 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8715 {
8716 /* Read the value of clk source */
8717 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8718 BNO055_CLK_SRC_REG,
8719 &data_u8r,
8720 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8721 *clk_src_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_CLK_SRC);
8722 }

8726 }
8727 }

8730}
8731
8748BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_clk_src(u8 clk_src_u8)
8749{
8750 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8751 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8752 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8753
8754 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8755 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8756 {
8757 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8758 }
8759 else
8760 {
8761 /*condition check for page, clk source is
8762 * available in the page zero*/
8763 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8764 {
8765 /* Write the page zero*/
8766 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8767 }
8768 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8769 {
8770 /* Write the value of clk source */
8771 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8772 BNO055_CLK_SRC_REG,
8773 &data_u8r,
8774 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8775 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8776 {
8777 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_CLK_SRC, clk_src_u8);
8778 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8779 BNO055_CLK_SRC_REG,
8780 &data_u8r,
8781 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8782 }
8783 }
8784 else
8785 {
8786 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8787 }
8788 }
8789
8790 return com_rslt;
8791}

8810BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_sys_rst(u8 *sys_rst_u8)
8811{
8812 /* Variable used to return value of
8813 * communication routine*/
8814 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8815 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8816 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8817
8818 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8819 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8820 {
8821 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8822 }
8823 else
8824 {
8825 /*condition check for page, reset system is
8826 * available in the page zero*/
8827 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8828 {
8829 /* Write the page zero*/
8830 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8831 }
8832 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8833 {
8834 /* Read the value of reset system */
8835 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8836 BNO055_SYS_RST_REG,
8837 &data_u8r,
8838 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8839 *sys_rst_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_RST);
8840 }
8841 else
8842 {
8843 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8844 }
8845 }
8846
8847 return com_rslt;
8848}
8849
8867BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_sys_rst(u8 sys_rst_u8)
8868{
8869 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8870 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8871 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8872
8873 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8874 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8875 {
8876 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8877 }
8878 else
8879 {
8880 /*condition check for page, reset system is
8881 * available in the page zero*/
8882 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8883 {
8884 /* Write the page zero*/
8885 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8886 }
8887 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8888 {
8889 /* Write the value of reset system */
8890 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8891 BNO055_SYS_RST_REG,
8892 &data_u8r,
8893 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8894 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
8895 {
8896 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SYS_RST, sys_rst_u8);
8897 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8898 BNO055_SYS_RST_REG,
8899 &data_u8r,
8900 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8901 }
8902 }
8903 else
8904 {
8905 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8906 }
8907 }
8908
8909 return com_rslt;
8910}

8929BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_selftest(u8 *selftest_u8)
8930{
8931 /* Variable used to return value of
8932 * communication routine*/
8933 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8934 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8935 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8936
8937 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8938 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8939 {
8940 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8941 }
8942 else
8943 {
8944 /*condition check for page, self test is
8945 * available in the page zero*/
8946 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
8947 {
8948 /* Write the page zero*/
8949 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
8950 }
8951 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
8952 {
8953 /* Read the value of self test */
8954 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
8955 BNO055_SELFTEST_REG,
8956 &data_u8r,
8957 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
8958 *selftest_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST);
8959 }
8960 else
8961 {
8962 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8963 }
8964 }
8965
8966 return com_rslt;
8967}
8968
8988BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_selftest(u8 selftest_u8)
8989{
8990 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
8991 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
8992 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
8993 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
8994
8995 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
8996 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
8997 {
8998 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
8999 }
9000 else
9001 {
9002 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9003 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9004 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9005 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9006 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9007 {
9008 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9009 {
9010 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9011 }
9012 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9013 {
9014 /* Write the value of self test */
9015 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9016 BNO055_SELFTEST_REG,
9017 &data_u8r,
9018 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9019 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9020 {
9021 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_SELFTEST, selftest_u8);
9022 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9023 BNO055_SELFTEST_REG,
9024 &data_u8r,
9025 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9026 }
9027 }
9028 else
9029 {
9030 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9031 }
9032 }
9033 else
9034 {
9035 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9036 }
9037 }
9038 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9039 {
9040 /* set the operation mode
9041 * of previous operation mode*/
9042 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9043 }
9044
9045 return com_rslt;
9046}
9047
9065BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_temp_source(u8 *temp_source_u8)
9066{
9067 /* Variable used to return value of
9068 * communication routine*/
9069 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9070 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;

9072

9074 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9075 {
9076 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9077 }
9078 else
9079 {
9080 /*condition check for page, temperature source is
9081 * available in the page zero*/
9082 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9083 {
9084 /* Write the page zero*/
9085 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9086 }
9087 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9088 {
9089 /* Read the value of temperature source */
9090 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9091 BNO055_TEMP_SOURCE_REG,
9092 &data_u8r,
9093 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9094 *temp_source_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TEMP_SOURCE);
9095 }
9096 else
9097 {
9098 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9099 }
9100 }
9101
9102 return com_rslt;
9103}
9104
9122BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_temp_source(u8 temp_source_u8)
9123{
9124 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9125 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9126 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9127 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9128
9129 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9130 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9131 {
9132 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9133 }
9134 else
9135 {
9136 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9137 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9138 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9139 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9140 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9141 {
9142 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9143 {
9144 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9145 }
9146 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9147 {
9148 /* Write the value of temperature source*/
9149 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9150 BNO055_TEMP_SOURCE_REG,
9151 &data_u8r,
9152 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9153 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9154 {
9155 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_TEMP_SOURCE, temp_source_u8);
9156 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9157 BNO055_TEMP_SOURCE_REG,
9158 &data_u8r,
9159 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9160 }
9161 }
9162 else
9163 {
9164 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9165 }
9166 }
9167 else
9168 {
9169 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9170 }
9171 }
9172 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9173 {
9174 /* set the operation mode
9175 * of previous operation mode*/
9176 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9177 }
9178
9179 return com_rslt;
9180}
9181
9215BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_axis_remap_value(u8 *remap_axis_u8)
9216{
9217 /* Variable used to return value of
9218 * communication routine*/
9219 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9220 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9221 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9222
9223 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9224 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9225 {
9226 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9227 }
9228 else
9229 {
9230 /*condition check for page, axis remap is
9231 * available in the page zero*/
9232 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9233 {
9234 /* Write the page zero*/
9235 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9236 }
9237 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9238 {
9239 /* Read the value of axis remap*/
9240 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9241 BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE_REG,
9242 &data_u8r,
9243 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9244 *remap_axis_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE);
9245 }
9246 else
9247 {
9248 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9249 }
9250 }
9251
9252 return com_rslt;
9253}
9254
9288BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_axis_remap_value(u8 remap_axis_u8)
9289{
9290 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9291 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9292 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9293 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9294
9295 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9296 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9297 {
9298 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9299 }
9300 else
9301 {
9302 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9303 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9304 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9305 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9306 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9307 {
9308 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9309 {
9310 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9311 }
9312
9313 /* Write the value of axis remap */
9314 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9315 {
9316 switch (remap_axis_u8)
9317 {
9318 case BNO055_REMAP_X_Y:
9319 case BNO055_REMAP_Y_Z:
9320 case BNO055_REMAP_Z_X:
9321 case BNO055_REMAP_X_Y_Z_TYPE0:
9322 case BNO055_REMAP_X_Y_Z_TYPE1:
9323 case BNO055_DEFAULT_AXIS:
9324 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9325 BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE_REG,
9326 &data_u8r,
9327 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9328 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9329 {
9330 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE, remap_axis_u8);
9331 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9332 BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE_REG,
9333 &data_u8r,
9334 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9335 }
9336 break;
9337 default:
9338
9339 /* Write the default axis remap value */
9340 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9341 BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE_REG,
9342 &data_u8r,
9343 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9344 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9345 {
9346 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE, BNO055_DEFAULT_AXIS);
9347 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9348 BNO055_REMAP_AXIS_VALUE_REG,
9349 &data_u8r,
9350 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9351 }
9352 break;
9353 }
9354 }
9355 else
9356 {
9357 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9358 }
9359 }
9360 else
9361 {
9362 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9363 }
9364 }
9365 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9366 {
9367 /* set the operation mode
9368 * of previous operation mode*/
9369 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9370 }
9371
9372 return com_rslt;
9373}
9374
9391BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_remap_x_sign(u8 *remap_x_sign_u8)
9392{
9393 /* Variable used to return value of
9394 * communication routine*/
9395 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9396 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9397 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9398
9399 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9400 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9401 {
9402 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9403 }
9404 else
9405 {
9406 /*condition check for page, x-axis remap sign is
9407 * available in the page zero*/
9408 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9409 {
9410 /* Write the page zero*/
9411 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9412 }
9413 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9414 {
9415 /* Read the value of x-axis remap sign */
9416 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9417 BNO055_REMAP_X_SIGN_REG,
9418 &data_u8r,
9419 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9420 *remap_x_sign_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_X_SIGN);
9421 }
9422 else
9423 {
9424 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9425 }
9426 }
9427
9428 return com_rslt;
9429}
9430
9447BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_remap_x_sign(u8 remap_x_sign_u8)
9448{
9449 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9450 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9451 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9452 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9453
9454 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9455 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9456 {
9457 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9458 }
9459 else
9460 {
9461 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9462 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9463 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9464 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9465 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9466 {
9467 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9468 {
9469 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9470 }
9471 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9472 {
9473 /* Write the value of x-axis remap */
9474 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9475 BNO055_REMAP_X_SIGN_REG,
9476 &data_u8r,
9477 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9478 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9479 {
9480 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_X_SIGN, remap_x_sign_u8);
9481 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9482 BNO055_REMAP_X_SIGN_REG,
9483 &data_u8r,
9484 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9485 }
9486 }
9487 else
9488 {
9489 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9490 }
9491 }
9492 else
9493 {
9494 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9495 }
9496 }
9497 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9498 {
9499 /* set the operation mode
9500 * of previous operation mode*/
9501 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9502 }
9503
9504 return com_rslt;
9505}
9506
9523BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_remap_y_sign(u8 *remap_y_sign_u8)
9524{
9525 /* Variable used to return value of
9526 * communication routine*/
9527 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9528 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9529 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9530
9531 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9532 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9533 {
9534 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9535 }
9536 else
9537 {
9538 /*condition check for page, y-axis remap sign is
9539 * available in the page zero*/
9540 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9541 {
9542 /* Write the page zero*/
9543 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9544 }
9545 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9546 {
9547 /* Read the value of y-axis remap sign*/
9548 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9549 BNO055_REMAP_Y_SIGN_REG,
9550 &data_u8r,
9551 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9552 *remap_y_sign_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_Y_SIGN);
9553 }
9554 else
9555 {
9556 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9557 }
9558 }
9559
9560 return com_rslt;
9561}
9562
9579BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_remap_y_sign(u8 remap_y_sign_u8)
9580{
9581 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9582 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9583 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9584 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9585
9586 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9587 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9588 {
9589 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9590 }
9591 else
9592 {
9593 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9594 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9595 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9596 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9597 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9598 {
9599 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9600 {
9601 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9602 }
9603 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9604 {
9605 /* Write the value of y-axis remap sign*/
9606 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9607 BNO055_REMAP_Y_SIGN_REG,
9608 &data_u8r,
9609 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9610 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9611 {
9612 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_Y_SIGN, remap_y_sign_u8);
9613 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9614 BNO055_REMAP_Y_SIGN_REG,
9615 &data_u8r,
9616 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9617 }
9618 }
9619 else
9620 {
9621 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9622 }
9623 }
9624 else
9625 {
9626 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9627 }
9628 }
9629 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9630 {
9631 /* set the operation mode
9632 * of previous operation mode*/
9633 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9634 }
9635
9636 return com_rslt;
9637}
