9655BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_remap_z_sign(u8 *remap_z_sign_u8)
9656{
9657 /* Variable used to return value of
9658 * communication routine*/
9659 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9660 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9661 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9662
9663 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9664 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9665 {
9666 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9667 }
9668 else
9669 {
9670 /*condition check for page, z-axis remap sign is
9671 * available in the page zero*/
9672 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9673 {
9674 /* Write the page zero*/
9675 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9676 }
9677 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9678 {
9679 /* Read the value of z-axis remap sign*/
9680 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9681 BNO055_REMAP_Z_SIGN_REG,
9682 &data_u8r,
9683 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9684 *remap_z_sign_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_Z_SIGN);
9685 }
9686 else
9687 {
9688 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9689 }
9690 }
9691
9692 return com_rslt;
9693}
9694
9711BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_remap_z_sign(u8 remap_z_sign_u8)
9712{
9713 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9714 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9715 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9716 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9717
9718 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9719 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9720 {
9721 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9722 }
9723 else
9724 {
9725 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9726 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9727 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9728 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9729 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9730 {
9731 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9732 {
9733 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9734 }
9735 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9736 {
9737 /* Write the value of z-axis remap sign*/
9738 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9739 BNO055_REMAP_Z_SIGN_REG,
9740 &data_u8r,
9741 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9742 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9743 {
9744 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_REMAP_Z_SIGN, remap_z_sign_u8);
9745 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9746 BNO055_REMAP_Z_SIGN_REG,
9747 &data_u8r,
9748 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
9749 }
9750 }
9751 else
9752 {
9753 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9754 }
9755 }
9756 else
9757 {
9758 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9759 }
9760 }
9761 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9762 {
9763 /* set the operation mode
9764 * of previous operation mode*/
9765 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
9766 }
9767
9768 return com_rslt;
9769}
9770
9796BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_sic_matrix(struct bno055_sic_matrix_t *sic_matrix)
9797{
9798 /* Variable used to return value of
9799 * communication routine*/
9800 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9801
9802 /* Array holding the soft iron calibration matrix values
9803 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_LSB] - sic_0->LSB
9804 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_MSB] - sic_0->MSB
9805 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_LSB] - sic_1->LSB
9806 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_MSB] - sic_1->MSB
9807 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_LSB] - sic_2->LSB
9808 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_MSB] - sic_2->MSB
9809 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_LSB] - sic_3->LSB
9810 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_MSB] - sic_3->MSB
9811 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_LSB] - sic_4->LSB
9812 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_MSB] - sic_4->MSB
9813 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_LSB] - sic_5->LSB
9814 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_MSB] - sic_5->MSB
9815 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_LSB] - sic_6->LSB
9816 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_MSB] - sic_6->MSB
9817 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_LSB] - sic_7->LSB
9818 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_MSB] - sic_7->MSB
9819 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_LSB] - sic_8->LSB
9820 * data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_MSB] - sic_8->MSB
9821 */
9822 u8 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIBRATION_MATRIX_SIZE] = {
9823 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE,
9824 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE,
9825 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE,
9826 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
9827 };
9828 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9829
9830 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9831 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9832 {
9833 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9834 }
9835 else
9836 {
9837 /*condition check for page, soft iron calibration matrix is
9838 * available in the page zero*/
9839 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
9840 {
9841 /* Write the page zero*/
9842 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
9843 }
9844 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
9845 {
9846 /* Read soft iron calibration matrix value
9847 * it is eighteen bytes of data */
9848 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
9849 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_LSB_REG,
9850 data_u8,
9851 BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIBRATION_MATRIX_SIZE);
9852 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9853 {
9854 /*soft iron calibration matrix zero*/
9855 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_LSB],
9856 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_LSB);
9857 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_MSB],
9858 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_MSB);
9859 sic_matrix->sic_0 =
9860 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9861 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_0_LSB]));
9862
9863 /*soft iron calibration matrix one*/
9864 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_LSB],
9865 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_LSB);
9866 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_MSB],
9867 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_MSB);
9868 sic_matrix->sic_1 =
9869 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9870 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_1_LSB]));
9871
9872 /*soft iron calibration matrix two*/
9873 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_LSB],
9874 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_LSB);
9875 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_MSB],
9876 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_MSB);
9877 sic_matrix->sic_2 =
9878 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9879 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_2_LSB]));
9880
9881 /*soft iron calibration matrix three*/
9882 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_LSB],
9883 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_LSB);
9884 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_MSB],
9885 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_LSB);
9886 sic_matrix->sic_3 =
9887 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9888 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_3_LSB]));
9889
9890 /*soft iron calibration matrix four*/
9891 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_LSB],
9892 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_LSB);
9893 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_MSB],
9894 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_LSB);
9895 sic_matrix->sic_4 =
9896 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9897 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_4_LSB]));
9898
9899 /*soft iron calibration matrix five*/
9900 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_LSB],
9901 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_LSB);
9902 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_MSB],
9903 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_LSB);
9904 sic_matrix->sic_5 =
9905 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9906 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_5_LSB]));
9907
9908 /*soft iron calibration matrix six*/
9909 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_LSB],
9910 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_LSB);
9911 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_MSB],
9912 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_LSB);
9913 sic_matrix->sic_6 =
9914 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9915 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_6_LSB]));
9916
9917 /*soft iron calibration matrix seven*/
9918 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_LSB],
9919 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_LSB);
9920 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_MSB],
9921 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_LSB);
9922 sic_matrix->sic_7 =
9923 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9924 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_7_LSB]));
9925
9926 /*soft iron calibration matrix eight*/
9927 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_LSB],
9928 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_LSB);
9929 data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_MSB],
9930 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_LSB);
9931 sic_matrix->sic_8 =
9932 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
9933 (data_u8[BNO055_SOFT_IRON_CALIB_8_LSB]));
9934 }
9935 else
9936 {
9937 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9938 }
9939 }
9940 else
9941 {
9942 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9943 }
9944 }
9945
9946 return com_rslt;
9947}
9948
9974BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_sic_matrix(struct bno055_sic_matrix_t *sic_matrix)
9975{
9976 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
9977 u8 data1_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9978 u8 data2_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
9979 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
9980 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
9981
9982 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
9983 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
9984 {
9985 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
9986 }
9987 else
9988 {
9989 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
9990 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
9991 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
9992 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
9993 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
9994 {
9995 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
9996 {
9997 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
9998 }
9999 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10000 {
10001 /* write soft iron calibration
10002 * matrix zero value*/
10003 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10004 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_LSB_REG,
10005 &data2_u8r,
10006 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10007 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10008 {
10009 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_0 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10010 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_LSB, data1_u8r);
10011 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10012 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_LSB_REG,
10013 &data2_u8r,
10014 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10015 }
10016 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10017 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_MSB_REG,
10018 &data2_u8r,
10019 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10020 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10021 {
10022 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_0 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10023 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_MSB, data1_u8r);
10024 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10025 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_0_MSB_REG,
10026 &data2_u8r,
10027 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10028 }
10029
10030 /* write soft iron calibration
10031 * matrix one value*/
10032 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10033 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_LSB_REG,
10034 &data2_u8r,
10035 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10036 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10037 {
10038 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_1 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10039 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_LSB, data1_u8r);
10040 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10041 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_LSB_REG,
10042 &data2_u8r,
10043 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10044 }
10045 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10046 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_MSB_REG,
10047 &data2_u8r,
10048 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10049 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10050 {
10051 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_1 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10052 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_MSB, data1_u8r);
10053 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10054 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_1_MSB_REG,
10055 &data2_u8r,
10056 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10057 }
10058
10059 /* write soft iron calibration
10060 * matrix two value*/
10061 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10062 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_LSB_REG,
10063 &data2_u8r,
10064 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10065 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10066 {
10067 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_2 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10068 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_LSB, data1_u8r);
10069 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10070 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_LSB_REG,
10071 &data2_u8r,
10072 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10073 }
10074 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10075 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_MSB_REG,
10076 &data2_u8r,
10077 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10078 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10079 {
10080 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_2 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10081 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_MSB, data1_u8r);
10082 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10083 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_2_MSB_REG,
10084 &data2_u8r,
10085 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10086 }
10087
10088 /* write soft iron calibration
10089 * matrix three value*/
10090 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10091 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_LSB_REG,
10092 &data2_u8r,
10093 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10094 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10095 {
10096 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_3 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10097 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_LSB, data1_u8r);
10098 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10099 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_LSB_REG,
10100 &data2_u8r,
10101 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10102 }
10103 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10104 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_MSB_REG,
10105 &data2_u8r,
10106 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10107 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10108 {
10109 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_3 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10110 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_MSB, data1_u8r);
10111 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10112 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_3_MSB_REG,
10113 &data2_u8r,
10114 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10115 }
10116
10117 /* write soft iron calibration
10118 * matrix four value*/
10119 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10120 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_LSB_REG,
10121 &data2_u8r,
10122 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10123 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10124 {
10125 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_4 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10126 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_LSB, data1_u8r);
10127 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10128 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_LSB_REG,
10129 &data2_u8r,
10130 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10131 }
10132 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10133 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_MSB_REG,
10134 &data2_u8r,
10135 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10136 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10137 {
10138 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_4 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10139 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_MSB, data1_u8r);
10140 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10141 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_4_MSB_REG,
10142 &data2_u8r,
10143 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10144 }
10145
10146 /* write soft iron calibration
10147 * matrix five value*/
10148 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10149 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_LSB_REG,
10150 &data2_u8r,
10151 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10152 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10153 {
10154 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_5 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10155 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_LSB, data1_u8r);
10156 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10157 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_LSB_REG,
10158 &data2_u8r,
10159 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10160 }
10161 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10162 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_MSB_REG,
10163 &data2_u8r,
10164 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10165 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10166 {
10167 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_5 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10168 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_MSB, data1_u8r);
10169 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10170 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_5_MSB_REG,
10171 &data2_u8r,
10172 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10173 }
10174
10175 /* write soft iron calibration
10176 * matrix six value*/
10177 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10178 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_LSB_REG,
10179 &data2_u8r,
10180 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10181 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10182 {
10183 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_6 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10184 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_LSB, data1_u8r);
10185 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10186 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_LSB_REG,
10187 &data2_u8r,
10188 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10189 }
10190 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10191 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_MSB_REG,
10192 &data2_u8r,
10193 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10194 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10195 {
10196 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_6 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10197 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_MSB, data1_u8r);
10198 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10199 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_6_MSB_REG,
10200 &data2_u8r,
10201 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10202 }
10203
10204 /* write soft iron calibration
10205 * matrix seven value*/
10206 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10207 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_LSB_REG,
10208 &data2_u8r,
10209 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10210 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10211 {
10212 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_7 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10213 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_LSB, data1_u8r);
10214 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10215 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_LSB_REG,
10216 &data2_u8r,
10217 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10218 }
10219 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10220 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_MSB_REG,
10221 &data2_u8r,
10222 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10223 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10224 {
10225 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_7 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10226 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_MSB, data1_u8r);
10227 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10228 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_7_MSB_REG,
10229 &data2_u8r,
10230 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10231 }
10232
10233 /* write soft iron calibration
10234 * matrix eight value*/
10235 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10236 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_LSB_REG,
10237 &data2_u8r,
10238 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10239 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10240 {
10241 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_8 & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10242 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_LSB, data1_u8r);
10243 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10244 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_LSB_REG,
10245 &data2_u8r,
10246 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10247 }
10248 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10249 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_MSB_REG,
10250 &data2_u8r,
10251 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10252 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10253 {
10254 data1_u8r = ((s8)(sic_matrix->sic_8 >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10255 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_MSB, data1_u8r);
10256 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10257 BNO055_SIC_MATRIX_8_MSB_REG,
10258 &data2_u8r,
10259 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10260 }
10261 }
10262 else
10263 {
10264 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10265 }
10266 }
10267 else
10268 {
10269 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10270 }
10271 }
10272 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
10273 {
10274 /* set the operation mode
10275 * of previous operation mode*/
10276 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
10277 }
10278
10279 return com_rslt;
10280}
10281
10313BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_accel_offset(struct bno055_accel_offset_t *accel_offset)
10314{
10315 /* Variable used to return value of
10316 * communication routine*/
10317 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10318
10319 /* Array holding the accel offset values
10320 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] - offset x->LSB
10321 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] - offset x->MSB
10322 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] - offset y->LSB
10323 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] - offset y->MSB
10324 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] - offset z->LSB
10325 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] - offset z->MSB
10326 */
10327 u8 data_u8[BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_ARRAY] = {
10328 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
10329 };
10330 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
10331
10332 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
10333 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
10334 {
10335 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
10336 }
10337 else
10338 {
10339 /*condition check for page, accel offset is
10340 * available in the page zero*/
10341 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
10342 {
10343 /* Write the page zero*/
10344 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
10345 }
10346 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
10347 {
10348 /* Read accel offset value it is six bytes of data*/
10349 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10350 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10351 data_u8,
10352 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_ARRAY);
10353 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10354 {
10355 /* Read accel x offset value*/
10356 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB],
10357 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_LSB);
10358 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB],
10359 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_MSB);
10360 accel_offset->x =
10361 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10362 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB]));
10363
10364 /* Read accel y offset value*/
10365 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB],
10366 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_LSB);
10367 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB],
10368 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_MSB);
10369 accel_offset->y =
10370 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10371 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB]));
10372
10373 /* Read accel z offset value*/
10374 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB],
10375 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_LSB);
10376 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB],
10377 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_MSB);
10378 accel_offset->z =
10379 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10380 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB]));
10381
10382 /* Read accel radius value
10383 * it is two bytes of data*/
10384 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10385 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10386 data_u8,
10387 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
10388
10389 /* Array holding the accel radius values
10390 * data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB] - radius->LSB
10391 * data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB] - radius->MSB
10392 */
10393 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10394 {
10395 data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB],
10396 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_LSB);
10397 data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB],
10398 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_MSB);
10399 accel_offset->r =
10400 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10401 (data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB]));
10402 }
10403 else
10404 {
10405 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10406 }
10407 }
10408 else
10409 {
10410 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10411 }
10412 }
10413 else
10414 {
10415 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10416 }
10417 }
10418
10419 return com_rslt;
10420}
10421
10453BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_accel_offset(struct bno055_accel_offset_t *accel_offset)
10454{
10455 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10456 u8 data1_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
10457 u8 data2_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
10458 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
10459 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
10460
10461 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
10462 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
10463 {
10464 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
10465 }
10466 else
10467 {
10468 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
10469 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
10470 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
10471 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
10472 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10473 {
10474 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
10475 {
10476 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
10477 }
10478 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10479 {
10480 /* write accel offset x value*/
10481 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10482 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10483 &data2_u8r,
10484 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10485 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10486 {
10487 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->x & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10488 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_LSB, data1_u8r);
10489 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10490 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10491 &data2_u8r,
10492 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10493 }
10494 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10495 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
10496 &data2_u8r,
10497 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10498 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10499 {
10500 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->x >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10501 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_MSB, data1_u8r);
10502 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10503 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
10504 &data2_u8r,
10505 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10506 }
10507
10508 /* write accel offset y value*/
10509 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10510 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
10511 &data2_u8r,
10512 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10513 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10514 {
10515 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->y & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10516 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_LSB, data1_u8r);
10517 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10518 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
10519 &data2_u8r,
10520 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10521 }
10522 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10523 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
10524 &data2_u8r,
10525 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10526 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10527 {
10528 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->y >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10529 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_MSB, data1_u8r);
10530 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10531 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
10532 &data2_u8r,
10533 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10534 }
10535
10536 /* write accel offset z value*/
10537 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10538 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
10539 &data2_u8r,
10540 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10541 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10542 {
10543 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->z & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10544 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_LSB, data1_u8r);
10545 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10546 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
10547 &data2_u8r,
10548 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10549 }
10550 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10551 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
10552 &data2_u8r,
10553 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10554 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10555 {
10556 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->z >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10557 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_MSB, data1_u8r);
10558 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10559 BNO055_ACCEL_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
10560 &data2_u8r,
10561 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10562 }
10563
10564 /*write accel radius value*/
10565 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10566 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10567 &data2_u8r,
10568 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10569 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10570 {
10571 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->r & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10572 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_LSB, data1_u8r);
10573 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10574 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10575 &data2_u8r,
10576 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10577 }
10578 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10579 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_MSB_REG,
10580 &data2_u8r,
10581 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10582 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10583 {
10584 data1_u8r = ((s8)(accel_offset->r >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10585 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_MSB, data1_u8r);
10586 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10587 BNO055_ACCEL_RADIUS_MSB_REG,
10588 &data2_u8r,
10589 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10590 }
10591 }
10592 else
10593 {
10594 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10595 }
10596 }
10597 else
10598 {
10599 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10600 }
10601 }
10602 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
10603 {
10604 /* set the operation mode
10605 * of previous operation mode*/
10606 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
10607 }
10608
10609 return com_rslt;
10610}
10611
10632BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_mag_offset(struct bno055_mag_offset_t *mag_offset)
10633{
10634 /* Variable used to return value of
10635 * communication routine*/
10636 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10637
10638 /* Array holding the mag offset values
10639 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] - offset x->LSB
10640 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] - offset x->MSB
10641 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] - offset y->LSB
10642 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] - offset y->MSB
10643 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] - offset z->LSB
10644 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] - offset z->MSB
10645 */
10646 u8 data_u8[BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_ARRAY] = {
10647 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
10648 };
10649 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
10650
10651 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
10652 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
10653 {
10654 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
10655 }
10656 else
10657 {
10658 /*condition check for page, mag offset is
10659 * available in the page zero*/
10660 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
10661 {
10662 /* Write the page zero*/
10663 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
10664 }
10665 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
10666 {
10667 /* Read mag offset value it the six bytes of data */
10668 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10669 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10670 data_u8,
10671 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_ARRAY);
10672 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10673 {
10674 /* Read mag x offset value*/
10675 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB],
10676 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_LSB);
10677 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB],
10678 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_MSB);
10679 mag_offset->x =
10680 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10681 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB]));
10682
10683 /* Read mag y offset value*/
10684 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB],
10685 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_LSB);
10686 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB],
10687 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_MSB);
10688 mag_offset->y =
10689 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10690 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB]));
10691
10692 /* Read mag z offset value*/
10693 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB],
10694 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_LSB);
10695 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB],
10696 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_MSB);
10697 mag_offset->z =
10698 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10699 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB]));
10700
10701 /* Read mag radius value
10702 * it the two bytes of data */
10703 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10704 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10705 data_u8,
10706 BNO055_LSB_MSB_READ_LENGTH);
10707 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10708 {
10709 /* Array holding the mag radius values
10710 * data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB] -
10711 * radius->LSB
10712 * data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB] -
10713 * radius->MSB
10714 */
10715 data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB],
10716 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_LSB);
10717 data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB],
10718 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_MSB);
10719 mag_offset->r =
10720 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
10721 (data_u8[BNO055_OFFSET_RADIUS_LSB]));
10722 }
10723 else
10724 {
10725 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10726 }
10727 }
10728 else
10729 {
10730 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10731 }
10732 }
10733 else
10734 {
10735 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10736 }
10737 }
10738
10739 return com_rslt;
10740}
10741
10762BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_mag_offset(struct bno055_mag_offset_t *mag_offset)
10763{
10764 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10765 u8 data1_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
10766 u8 data2_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
10767 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
10768 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
10769
10770 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
10771 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
10772 {
10773 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
10774 }
10775 else
10776 {
10777 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
10778 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
10779 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
10780 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
10781 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10782 {
10783 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
10784 {
10785 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
10786 }
10787 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10788 {
10789 /* write Mag offset x value*/
10790 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10791 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10792 &data2_u8r,
10793 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10794 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10795 {
10796 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->x & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10797 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_LSB, data1_u8r);
10798 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10799 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10800 &data2_u8r,
10801 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10802 }
10803 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10804 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
10805 &data2_u8r,
10806 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10807 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10808 {
10809 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->x >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10810 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_MSB, data1_u8r);
10811 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10812 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
10813 &data2_u8r,
10814 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10815 }
10816
10817 /* write Mag offset y value*/
10818 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10819 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
10820 &data2_u8r,
10821 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10822 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10823 {
10824 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->y & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10825 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_LSB, data1_u8r);
10826 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10827 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
10828 &data2_u8r,
10829 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10830 }
10831 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10832 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
10833 &data2_u8r,
10834 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10835 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10836 {
10837 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->y >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10838 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_MSB, data1_u8r);
10839 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10840 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
10841 &data2_u8r,
10842 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10843 }
10844
10845 /* write Mag offset z value*/
10846 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10847 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
10848 &data2_u8r,
10849 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10850 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10851 {
10852 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->z & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10853 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_LSB, data1_u8r);
10854 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10855 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
10856 &data2_u8r,
10857 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10858 }
10859 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10860 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
10861 &data2_u8r,
10862 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10863 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10864 {
10865 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->z >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10866 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_MSB, data1_u8r);
10867 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10868 BNO055_MAG_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
10869 &data2_u8r,
10870 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10871 }
10872
10873 /* write Mag radius value*/
10874 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10875 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10876 &data2_u8r,
10877 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10878 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10879 {
10880 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->r & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
10881 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_LSB, data1_u8r);
10882 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10883 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_LSB_REG,
10884 &data2_u8r,
10885 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10886 }
10887 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10888 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_MSB_REG,
10889 &data2_u8r,
10890 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10891 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10892 {
10893 data1_u8r = ((s8)(mag_offset->r >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
10894 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_MSB, data1_u8r);
10895 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10896 BNO055_MAG_RADIUS_MSB_REG,
10897 &data2_u8r,
10898 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
10899 }
10900 }
10901 else
10902 {
10903 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10904 }
10905 }
10906 else
10907 {
10908 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10909 }
10910 }
10911 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
10912 {
10913 /* set the operation mode
10914 * of previous operation mode*/
10915 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
10916 }
10917
10918 return com_rslt;
10919}
10920
10952BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_read_gyro_offset(struct bno055_gyro_offset_t *gyro_offset)
10953{
10954 /* Variable used to return value of
10955 * communication routine*/
10956 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
10957
10958 /* Array holding the gyro offset values
10959 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] - offset x->LSB
10960 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] - offset x->MSB
10961 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] - offset y->LSB
10962 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] - offset y->MSB
10963 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] - offset z->LSB
10964 * data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] - offset z->MSB
10965 */
10966 u8 data_u8[BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_ARRAY] = {
10967 BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE, BNO055_INIT_VALUE
10968 };
10969 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
10970
10971 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
10972 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
10973 {
10974 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
10975 }
10976 else
10977 {
10978 /*condition check for page, gyro offset is
10979 * available in the page zero*/
10980 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ZERO)
10981 {
10982 /* Write the page zero*/
10983 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ZERO);
10984 }
10985 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ZERO))
10986 {
10987 /* Read gyro offset value it the six bytes of data*/
10988 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
10989 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
10990 data_u8,
10991 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_ARRAY);
10992 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
10993 {
10994 /* Read gyro x offset value*/
10995 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB],
10996 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_LSB);
10997 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB],
10998 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_MSB);
10999 gyro_offset->x =
11000 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
11001 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_X_LSB]));
11002
11003 /* Read gyro y offset value*/
11004 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB],
11005 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_LSB);
11006 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB],
11007 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_MSB);
11008 gyro_offset->y =
11009 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
11010 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Y_LSB]));
11011
11012 /* Read gyro z offset value*/
11013 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB],
11014 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_LSB);
11015 data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB] = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB],
11016 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_MSB);
11017 gyro_offset->z =
11018 (s16)((((s32)(s8)(data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_MSB])) << (BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS)) |
11019 (data_u8[BNO055_SENSOR_OFFSET_DATA_Z_LSB]));
11020 }
11021 else
11022 {
11023 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11024 }
11025 }
11026 else
11027 {
11028 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11029 }
11030 }
11031
11032 return com_rslt;
11033}
11034
11066BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_write_gyro_offset(struct bno055_gyro_offset_t *gyro_offset)
11067{
11068 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11069 u8 data1_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11070 u8 data2_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11071 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11072 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11073
11074 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11075 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11076 {
11077 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11078 }
11079 else
11080 {
11081 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11082 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11083 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11084 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11085 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11086 {
11087 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11088 {
11089 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11090 }
11091 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11092 {
11093 /* write gryo offset x value*/
11094 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11095 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
11096 &data2_u8r,
11097 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11098 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11099 {
11100 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->x & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
11101 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_LSB, data1_u8r);
11102 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11103 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_LSB_REG,
11104 &data2_u8r,
11105 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11106 }
11107 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11108 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
11109 &data2_u8r,
11110 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11111 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11112 {
11113 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->x >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
11114 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_MSB, data1_u8r);
11115 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11116 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_X_MSB_REG,
11117 &data2_u8r,
11118 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11119 }
11120
11121 /* write gryo offset y value*/
11122 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11123 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
11124 &data2_u8r,
11125 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11126 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11127 {
11128 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->y & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
11129 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_LSB, data1_u8r);
11130 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11131 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_LSB_REG,
11132 &data2_u8r,
11133 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11134 }
11135 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11136 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
11137 &data2_u8r,
11138 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11139 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11140 {
11141 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->y >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
11142 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_MSB, data1_u8r);
11143 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11144 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Y_MSB_REG,
11145 &data2_u8r,
11146 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11147 }
11148
11149 /* write gryo offset z value*/
11150 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11151 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
11152 &data2_u8r,
11153 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11154 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11155 {
11156 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->z & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA));
11157 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_LSB, data1_u8r);
11158 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11159 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_LSB_REG,
11160 &data2_u8r,
11161 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11162 }
11163 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11164 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
11165 &data2_u8r,
11166 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11167 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11168 {
11169 data1_u8r = ((s8)(gyro_offset->z >> BNO055_SHIFT_EIGHT_BITS) & BNO055_SIC_HEX_0_0_F_F_DATA);
11170 data2_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data2_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_MSB, data1_u8r);
11171 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11172 BNO055_GYRO_OFFSET_Z_MSB_REG,
11173 &data2_u8r,
11174 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11175 }
11176 }
11177 else
11178 {
11179 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11180 }
11181 }
11182 else
11183 {
11184 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11185 }
11186 }
11187 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11188 {
11189 /* set the operation mode
11190 * of previous operation mode*/
11191 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11192 }
11193
11194 return com_rslt;
11195}
11196
11197/********************************************************/
11198/************** PAGE1 Functions *********************/
11199/********************************************************/
11200
11219BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_range(u8 *accel_range_u8)
11220{
11221 /* Variable used to return value of
11222 * communication routine*/
11223 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11224 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11225 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11226
11227 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11228 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11229 {
11230 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11231 }
11232 else
11233 {
11234 /*condition check for page, accel range is
11235 * available in the page one*/
11236 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
11237 {
11238 /* Write page as one */
11239 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11240 }
11241 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
11242 {
11243 /* Read the value of accel g range */
11244 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11245 BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE_REG,
11246 &data_u8r,
11247 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11248 *accel_range_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE);
11249 }
11250 else
11251 {
11252 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11253 }
11254 }
11255
11256 return com_rslt;
11257}
11258
11278BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_range(u8 accel_range_u8)
11279{
11280 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11281 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11282 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11283 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11284 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11285
11286 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11287 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11288 {
11289 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11290 }
11291 else
11292 {
11293 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11294 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11295 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11296 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11297 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11298 {
11299 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11300 {
11301 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11302 }
11303 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11304 {
11305 /* Write page as one */
11306 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11307 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11308 {
11309 if (accel_range_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE)
11310 {
11311 /* Write the value of accel range*/
11312 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11313 BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE_REG,
11314 &data_u8r,
11315 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11316 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11317 {
11318 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE, accel_range_u8);
11319 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11320 BNO055_ACCEL_RANGE_REG,
11321 &data_u8r,
11322 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11323 }
11324 }
11325 else
11326 {
11327 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
11328 }
11329 }
11330 else
11331 {
11332 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11333 }
11334 }
11335 else
11336 {
11337 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11338 }
11339 }
11340 else
11341 {
11342 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11343 }
11344 }
11345 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11346 {
11347 /* set the operation mode of
11348 * previous operation mode*/
11349 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11350 }
11351
11352 return com_rslt;
11353}
11354
11378BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_bw(u8 *accel_bw_u8)
11379{
11380 /* Variable used to return value of
11381 * communication routine*/
11382 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11383 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11384 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11385
11386 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11387 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11388 {
11389 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11390 }
11391 else
11392 {
11393 /*condition check for page, accel bandwidth is
11394 * available in the page one*/
11395 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
11396 {
11397 /* Write page as one */
11398 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11399 }
11400 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
11401 {
11402 /* Read the value of accel bandwidth */
11403 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11404 BNO055_ACCEL_BW_REG,
11405 &data_u8r,
11406 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11407 *accel_bw_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_BW);
11408 }
11409 else
11410 {
11411 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11412 }
11413 }
11414
11415 return com_rslt;
11416}
11417
11441BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_bw(u8 accel_bw_u8)
11442{
11443 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11444 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11445 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11446 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11447 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11448
11449 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11450 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11451 {
11452 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11453 }
11454 else
11455 {
11456 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11457 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11458 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11459 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11460 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11461 {
11462 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11463 {
11464 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11465 }
11466 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11467 {
11468 /* Write page as one */
11469 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11470 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11471 {
11472 if (accel_bw_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_GYRO_BW_RANGE)
11473 {
11474 /* Write the accel */
11475 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11476 BNO055_ACCEL_BW_REG,
11477 &data_u8r,
11478 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11479 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11480 {
11481 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_BW, accel_bw_u8);
11482 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11483 BNO055_ACCEL_BW_REG,
11484 &data_u8r,
11485 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11486 }
11487 }
11488 else
11489 {
11490 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
11491 }
11492 }
11493 else
11494 {
11495 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11496 }
11497 }
11498 else
11499 {
11500 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11501 }
11502 }
11503 else
11504 {
11505 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11506 }
11507 }
11508 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11509 {
11510 /* set the operation mode of
11511 * previous operation mode*/
11512 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11513 }
11514
11515 return com_rslt;
11516}
11517
11538BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_power_mode(u8 *accel_power_mode_u8)
11539{
11540 /* Variable used to return value of
11541 * communication routine*/
11542 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11543 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11544 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11545
11546 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11547 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11548 {
11549 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11550 }
11551 else
11552 {
11553 /*condition check for page, accel power mode is
11554 * available in the page one*/
11555 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
11556 {
11557 /* Write page as one */
11558 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11559 }
11560 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
11561 {
11562 /* Read the value of accel bandwidth */
11563 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11564 BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE_REG,
11565 &data_u8r,
11566 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11567 *accel_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE);
11568 }
11569 else
11570 {
11571 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11572 }
11573 }
11574
11575 return com_rslt;
11576}
11577
11598BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_power_mode(u8 accel_power_mode_u8)
11599{
11600 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11601 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11602 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11603 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11604 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11605
11606 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11607 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11608 {
11609 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11610 }
11611 else
11612 {
11613 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11614 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11615 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11616 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11617 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11618 {
11619 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11620 {
11621 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11622 }
11623 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11624 {
11625 /* Write page as one */
11626 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11627 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11628 {
11629 if (accel_power_mode_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE_RANGE)
11630 {
11631 /* Write the value of accel bandwidth*/
11632 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11633 BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE_REG,
11634 &data_u8r,
11635 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11636 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11637 {
11638 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE, accel_power_mode_u8);
11639 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11640 BNO055_ACCEL_POWER_MODE_REG,
11641 &data_u8r,
11642 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11643 }
11644 }
11645 else
11646 {
11647 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
11648 }
11649 }
11650 else
11651 {
11652 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11653 }
11654 }
11655 else
11656 {
11657 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11658 }
11659 }
11660 else
11661 {
11662 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11663 }
11664 }
11665 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11666 {
11667 /* set the operation mode of
11668 * previous operation mode*/
11669 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11670 }
11671
11672 return com_rslt;
11673}
11674
11698BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_mag_data_output_rate(u8 *mag_data_output_rate_u8)
11699{
11700 /* Variable used to return value of
11701 * communication routine*/
11702 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11703 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11704 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11705
11706 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11707 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11708 {
11709 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11710 }
11711 else
11712 {
11713 /*condition check for page, output data rate
11714 * available in the page one*/
11715 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
11716 {
11717 /* Write page as one */
11718 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11719 }
11720 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
11721 {
11722 /* Read the mag output data rate*/
11723 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11724 BNO055_MAG_DATA_OUTPUT_RATE_REG,
11725 &data_u8r,
11726 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11727 *mag_data_output_rate_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_DATA_OUTPUT_RATE);
11728 }
11729 else
11730 {
11731 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11732 }
11733 }
11734
11735 return com_rslt;
11736}
11737
11761BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_mag_data_output_rate(u8 mag_data_output_rate_u8)
11762{
11763 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11764 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11765 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11766 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11767 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11768
11769 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11770 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11771 {
11772 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11773 }
11774 else
11775 {
11776 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11777 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11778 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11779 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11780 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11781 {
11782 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11783 {
11784 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11785 }
11786 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11787 {
11788 /* Write page as one */
11789 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11790 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11791 {
11792 if (mag_data_output_rate_u8 < BNO055_MAG_OUTPUT_RANGE)
11793 {
11794 /* Write the value of
11795 * mag output data rate*/
11796 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11797 BNO055_MAG_DATA_OUTPUT_RATE_REG,
11798 &data_u8r,
11799 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11800 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11801 {
11802 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
11803 BNO055_MAG_DATA_OUTPUT_RATE,
11804 mag_data_output_rate_u8);
11805 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11806 BNO055_MAG_DATA_OUTPUT_RATE_REG,
11807 &data_u8r,
11808 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11809 }
11810 }
11811 else
11812 {
11813 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
11814 }
11815 }
11816 else
11817 {
11818 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11819 }
11820 }
11821 else
11822 {
11823 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11824 }
11825 }
11826 else
11827 {
11828 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11829 }
11830 }
11831 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11832 {
11833 /* set the operation mode of
11834 * previous operation mode*/
11835 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11836 }
11837
11838 return com_rslt;
11839}
11840
11860BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_mag_operation_mode(u8 *mag_operation_mode_u8)
11861{
11862 /* Variable used to return value of
11863 * communication routine*/
11864 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11865 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11866 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11867
11868 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11869 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11870 {
11871 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11872 }
11873 else
11874 {
11875 /*condition check for page, mag operation mode is
11876 * available in the page one*/
11877 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
11878 {
11879 /* Write page as one */
11880 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11881 }
11882 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
11883 {
11884 /* Read the value of mag operation mode*/
11885 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11886 BNO055_MAG_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
11887 &data_u8r,
11888 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11889 *mag_operation_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OPERATION_MODE);
11890 }
11891 else
11892 {
11893 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11894 }
11895 }
11896
11897 return com_rslt;
11898}
11899
11919BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_mag_operation_mode(u8 mag_operation_mode_u8)
11920{
11921 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11922 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
11923 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11924 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
11925 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
11926
11927 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
11928 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
11929 {
11930 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
11931 }
11932 else
11933 {
11934 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
11935 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
11936 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
11937 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
11938 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11939 {
11940 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11941 {
11942 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
11943 }
11944 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11945 {
11946 /* Write page as one */
11947 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
11948 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11949 {
11950 if (mag_operation_mode_u8 < BNO055_MAG_OPR_MODE_RANGE)
11951 {
11952 /* Write the value
11953 * of mag operation mode*/
11954 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11955 BNO055_MAG_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
11956 &data_u8r,
11957 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11958 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
11959 {
11960 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_OPERATION_MODE, mag_operation_mode_u8);
11961 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
11962 BNO055_MAG_OPERATION_MODE_REG,
11963 &data_u8r,
11964 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
11965 }
11966 }
11967 else
11968 {
11969 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
11970 }
11971 }
11972 else
11973 {
11974 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11975 }
11976 }
11977 else
11978 {
11979 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11980 }
11981 }
11982 else
11983 {
11984 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
11985 }
11986 }
11987 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
11988 {
11989 /* set the operation mode of
11990 * previous operation mode*/
11991 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
11992 }
11993
11994 return com_rslt;
11995}

12032 * available in the page one*/

12043 &data_u8r,

12075BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_mag_power_mode(u8 mag_power_mode_u8)
12076{
12077 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12078 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12079 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12080 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12081 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12082
12083 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12084 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12085 {
12086 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12087 }
12088 else
12089 {
12090 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12091 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12092 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12093 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12094 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12095 {
12096 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12097 {
12098 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12099 }
12100 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12101 {
12102 /* Write page as one */
12103 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12104 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12105 {
12106 if (mag_power_mode_u8 < BNO055_MAG_POWER_MODE_RANGE)
12107 {
12108 /* Write the value of mag power mode*/
12109 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12110 BNO055_MAG_POWER_MODE_REG,
12111 &data_u8r,
12112 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12113 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12114 {
12115 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_POWER_MODE, mag_power_mode_u8);
12116 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12117 BNO055_MAG_POWER_MODE_REG,
12118 &data_u8r,
12119 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12120 }
12121 }
12122 else
12123 {
12124 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12125 }
12126 }
12127 else
12128 {
12129 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12130 }
12131 }
12132 else
12133 {
12134 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12135 }
12136 }
12137 else
12138 {
12139 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12140 }
12141 }
12142 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12143 {
12144 /* set the operation mode of
12145 * previous operation mode*/
12146 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
12147 }
12148
12149 return com_rslt;
12150}
