12172BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_range(u8 *gyro_range_u8)
12173{
12174 /* Variable used to return value of
12175 * communication routine*/
12176 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12177 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12178 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12179
12180 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12181 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12182 {
12183 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12184 }
12185 else
12186 {
12187 /*condition check for page, gyro range is
12188 * available in the page one*/
12189 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
12190 {
12191 /* Write page as one */
12192 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12193 }
12194 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
12195 {
12196 /* Read the value of gyro range */
12197 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12198 BNO055_GYRO_RANGE_REG,
12199 &data_u8r,
12200 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12201 *gyro_range_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_RANGE);
12202 }
12203 else
12204 {
12205 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12206 }
12207 }
12208
12209 return com_rslt;
12210}
12211
12232BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_range(u8 gyro_range_u8)
12233{
12234 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12235 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12236 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12237 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12238 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12239
12240 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12241 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12242 {
12243 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12244 }
12245 else
12246 {
12247 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12248 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12249 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12250 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12251 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12252 {
12253 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12254 {
12255 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12256 }
12257 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12258 {
12259 /* Write page as one */
12260 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12261 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12262 {
12263 if (gyro_range_u8 < BNO055_GYRO_RANGE)
12264 {
12265 /* Write the value of gyro range*/
12266 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12267 BNO055_GYRO_RANGE_REG,
12268 &data_u8r,
12269 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12270 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12271 {
12272 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_RANGE, gyro_range_u8);
12273 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12274 BNO055_GYRO_RANGE_REG,
12275 &data_u8r,
12276 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12277 }
12278 }
12279 else
12280 {
12281 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12282 }
12283 }
12284 else
12285 {
12286 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12287 }
12288 }
12289 else
12290 {
12291 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12292 }
12293 }
12294 else
12295 {
12296 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12297 }
12298 }
12299 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12300 {
12301 /* set the operation mode of
12302 * previous operation mode*/
12303 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
12304 }
12305
12306 return com_rslt;
12307}
12308
12332BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_bw(u8 *gyro_bw_u8)
12333{
12334 /* Variable used to return value of
12335 * communication routine*/
12336 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12337 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12338 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12339
12340 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12341 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12342 {
12343 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12344 }
12345 else
12346 {
12347 /*condition check for page, gyro bandwidth is
12348 * available in the page one*/
12349 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
12350 {
12351 /* Write page as one */
12352 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12353 }
12354 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
12355 {
12356 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12357 BNO055_GYRO_BW_REG,
12358 &data_u8r,
12359 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12360 *gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_BW);
12361 }
12362 else
12363 {
12364 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12365 }
12366 }
12367
12368 return com_rslt;
12369}
12370
12394BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_bw(u8 gyro_bw_u8)
12395{
12396 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12397 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12398 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12399 u8 gyro_opmode = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12400 u8 gyro_auto_sleep_durn = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12401 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12402 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12403
12404 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12405 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12406 {
12407 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12408 }
12409 else
12410 {
12411 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12412 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12413 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12414 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12415 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12416 {
12417 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12418 {
12419 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12420 }
12421 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12422 {
12423 /* Write page as one */
12424 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12425 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12426 {
12427 /* Write the value of gyro bandwidth */
12428 if ((gyro_bw_u8 == BNO055_INIT_VALUE || gyro_bw_u8 > BNO055_INIT_VALUE) &&
12429 gyro_bw_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_GYRO_BW_RANGE)
12430 {
12431 switch (gyro_bw_u8)
12432 {
12433 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_523HZ:
12434 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_523HZ;
12435 break;
12436 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_230HZ:
12437 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_230HZ;
12438 break;
12439 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_116HZ:
12440 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_116HZ;
12441 break;
12442 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_47HZ:
12443 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_47HZ;
12444 break;
12445 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_23HZ:
12446 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_23HZ;
12447 break;
12448 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_12HZ:
12449 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_12HZ;
12450 break;
12451 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_64HZ:
12452 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_64HZ;
12453 break;
12454 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_32HZ:
12455 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_BW_32HZ;
12456 break;
12457 default:
12458 break;
12459 }
12460 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12461 BNO055_GYRO_BW_REG,
12462 &data_u8r,
12463 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12464 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12465 {
12466 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_BW, gyro_bw_u8);
12467 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12468 BNO055_GYRO_BW_REG,
12469 &data_u8r,
12470 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12471 }
12472 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_power_mode(&gyro_opmode);
12473 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12474 {
12475 if (gyro_opmode == BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_ADVANCE_POWERSAVE)
12476 {
12477 com_rslt += bno055_get_gyro_auto_sleep_durn(&gyro_auto_sleep_durn);
12478 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12479 {
12480 com_rslt += bno055_gyro_set_auto_sleep_durn(gyro_auto_sleep_durn, gyro_bw_u8);
12481 }
12482 }
12483 }
12484 }
12485 else
12486 {
12487 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12488 }
12489 }
12490 else
12491 {
12492 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12493 }
12494 }
12495 else
12496 {
12497 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12498 }
12499 }
12500 else
12501 {
12502 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12503 }
12504 }
12505 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12506 {
12507 /* set the operation mode of
12508 * previous operation mode*/
12509 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
12510 }
12511
12512 return com_rslt;
12513}
12514
12535BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_power_mode(u8 *gyro_power_mode_u8)
12536{
12537 /* Variable used to return value of
12538 * communication routine*/
12539 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12540 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12541 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12542
12543 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12544 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12545 {
12546 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12547 }
12548 else
12549 {
12550 /*condition check for page, gyro power mode is
12551 * available in the page one*/
12552 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
12553 {
12554 /* Write page as one */
12555 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12556 }
12557 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
12558 {
12559 /* Write the value of gyro power mode*/
12560 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12561 BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_REG,
12562 &data_u8r,
12563 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12564 *gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE);
12565 }
12566 else
12567 {
12568 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12569 }
12570 }
12571
12572 return com_rslt;
12573}
12574
12595BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_power_mode(u8 gyro_power_mode_u8)
12596{
12597 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12598 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12599 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12600 u8 gyro_auto_sleep_durn = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12601 u8 gyro_bw_u8 = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12602 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12603 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12604
12605 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12606 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12607 {
12608 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12609 }
12610 else
12611 {
12612 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12613 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12614 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12615 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12616 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12617 {
12618 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12619 {
12620 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12621 }
12622 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12623 {
12624 /* Write page as one */
12625 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12626 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12627 {
12628 /* Write the value of power mode*/
12629 if ((gyro_power_mode_u8 == BNO055_INIT_VALUE || gyro_power_mode_u8 > BNO055_INIT_VALUE) &&
12630 gyro_power_mode_u8 < BNO055_GYRO_RANGE)
12631 {
12632 switch (gyro_power_mode_u8)
12633 {
12634 case BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_NORMAL:
12635 gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_NORMAL;
12636 break;
12637 case BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_FASTPOWERUP:
12638 gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_FASTPOWERUP;
12639 break;
12640 case BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_DEEPSUSPEND:
12641 gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_DEEPSUSPEND;
12642 break;
12643 case BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_SUSPEND:
12644 gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_SUSPEND;
12645 break;
12646 case BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_ADVANCE_POWERSAVE:
12647 com_rslt = bno055_get_gyro_bw(&gyro_bw_u8);
12648 com_rslt += bno055_get_gyro_auto_sleep_durn(&gyro_auto_sleep_durn);
12649 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12650 {
12651 com_rslt += bno055_gyro_set_auto_sleep_durn(gyro_auto_sleep_durn, gyro_bw_u8);
12652 }
12653 com_rslt += bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12654 gyro_power_mode_u8 = BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_ADVANCE_POWERSAVE;
12655 break;
12656 default:
12657 break;
12658 }
12659 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12660 BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_REG,
12661 &data_u8r,
12662 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12663 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12664 {
12665 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE, gyro_power_mode_u8);
12666 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12667 BNO055_GYRO_POWER_MODE_REG,
12668 &data_u8r,
12669 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12670 }
12671 }
12672 else
12673 {
12674 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12675 }
12676 }
12677 else
12678 {
12679 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12680 }
12681 }
12682 else
12683 {
12684 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12685 }
12686 }
12687 else
12688 {
12689 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12690 }
12691 }
12692 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12693 {
12694 /* set the operation mode of
12695 * previous operation mode*/
12696 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
12697 }
12698
12699 return com_rslt;
12700}
12701
12719BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_sleep_tmr_mode(u8 *sleep_tmr_u8)
12720{
12721 /* Variable used to return value of
12722 * communication routine*/
12723 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12724 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12725 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12726
12727 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12728 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12729 {
12730 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12731 }
12732 else
12733 {
12734 /*condition check for page, accel sleep mode is
12735 * available in the page one*/
12736 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
12737 {
12738 /* Write page as one */
12739 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12740 }
12741 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
12742 {
12743 /* read the value of accel sleep mode */
12744 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12745 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
12746 &data_u8r,
12747 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12748 *sleep_tmr_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE);
12749 }
12750 else
12751 {
12752 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12753 }
12754 }
12755
12756 return com_rslt;
12757}
12758
12776BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_sleep_tmr_mode(u8 sleep_tmr_u8)
12777{
12778 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12779 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12780 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12781 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12782 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12783
12784 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12785 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12786 {
12787 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12788 }
12789 else
12790 {
12791 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12792 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12793 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12794 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12795 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12796 {
12797 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12798 {
12799 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12800 }
12801 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12802 {
12803 /* Write page as one */
12804 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12805 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12806 {
12807 if (sleep_tmr_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE_RANGE)
12808 {
12809 /*Write the value
12810 * of accel sleep mode*/
12811 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12812 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
12813 &data_u8r,
12814 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12815 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12816 {
12817 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE, sleep_tmr_u8);
12818 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12819 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
12820 &data_u8r,
12821 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12822 }
12823 }
12824 else
12825 {
12826 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12827 }
12828 }
12829 else
12830 {
12831 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12832 }
12833 }
12834 else
12835 {
12836 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12837 }
12838 }
12839 else
12840 {
12841 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12842 }
12843 }
12844 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12845 {
12846 /* set the operation mode of
12847 * previous operation mode*/
12848 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
12849 }
12850
12851 return com_rslt;
12852}
12853
12880BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_sleep_durn(u8 *sleep_durn_u8)
12881{
12882 /* Variable used to return value of
12883 * communication routine*/
12884 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12885 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12886 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12887
12888 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12889 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12890 {
12891 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12892 }
12893 else
12894 {
12895 /*condition check for page, accel sleep duration
12896 * available in the page one*/
12897 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
12898 {
12899 /* Write page as one */
12900 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12901 }
12902 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
12903 {
12904 /* Read the value of accel sleep duration */
12905 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12906 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
12907 &data_u8r,
12908 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12909 *sleep_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURN);
12910 }
12911 else
12912 {
12913 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12914 }
12915 }
12916
12917 return com_rslt;
12918}
12919
12946BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_sleep_durn(u8 sleep_durn_u8)
12947{
12948 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
12949 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
12950 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12951 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
12952 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
12953
12954 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
12955 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
12956 {
12957 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
12958 }
12959 else
12960 {
12961 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
12962 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
12963 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
12964 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
12965 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12966 {
12967 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
12968 {
12969 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
12970 }
12971 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12972 {
12973 /* Write page as one */
12974 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
12975 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12976 {
12977 if (sleep_durn_u8 < BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURATION_RANGE)
12978 {
12979 /* Write the accel
12980 * sleep duration*/
12981 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12982 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
12983 &data_u8r,
12984 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12985 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
12986 {
12987 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURN, sleep_durn_u8);
12988 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
12989 BNO055_ACCEL_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
12990 &data_u8r,
12991 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
12992 }
12993 }
12994 else
12995 {
12996 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
12997 }
12998 }
12999 else
13000 {
13001 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13002 }
13003 }
13004 else
13005 {
13006 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13007 }
13008 }
13009 else
13010 {
13011 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13012 }
13013 }
13014 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13015 {
13016 /* set the operation mode of
13017 * previous operation mode*/
13018 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
13019 }
13020
13021 return com_rslt;
13022}
13023
13036BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_sleep_durn(u8 *sleep_durn_u8)
13037{
13038 /* Variable used to return value of
13039 * communication routine*/
13040 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13041 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13042 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13043
13044 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13045 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13046 {
13047 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13048 }
13049 else
13050 {
13051 /*condition check for page, accel range is
13052 * available in the page one*/
13053 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
13054 {
13055 /* Write page as one */
13056 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13057 }
13058 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
13059 {
13060 /* Read the gyro sleep duration */
13061 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13062 BNO055_GYRO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13063 &data_u8r,
13064 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13065 *sleep_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_SLEEP_DURN);
13066 }
13067 else
13068 {
13069 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13070 }
13071 }
13072
13073 return com_rslt;
13074}
13075
13088BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_sleep_durn(u8 sleep_durn_u8)
13089{
13090 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13091 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13092 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13093 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13094 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
13095
13096 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13097 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13098 {
13099 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13100 }
13101 else
13102 {
13103 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
13104 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
13105 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
13106 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
13107 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13108 {
13109 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13110 {
13111 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
13112 }
13113 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13114 {
13115 /* Write page as one */
13116 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13117 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13118 {
13119 if (sleep_durn_u8 < BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURATION_RANGE)
13120 {
13121 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13122 BNO055_GYRO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13123 &data_u8r,
13124 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13125 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13126 {
13127 /* Write the gyro
13128 * sleep duration */
13129 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_SLEEP_DURN, sleep_durn_u8);
13130 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13131 BNO055_GYRO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13132 &data_u8r,
13133 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13134 }
13135 }
13136 else
13137 {
13138 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
13139 }
13140 }
13141 else
13142 {
13143 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13144 }
13145 }
13146 else
13147 {
13148 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13149 }
13150 }
13151 else
13152 {
13153 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13154 }
13155 }
13156 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13157 {
13158 /* set the operation mode of
13159 * previous operation mode*/
13160 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
13161 }
13162
13163 return com_rslt;
13164}
13165
13178BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_auto_sleep_durn(u8 *auto_sleep_durn_u8)
13179{
13180 /* Variable used to return value of
13181 * communication routine*/
13182 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13183 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13184 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13185
13186 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13187 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13188 {
13189 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13190 }
13191 else
13192 {
13193 /*condition check for page, accel range is
13194 * available in the page one*/
13195 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
13196 {
13197 /* Write page as one */
13198 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13199 }
13200 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
13201 {
13202 /* Read the value of gyro auto sleep duration */
13203 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13204 BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13205 &data_u8r,
13206 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13207 *auto_sleep_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURN);
13208 }
13209 else
13210 {
13211 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13212 }
13213 }
13214
13215 return com_rslt;
13216}
13217
13231BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_gyro_set_auto_sleep_durn(u8 auto_sleep_durn_u8, u8 bw)
13232{
13233 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13234 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13235 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13236 u8 auto_sleep_durn_u8r;
13237 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
13238 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13239
13240 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13241 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13242 {
13243 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13244 }
13245 else
13246 {
13247 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
13248 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
13249 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
13250 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
13251 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13252 {
13253 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13254 {
13255 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
13256 }
13257 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13258 {
13259 /* Write page as one */
13260 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13261 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13262 {
13263 /* Write the value of gyro sleep duration */
13264 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13265 BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13266 &data_u8r,
13267 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13268 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 < BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURATION_RANGE)
13269 {
13270 switch (bw)
13271 {
13272 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_523HZ:
13273 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13274 {
13275 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13276 }
13277 else
13278 {
13279 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13280 }
13281 break;
13282 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_230HZ:
13283 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13284 {
13285 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13286 }
13287 else
13288 {
13289 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13290 }
13291 break;
13292 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_116HZ:
13293 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13294 {
13295 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13296 }
13297 else
13298 {
13299 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13300 }
13301 break;
13302 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_47HZ:
13303 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_5MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13304 {
13305 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13306 }
13307 else
13308 {
13309 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_5MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13310 }
13311 break;
13312 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_23HZ:
13313 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_10MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13314 {
13315 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13316 }
13317 else
13318 {
13319 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_10MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13320 }
13321 break;
13322 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_12HZ:
13323 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_20MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13324 {
13325 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13326 }
13327 else
13328 {
13329 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_20MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13330 }
13331 break;
13332 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_64HZ:
13333 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_10MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13334 {
13335 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13336 }
13337 else
13338 {
13339 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_10MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13340 }
13341 break;
13342 case BNO055_GYRO_BW_32HZ:
13343 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_20MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13344 {
13345 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13346 }
13347 else
13348 {
13349 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_20MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13350 }
13351 break;
13352 default:
13353 if (auto_sleep_durn_u8 > BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR)
13354 {
13355 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = auto_sleep_durn_u8;
13356 }
13357 else
13358 {
13359 auto_sleep_durn_u8r = BNO055_GYRO_4MS_AUTOSLPDUR;
13360 }
13361 break;
13362 }
13363 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13364 {
13365 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURN, auto_sleep_durn_u8r);
13366 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13367 BNO055_GYRO_AUTO_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13368 &data_u8r,
13369 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13370 }
13371 }
13372 else
13373 {
13374 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
13375 }
13376 }
13377 else
13378 {
13379 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13380 }
13381 }
13382 else
13383 {
13384 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13385 }
13386 }
13387 else
13388 {
13389 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13390 }
13391 }
13392 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13393 {
13394 /* set the operation mode of
13395 * previous operation mode*/
13396 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
13397 }
13398
13399 return com_rslt;
13400}
13401
13414BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_mag_sleep_mode(u8 *sleep_mode_u8)
13415{
13416 /* Variable used to return value of
13417 * communication routine*/
13418 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13419 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13420 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13421
13422 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13423 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13424 {
13425 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13426 }
13427 else
13428 {
13429 /*condition check for page,mag sleep mode is
13430 * available in the page one*/
13431 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
13432 {
13433 /* Write page as one */
13434 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13435 }
13436 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
13437 {
13438 /* Read the value of mag sleep mode*/
13439 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13440 BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
13441 &data_u8r,
13442 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13443 *sleep_mode_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_MODE);
13444 }
13445 else
13446 {
13447 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13448 }
13449 }
13450
13451 return com_rslt;
13452}
13453
13466BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_mag_sleep_mode(u8 sleep_mode_u8)
13467{
13468 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13469 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
13470 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13471 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
13472 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
13473
13474 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
13475 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
13476 {
13477 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13478 }
13479 else
13480 {
13481 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
13482 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
13483 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
13484 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
13485 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13486 {
13487 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13488 {
13489 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
13490 }
13491 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13492 {
13493 /* Write page as one */
13494 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13495 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13496 {
13497 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13498 BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
13499 &data_u8r,
13500 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13501 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13502 {
13503 /* Write the value
13504 * of mag sleep mode*/
13505 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_MODE, sleep_mode_u8);
13506 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13507 BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_MODE_REG,
13508 &data_u8r,
13509 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13510 }
13511 }
13512 else
13513 {
13514 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13515 }
13516 }
13517 else
13518 {
13519 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13520 }
13521 }
13522 else
13523 {
13524 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13525 }
13526 }
13527 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13528 {
13529 /* set the operation mode of
13530 * previous operation mode*/
13531 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
13532 }
13533
13534 return com_rslt;
13535}
13536

13602{
13603 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13604 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;

13613 }

13615 {

13617 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
13618 * current operation mode and set the config mode */

13634 &data_u8r,

13636 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13637 {
13638 /* Write the value of
13639 * mag sleep duration */
13640 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_DURN, sleep_durn_u8);
13641 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13642 BNO055_MAG_SLEEP_DURN_REG,
13643 &data_u8r,
13644 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13645 }
13646 }
13647 else
13648 {

13650 }
13651 }
13652 else
13653 {

13655 }
13656 }
13657 else
13658 {
13659 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
13660 }
13661 }
13662 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
13663 {

13665 * previous operation mode*/
13666 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
13667 }

13669 return com_rslt;

13709{

13711 * communication routine*/

13718 {
13719 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
13720 }
13721 else
13722 {

13724 * available in the page one*/

13726 {
13727 /* Write page as one */
13728 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13729 }
13730 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
13731 {
13732 /* Read the value of gyro anymotion interrupt mask*/
13733 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13734 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_INTR_MASK_REG,
13735 &data_u8r,

13792 {

13794 }

13798 * available in the page one*/

13800 {

13802 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
13803 }

13805 {

13807 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13808 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_INTR_MASK_REG,
13809 &data_u8r,
13810 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13811 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
13812 {

13814 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
13815 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_INTR_MASK_REG,
13816 &data_u8r,
13817 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
13818 }
13819 }
13820 else
13821 {

13823 }
13824 }

13880BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_mask_gyro_highrate(u8 *gyro_highrate_u8)
13881{

13883 * communication routine*/

14048BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_mask_accel_high_g(u8 *accel_high_g_u8)
14049{
14050 /* Variable used to return value of
14051 * communication routine*/
14052 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
14053 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;

14087
14119BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_intr_mask_accel_high_g(u8 accel_high_g_u8)
14120{
14121 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
14122 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
14123 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
14124
14125 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
14126 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
14127 {
14128 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
14129 }
14130 else
14131 {
14132 /*condition check for page, accel highg interrupt mask is
14133 * available in the page one*/
14134 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
14135 {
14136 /* Write page as one */
14137 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
14138 }
14139 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
14140 {
14141 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
14142 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_INTR_MASK_REG,
14143 &data_u8r,
14144 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
14145 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
14146 {
14147 /* Write the value of accel
14148 * highg interrupt mask*/
14149 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_INTR_MASK, accel_high_g_u8);
14150 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
14151 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_INTR_MASK_REG,
14152 &data_u8r,
14153 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
14154 }
14155 }
14156 else
14157 {
14158 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
14159 }
14160 }
14161
14162 return com_rslt;
14163}
14164
14196BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_intr_mask_accel_any_motion(u8 *accel_any_motion_u8)
14197{
14198 /* Variable used to return value of
14199 * communication routine*/
14200 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
14201 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
14202 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
14203
14204 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
14205 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
14206 {
14207 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
14208 }
14209 else
14210 {
14211 /*condition check for page, accel anymotion interrupt mask is
14212 * available in the page one*/
14213 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
14214 {
14215 /* Write page as one */
14216 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
14217 }
14218 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
14219 {
14220 /* The value of accel anymotion interrupt mask*/
14221 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
14222 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_INTR_MASK_REG,
14223 &data_u8r,
14224 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
14225 *accel_any_motion_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_INTR_MASK);
14226 }
14227 else
14228 {
14229 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
14230 }
14231 }
14232
14233 return com_rslt;
14234}

15168
15203BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_intr_accel_no_motion(u8 accel_nomotion_u8)
15204{
15205 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15206 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15207 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15208
15209 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15210 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15211 {
15212 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15213 }
15214 else
15215 {
15216 /*condition check for page,
15217 * accel nomotion interrupt is
15218 * available in the page one*/
15219 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
15220 {
15221 /* Write page as one */
15222 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15223 }
15224 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
15225 {
15226 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15227 BNO055_ACCEL_NO_MOTION_INTR_REG,
15228 &data_u8r,
15229 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15230 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15231 {
15232 /* Write the value of
15233 * accel nomotion interrupt */
15234 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_NO_MOTION_INTR, accel_nomotion_u8);
15235 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15236 BNO055_ACCEL_NO_MOTION_INTR_REG,
15237 &data_u8r,
15238 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15239 }
15240 }
15241 else
15242 {
15243 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15244 }
15245 }
15246
15247 return com_rslt;
15248}
15249
15275BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_any_motion_thres(u8 *accel_any_motion_thres_u8)
15276{
15277 /* Variable used to return value of
15278 * communication routine*/
15279 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15280 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15281 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15282
15283 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15284 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15285 {
15286 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15287 }
15288 else
15289 {
15290 /*condition check for page, accel any motion threshold is
15291 * available in the page one*/
15292 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
15293 {
15294 /* Write page as one */
15295 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15296 }
15297 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
15298 {
15299 /* Read the value of accel any motion threshold */
15300 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15301 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_THRES_REG,
15302 &data_u8r,
15303 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15304 *accel_any_motion_thres_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_THRES);
15305 }
15306 else
15307 {
15308 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15309 }
15310 }
15311
15312 return com_rslt;
15313}
15314
15340BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_any_motion_thres(u8 accel_any_motion_thres_u8)
15341{
15342 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15343 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15344 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15345 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15346 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
15347
15348 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15349 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15350 {
15351 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15352 }
15353 else
15354 {
15355 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
15356 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
15357 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
15358 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
15359 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15360 {
15361 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15362 {
15363 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
15364 }
15365 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15366 {
15367 /* Write page as one */
15368 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15369 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15370 {
15371 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15372 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_THRES_REG,
15373 &data_u8r,
15374 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15375 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15376 {
15377 /* Write the value of
15378 * accel any motion threshold*/
15379 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
15380 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_THRES,
15381 accel_any_motion_thres_u8);
15382 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15383 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_THRES_REG,
15384 &data_u8r,
15385 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15386 }
15387 }
15388 else
15389 {
15390 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15391 }
15392 }
15393 else
15394 {
15395 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15396 }
15397 }
15398 else
15399 {
15400 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15401 }
15402 }
15403 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15404 {
15405 /* set the operation mode of
15406 * previous operation mode*/
15407 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
15408 }
15409
15410 return com_rslt;
15411}
15412
15429BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_any_motion_durn(u8 *accel_any_motion_durn_u8)
15430{
15431 /* Variable used to return value of
15432 * communication routine*/
15433 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15434 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15435 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15436
15437 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15438 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15439 {
15440 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15441 }
15442 else
15443 {
15444 /*condition check for page, accel anymotion duration is
15445 * available in the page one*/
15446 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
15447 {
15448 /* Write page as one */
15449 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15450 }
15451 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
15452 {
15453 /* Read the value of accel anymotion duration */
15454 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15455 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_DURN_SET_REG,
15456 &data_u8r,
15457 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15458 *accel_any_motion_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_DURN_SET);
15459 }
15460 else
15461 {
15462 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15463 }
15464 }
15465
15466 return com_rslt;
15467}
15468
15486BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_any_motion_durn(u8 accel_any_motion_durn_u8)
15487{
15488 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15489 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15490 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15491 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15492 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
15493
15494 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15495 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15496 {
15497 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15498 }
15499 else
15500 {
15501 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
15502 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
15503 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
15504 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
15505 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15506 {
15507 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15508 {
15509 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
15510 }
15511 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15512 {
15513 /* Write page as one */
15514 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15515 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15516 {
15517 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15518 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_DURN_SET_REG,
15519 &data_u8r,
15520 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15521 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15522 {
15523 /* Write the value of
15524 * accel anymotion duration*/
15525 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
15526 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_DURN_SET,
15527 accel_any_motion_durn_u8);
15528 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15529 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_DURN_SET_REG,
15530 &data_u8r,
15531 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15532 }
15533 }
15534 else
15535 {
15536 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15537 }
15538 }
15539 else
15540 {
15541 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15542 }
15543 }
15544 else
15545 {
15546 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15547 }
15548 }
15549 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15550 {
15551 /* set the operation mode of
15552 * previous operation mode*/
15553 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
15554 }
15555
15556 return com_rslt;
15557}
15558
15581BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_any_motion_no_motion_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 *data_u8)
15582{
15583 /* Variable used to return value of
15584 * communication routine*/
15585 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15586 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15587 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15588
15589 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15590 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15591 {
15592 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15593 }
15594 else
15595 {
15596 /*condition check for page, accel anymotion enable is
15597 * available in the page one*/
15598 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
15599 {
15600 /* Write page as one */
15601 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15602 }
15603 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
15604 {
15605 switch (channel_u8)
15606 {
15607 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_X_AXIS:
15608
15609 /* Read the value of accel anymotion x enable*/
15610 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15611 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
15612 &data_u8r,
15613 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15614 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS);
15615 break;
15616 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_Y_AXIS:
15617
15618 /* Read the value of accel anymotion y enable*/
15619 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15620 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
15621 &data_u8r,
15622 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15623 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS);
15624 break;
15625 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_Z_AXIS:
15626
15627 /* Read the value of accel anymotion z enable*/
15628 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15629 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
15630 &data_u8r,
15631 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15632 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS);
15633 break;
15634 default:
15635 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
15636 break;
15637 }
15638 }
15639 else
15640 {
15641 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15642 }
15643 }
15644
15645 return com_rslt;
15646}
15647
15670BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_any_motion_no_motion_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 data_u8)
15671{
15672 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15673 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15674 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15675 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15676 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
15677
15678 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15679 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15680 {
15681 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15682 }
15683 else
15684 {
15685 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
15686 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
15687 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
15688 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
15689 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15690 {
15691 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15692 {
15693 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
15694 }
15695 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15696 {
15697 /* Write page as one */
15698 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15699 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15700 {
15701 switch (channel_u8)
15702 {
15703 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_X_AXIS:
15704
15705 /* Write the value of
15706 * accel anymotion x enable*/
15707 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15708 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
15709 &data_u8r,
15710 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15711 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15712 {
15713 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS, data_u8);
15714 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15715 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
15716 &data_u8r,
15717 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15718 }
15719 break;
15720 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_Y_AXIS:
15721
15722 /* Write the value of
15723 * accel anymotion y enable*/
15724 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15725 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
15726 &data_u8r,
15727 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15728 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15729 {
15730 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS, data_u8);
15731 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15732 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
15733 &data_u8r,
15734 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15735 }
15736 break;
15737 case BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_NO_MOTION_Z_AXIS:
15738
15739 /* Write the value of
15740 * accel anymotion z enable*/
15741 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15742 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
15743 &data_u8r,
15744 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15745 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15746 {
15747 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS, data_u8);
15748 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15749 BNO055_ACCEL_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
15750 &data_u8r,
15751 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15752 }
15753 break;
15754 default:
15755 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
15756 break;
15757 }
15758 }
15759 else
15760 {
15761 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15762 }
15763 }
15764 else
15765 {
15766 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15767 }
15768 }
15769 else
15770 {
15771 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15772 }
15773 }
15774 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15775 {
15776 /* set the operation mode of
15777 * previous operation mode*/
15778 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
15779 }
15780
15781 return com_rslt;
15782}
15783
15806BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_high_g_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 *data_u8)
15807{
15808 /* Variable used to return value of
15809 * communication routine*/
15810 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15811 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15812 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15813
15814 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15815 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15816 {
15817 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15818 }
15819 else
15820 {
15821 /*condition check for page, accel highg enable is
15822 * available in the page one*/
15823 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
15824 {
15825 /* Write page as one */
15826 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15827 }
15828 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
15829 {
15830 switch (channel_u8)
15831 {
15832 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS:
15833
15834 /* Read the value of accel x highg enable*/
15835 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15836 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS_REG,
15837 &data_u8r,
15838 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15839 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS);
15840 break;
15841 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS:
15842
15843 /* Read the value of accel y highg enable*/
15844 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15845 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS_REG,
15846 &data_u8r,
15847 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15848 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS);
15849 break;
15850 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS:
15851
15852 /* Read the value of accel z highg enable*/
15853 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15854 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS_REG,
15855 &data_u8r,
15856 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15857 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS);
15858 break;
15859 default:
15860 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
15861 break;
15862 }
15863 }
15864 else
15865 {
15866 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15867 }
15868 }
15869
15870 return com_rslt;
15871}
15872
15895BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_high_g_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 data_u8)
15896{
15897 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15898 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
15899 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15900 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
15901 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
15902
15903 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
15904 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
15905 {
15906 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
15907 }
15908 else
15909 {
15910 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
15911 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
15912 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
15913 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
15914 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15915 {
15916 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
15917 {
15918 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
15919 }
15920 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15921 {
15922 /* Write page as one */
15923 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
15924 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15925 {
15926 switch (channel_u8)
15927 {
15928 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS:
15929
15930 /* Write the value of
15931 * accel x highg enable*/
15932 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15933 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS_REG,
15934 &data_u8r,
15935 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15936 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15937 {
15938 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS, data_u8);
15939 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15940 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_X_AXIS_REG,
15941 &data_u8r,
15942 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15943 }
15944 break;
15945 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS:
15946
15947 /* Write the value of
15948 * accel y highg enable*/
15949 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15950 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS_REG,
15951 &data_u8r,
15952 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15953 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15954 {
15955 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS, data_u8);
15956 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15957 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Y_AXIS_REG,
15958 &data_u8r,
15959 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15960 }
15961 break;
15962 case BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS:
15963
15964 /* Write the value of
15965 * accel z highg enable*/
15966 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15967 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS_REG,
15968 &data_u8r,
15969 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15970 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
15971 {
15972 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS, data_u8);
15973 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
15974 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_Z_AXIS_REG,
15975 &data_u8r,
15976 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
15977 }
15978 break;
15979 default:
15980 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
15981 break;
15982 }
15983 }
15984 else
15985 {
15986 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15987 }
15988 }
15989 else
15990 {
15991 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15992 }
15993 }
15994 else
15995 {
15996 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
15997 }
15998 }
15999 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16000 {
16001 /* set the operation mode of
16002 * previous operation mode*/
16003 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16004 }
16005
16006 return com_rslt;
16007}
16008
16025BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_high_g_durn(u8 *accel_high_g_durn_u8)
16026{
16027 /* Variable used to return value of
16028 * communication routine*/
16029 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16030 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16031 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16032
16033 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16034 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16035 {
16036 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16037 }
16038 else
16039 {
16040 /*condition check for page, accel highg duration is
16041 * available in the page one*/
16042 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
16043 {
16044 /* Write page as one */
16045 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16046 }
16047 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
16048 {
16049 /* Read the value of accel highg duration*/
16050 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16051 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_DURN_REG,
16052 &data_u8r,
16053 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16054 *accel_high_g_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_DURN);
16055 }
16056 else
16057 {
16058 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16059 }
16060 }
16061
16062 return com_rslt;
16063}
16064
16081BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_high_g_durn(u8 accel_high_g_durn_u8)
16082{
16083 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16084 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16085 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16086 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
16087 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16088
16089 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16090 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16091 {
16092 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16093 }
16094 else
16095 {
16096 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
16097 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
16098 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
16099 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
16100 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16101 {
16102 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16103 {
16104 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
16105 }
16106 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16107 {
16108 /* Write page as one */
16109 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16110 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16111 {
16112 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16113 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_DURN_REG,
16114 &data_u8r,
16115 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16116 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16117 {
16118 /* Write the value of
16119 * accel highg duration*/
16120 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_DURN, accel_high_g_durn_u8);
16121 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16122 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_DURN_REG,
16123 &data_u8r,
16124 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16125 }
16126 }
16127 else
16128 {
16129 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16130 }
16131 }
16132 else
16133 {
16134 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16135 }
16136 }
16137 else
16138 {
16139 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16140 }
16141 }
16142 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16143 {
16144 /* set the operation mode of
16145 * previous operation mode*/
16146 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16147 }
16148
16149 return com_rslt;
16150}
16151
16173BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_accel_high_g_thres(u8 *accel_high_g_thres_u8)
16174{
16175 /* Variable used to return value of
16176 * communication routine*/
16177 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16178 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16179 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16180
16181 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16182 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16183 {
16184 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16185 }
16186 else
16187 {
16188 /*condition check for page, highg threshold is
16189 * available in the page one*/
16190 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
16191 {
16192 /* Write page as one */
16193 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16194 }
16195 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
16196 {
16197 /* Read the value of highg threshold */
16198 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16199 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_THRES_REG,
16200 &data_u8r,
16201 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16202 *accel_high_g_thres_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_THRES);
16203 }
16204 else
16205 {
16206 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16207 }
16208 }
16209
16210 return com_rslt;
16211}

16234BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_high_g_thres(u8 accel_high_g_thres_u8)
16235{
16236 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16237 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16238 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16239 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
16240 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16241
16242 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16243 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16244 {
16245 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16246 }
16247 else
16248 {
16249 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
16250 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
16251 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
16252 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
16253 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16254 {
16255 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16256 {
16257 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
16258 }
16259 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16260 {
16261 /* Write page as one */
16262 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16263 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16264 {
16265 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16266 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_THRES_REG,
16267 &data_u8r,
16268 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16269 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16270 {
16271 /* Write the value of
16272 * accel highg threshold */
16273 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_THRES, accel_high_g_thres_u8);
16274 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16275 BNO055_ACCEL_HIGH_G_THRES_REG,
16276 &data_u8r,
16277 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16278 }
16279 }
16280 else
16281 {
16282 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16283 }
16284 }
16285 else
16286 {
16287 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16288 }
16289 }
16290 else
16291 {
16292 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16293 }
16294 }
16295 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16296 {
16297 /* set the operation mode of
16298 * previous operation mode*/
16299 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16300 }
16301
16302 return com_rslt;
16303}

16387BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_slow_no_motion_thres(u8 accel_slow_no_motion_thres_u8)
16388{
16389 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16390 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16391 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16392 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
16393 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16394
16395 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16396 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16397 {
16398 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16399 }
16400 else
16401 {
16402 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
16403 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
16404 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
16405 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
16406 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16407 {
16408 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16409 {
16410 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
16411 }
16412 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16413 {
16414 /* Write page as one */
16415 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16416 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16417 {
16418 /* Write the value of
16419 * slownomotion threshold */
16420 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16421 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_THRES_REG,
16422 &data_u8r,
16423 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16424 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16425 {
16426 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
16427 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_THRES,
16428 accel_slow_no_motion_thres_u8);
16429 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16430 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_THRES_REG,
16431 &data_u8r,
16432 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16433 }
16434 }
16435 else
16436 {
16437 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16438 }
16439 }
16440 else
16441 {
16442 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16443 }
16444 }
16445 else
16446 {
16447 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16448 }
16449 }
16450 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16451 {
16452 /* set the operation mode of
16453 * previous operation mode*/
16454 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16455 }
16456
16457 return com_rslt;

16496 }

16530BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_slow_no_motion_enable(u8 accel_slow_no_motion_en_u8)
16531{

16533 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16534 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;

16536 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;

16540 {

16542 }

16550 {

16552 {

16554 }

16556 {

16563 &data_u8r,

16565 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16566 {
16567 /* Read the value of
16568 * accel slownomotion enable */
16569 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
16570 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_ENABLE,
16571 accel_slow_no_motion_en_u8);
16572 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16573 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_ENABLE_REG,
16574 &data_u8r,
16575 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16576 }
16577 }
16578 else
16579 {
16580 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16581 }
16582 }

16586 }
16587 }

16591 }

16594 {

16596 * previous operation mode*/

16598 }

16600 return com_rslt;

16618 * communication routine*/

16631 * available in the page one*/

16633 {

16635 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16636 }
16637 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
16638 {
16639 /*read value of accel slownomotion duration*/
16640 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16641 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN_REG,
16642 &data_u8r,
16643 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16644 *accel_slow_no_motion_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN);
