16667BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_accel_slow_no_motion_durn(u8 accel_slow_no_motion_durn_u8)
16668{
16669 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16670 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16671 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16672 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
16673 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16674
16675 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16676 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16677 {
16678 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16679 }
16680 else
16681 {
16682 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
16683 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
16684 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
16685 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
16686 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16687 {
16688 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16689 {
16690 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
16691 }
16692 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16693 {
16694 /* Write page as one */
16695 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16696 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16697 {
16698 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16699 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN_REG,
16700 &data_u8r,
16701 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16702 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16703 {
16704 /*Write the value of accel
16705 * slownomotion duration*/
16706 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
16707 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN,
16708 accel_slow_no_motion_durn_u8);
16709 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16710 BNO055_ACCEL_SLOW_NO_MOTION_DURN_REG,
16711 &data_u8r,
16712 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16713 }
16714 }
16715 else
16716 {
16717 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16718 }
16719 }
16720 else
16721 {
16722 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16723 }
16724 }
16725 else
16726 {
16727 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16728 }
16729 }
16730 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16731 {
16732 /* set the operation mode of
16733 * previous operation mode*/
16734 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16735 }
16736
16737 return com_rslt;
16738}
16739
16763BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_any_motion_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 *data_u8)
16764{
16765 /* Variable used to return value of
16766 * communication routine*/
16767 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16768 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16769 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16770
16771 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16772 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16773 {
16774 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16775 }
16776 else
16777 {
16778 /*condition check for page, gyro anymotion axis is
16779 * available in the page one*/
16780 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
16781 {
16782 /* Write page as one */
16783 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16784 }
16785 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
16786 {
16787 switch (channel_u8)
16788 {
16789 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS:
16790
16791 /* Read the gyro anymotion x enable*/
16792 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16793 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
16794 &data_u8r,
16795 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16796 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS);
16797 break;
16798 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS:
16799
16800 /* Read the gyro anymotion y enable*/
16801 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16802 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
16803 &data_u8r,
16804 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16805 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS);
16806 break;
16807 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS:
16808
16809 /* Read the gyro anymotion z enable*/
16810 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16811 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
16812 &data_u8r,
16813 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16814 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS);
16815 break;
16816 default:
16817 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
16818 break;
16819 }
16820 }
16821 else
16822 {
16823 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16824 }
16825 }
16826
16827 return com_rslt;
16828}
16829
16852BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_any_motion_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 data_u8)
16853{
16854 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16855 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16856 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16857 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
16858 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16859
16860 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16861 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16862 {
16863 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
16864 }
16865 else
16866 {
16867 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
16868 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
16869 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
16870 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
16871 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16872 {
16873 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16874 {
16875 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
16876 }
16877 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16878 {
16879 /* Write page as one */
16880 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
16881 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16882 {
16883 switch (channel_u8)
16884 {
16885 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS:
16886
16887 /* Write the gyro
16888 * anymotion x enable*/
16889 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16890 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
16891 &data_u8r,
16892 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16893 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16894 {
16895 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS, data_u8);
16896 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16897 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_X_AXIS_REG,
16898 &data_u8r,
16899 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16900 }
16901 break;
16902 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS:
16903
16904 /* Write the gyro
16905 * anymotion y enable*/
16906 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16907 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
16908 &data_u8r,
16909 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16910 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16911 {
16912 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS, data_u8);
16913 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16914 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Y_AXIS_REG,
16915 &data_u8r,
16916 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16917 }
16918 break;
16919 case BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS:
16920
16921 /* Write the gyro
16922 * anymotion z enable*/
16923 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16924 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
16925 &data_u8r,
16926 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16927 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
16928 {
16929 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS, data_u8);
16930 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
16931 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_Z_AXIS_REG,
16932 &data_u8r,
16933 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
16934 }
16935 break;
16936 default:
16937 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
16938 break;
16939 }
16940 }
16941 else
16942 {
16943 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16944 }
16945 }
16946 else
16947 {
16948 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16949 }
16950 }
16951 else
16952 {
16953 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16954 }
16955 }
16956 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
16957 {
16958 /* set the operation mode of
16959 * previous operation mode*/
16960 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
16961 }
16962
16963 return com_rslt;
16964}
16965
16989BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_highrate_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 *data_u8)
16990{
16991 /* Variable used to return value of
16992 * communication routine*/
16993 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
16994 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
16995 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
16996
16997 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
16998 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
16999 {
17000 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17001 }
17002 else
17003 {
17004 /*condition check for page, gyro highrate enable is
17005 * available in the page one*/
17006 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
17007 {
17008 /* Write page as one */
17009 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17010 }
17011 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
17012 {
17013 switch (channel_u8)
17014 {
17015 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS:
17016
17017 /* Read the gyro highrate x enable */
17018 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17019 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS_REG,
17020 &data_u8r,
17021 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17022 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS);
17023 break;
17024 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS:
17025
17026 /* Read the gyro highrate y enable */
17027 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17028 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS_REG,
17029 &data_u8r,
17030 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17031 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS);
17032 break;
17033 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS:
17034
17035 /* Read the gyro highrate z enable */
17036 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17037 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS_REG,
17038 &data_u8r,
17039 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17040 *data_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS);
17041 break;
17042 default:
17043 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
17044 break;
17045 }
17046 }
17047 else
17048 {
17049 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17050 }
17051 }
17052
17053 return com_rslt;
17054}
17055
17078BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_axis_enable(u8 channel_u8, u8 data_u8)
17079{
17080 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17081 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17082 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17083 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
17084 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17085
17086 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17087 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17088 {
17089 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17090 }
17091 else
17092 {
17093 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
17094 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
17095 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
17096 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
17097 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17098 {
17099 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17100 {
17101 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
17102 }
17103 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17104 {
17105 /* Write page as one */
17106 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17107 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17108 {
17109 switch (channel_u8)
17110 {
17111 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS:
17112
17113 /* Write the value of
17114 * gyro highrate x enable*/
17115 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17116 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS_REG,
17117 &data_u8r,
17118 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17119 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17120 {
17121 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS, data_u8);
17122 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17123 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_AXIS_REG,
17124 &data_u8r,
17125 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17126 }
17127 break;
17128 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS:
17129
17130 /* Write the value of
17131 * gyro highrate y enable*/
17132 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17133 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS_REG,
17134 &data_u8r,
17135 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17136 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17137 {
17138 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS, data_u8);
17139 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17140 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_AXIS_REG,
17141 &data_u8r,
17142 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17143 }
17144 break;
17145 case BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS:
17146
17147 /* Write the value of
17148 * gyro highrate z enable*/
17149 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17150 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS_REG,
17151 &data_u8r,
17152 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17153 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17154 {
17155 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS, data_u8);
17156 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17157 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_AXIS_REG,
17158 &data_u8r,
17159 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17160 }
17161 break;
17162 default:
17163 com_rslt = BNO055_OUT_OF_RANGE;
17164 break;
17165 }
17166 }
17167 else
17168 {
17169 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17170 }
17171 }
17172 else
17173 {
17174 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17175 }
17176 }
17177 else
17178 {
17179 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17180 }
17181 }
17182 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17183 {
17184 /* set the operation mode of
17185 * previous operation mode*/
17186 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17187 }
17188
17189 return com_rslt;
17190}
17191
17207BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_any_motion_filter(u8 *gyro_any_motion_filter_u8)
17208{
17209 /* Variable used to return value of
17210 * communication routine*/
17211 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17212 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17213 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17214
17215 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17216 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17217 {
17218 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17219 }
17220 else
17221 {
17222 /*condition check for page, gyro anymotion filter is
17223 * available in the page one*/
17224 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
17225 {
17226 /* Write page as one */
17227 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17228 }
17229 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
17230 {
17231 /* Read the value of gyro anymotion filter*/
17232 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17233 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_FILTER_REG,
17234 &data_u8r,
17235 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17236 *gyro_any_motion_filter_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_FILTER);
17237 }
17238 else
17239 {
17240 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17241 }
17242 }
17243
17244 return com_rslt;
17245}
17246
17262BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_any_motion_filter(u8 gyro_any_motion_filter_u8)
17263{
17264 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17265 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17266 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17267 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
17268 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17269
17270 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17271 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17272 {
17273 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17274 }
17275 else
17276 {
17277 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
17278 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
17279 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
17280 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
17281 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17282 {
17283 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17284 {
17285 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
17286 }
17287 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17288 {
17289 /* Write page as one */
17290 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17291 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17292 {
17293 /* Write the value of
17294 * gyro anymotion filter*/
17295 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17296 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_FILTER_REG,
17297 &data_u8r,
17298 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17299 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17300 {
17301 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
17302 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_FILTER,
17303 gyro_any_motion_filter_u8);
17304 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17305 BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_FILTER_REG,
17306 &data_u8r,
17307 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17308 }
17309 }
17310 else
17311 {
17312 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17313 }
17314 }
17315 else
17316 {
17317 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17318 }
17319 }
17320 else
17321 {
17322 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17323 }
17324 }
17325 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17326 {
17327 /* set the operation mode of
17328 * previous operation mode*/
17329 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17330 }
17331
17332 return com_rslt;
17333}

17350BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_highrate_filter(u8 *gyro_highrate_filter_u8)
17351{
17352 /* Variable used to return value of
17353 * communication routine*/
17354 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17355 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17356 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;

17359 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17360 {
17361 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17362 }
17363 else
17364 {
17365 /*condition check for page, gyro highrate filter is
17366 * available in the page one*/
17367 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
17368 {
17369 /* Write page as one */
17370 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17371 }
17372 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
17373 {
17374 /* Read the value of gyro highrate filter */
17375 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17376 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_FILTER_REG,
17377 &data_u8r,
17378 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17379 *gyro_highrate_filter_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_FILTER);
17380 }
17381 else
17382 {
17383 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17384 }
17385 }
17386
17387 return com_rslt;
17388}
17389
17405BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_filter(u8 gyro_highrate_filter_u8)
17406{
17407 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17408 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17409 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17410 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17411 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
17412
17413 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17414 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17415 {
17416 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17417 }
17418 else
17419 {
17420 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
17421 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
17422 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
17423 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
17424 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17425 {
17426 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17427 {
17428 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
17429 }
17430 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17431 {
17432 /* Write page as one */
17433 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17434 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17435 {
17436 /* Write the value of
17437 * gyro highrate filter*/
17438 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17439 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_FILTER_REG,
17440 &data_u8r,
17441 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17442 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17443 {
17444 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_FILTER, gyro_highrate_filter_u8);
17445 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17446 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_FILTER_REG,
17447 &data_u8r,
17448 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17449 }
17450 }
17451 else
17452 {
17453 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17454 }
17455 }
17456 else
17457 {
17458 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17459 }
17460 }
17461 else
17462 {
17463 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17464 }
17465 }
17466 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17467 {
17468 /* set the operation mode of
17469 * previous operation mode*/
17470 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17471 }
17472
17473 return com_rslt;
17474}
17475
17497BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_highrate_x_thres(u8 *gyro_highrate_x_thres_u8)
17498{
17499 /* Variable used to return value of
17500 * communication routine*/
17501 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17502 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17503 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17504
17505 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17506 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17507 {
17508 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17509 }
17510 else
17511 {
17512 /*condition check for page, gyro highrate x threshold is
17513 * available in the page one*/
17514 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
17515 {
17516 /* Write page as one */
17517 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17518 }
17519 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
17520 {
17521 /* Read the value of gyro highrate threshold*/
17522 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17523 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_THRES_REG,
17524 &data_u8r,
17525 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17526 *gyro_highrate_x_thres_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_THRES);
17527 }
17528 else
17529 {
17530 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17531 }
17532 }
17533
17534 return com_rslt;
17535}
17536
17558BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_x_thres(u8 gyro_highrate_x_thres_u8)
17559{
17560 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17561 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17562 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17563 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
17564 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17565
17566 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17567 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17568 {
17569 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17570 }
17571 else
17572 {
17573 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
17574 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
17575 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
17576 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
17577 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17578 {
17579 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17580 {
17581 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
17582 }
17583 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17584 {
17585 /* Write page as one */
17586 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17587 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17588 {
17589 /* Write the value of
17590 * gyro highrate x threshold*/
17591 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17592 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_THRES_REG,
17593 &data_u8r,
17594 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17595 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17596 {
17597 data_u8r =
17598 BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_THRES, gyro_highrate_x_thres_u8);
17599 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17600 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_THRES_REG,
17601 &data_u8r,
17602 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17603 }
17604 }
17605 else
17606 {
17607 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17608 }
17609 }
17610 else
17611 {
17612 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17613 }
17614 }
17615 else
17616 {
17617 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17618 }
17619 }
17620 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17621 {
17622 /* set the operation mode of
17623 * previous operation mode*/
17624 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17625 }
17626
17627 return com_rslt;
17628}

17716BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_x_hyst(u8 gyro_highrate_x_hyst_u8)
17717{
17718 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17719 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
17720 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17721 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
17722 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
17723
17724 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
17725 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
17726 {
17727 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
17728 }
17729 else
17730 {
17731 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
17732 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
17733 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
17734 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
17735 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17736 {
17737 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17738 {
17739 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
17740 }
17741 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17742 {
17743 /* Write page as one */
17744 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
17745 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17746 {
17747 /*Write the value of
17748 * gyro highrate x hysteresis*/
17749 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17750 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_HYST_REG,
17751 &data_u8r,
17752 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17753 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17754 {
17755 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_HYST, gyro_highrate_x_hyst_u8);
17756 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17757 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_HYST_REG,
17758 &data_u8r,
17759 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17760 }
17761 }
17762 else
17763 {
17764 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17765 }
17766 }
17767 else
17768 {
17769 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17770 }
17771 }
17772 else
17773 {
17774 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17775 }
17776 }
17777 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17778 {
17779 /* set the operation mode of
17780 * previous operation mode*/
17781 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17782 }
17783
17784 return com_rslt;
17785}

17868 }

17880 }

17891 &data_u8r,
17892 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17893 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
17894 {
17895 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_DURN, gyro_highrate_x_durn_u8);
17896 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
17897 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_X_DURN_REG,
17898 &data_u8r,
17899 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
17900 }
17901 }
17902 else
17903 {
17904 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17905 }
17906 }
17907 else
17908 {
17909 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17910 }
17911 }
17912 else
17913 {
17914 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
17915 }
17916 }
17917 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
17918 {

17920 * previous operation mode*/
17921 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
17922 }
17923
17924 return com_rslt;

18010{

18019 {
18020 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
18021 }
18022 else
18023 {

18025 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the

18029 {

18031 {
18032 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
18033 }

18041 * of gyro highrate y threshold*/
18042 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18043 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_THRES_REG,
18044 &data_u8r,
18045 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18046 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18047 {
18048 data_u8r =
18049 BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_THRES, gyro_highrate_y_thres_u8);
18050 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18051 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_THRES_REG,
18052 &data_u8r,
18053 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18054 }
18055 }
18056 else
18057 {
18058 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18059 }
18060 }
18061 else
18062 {

18064 }
18065 }
18066 else
18067 {
18068 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18069 }
18070 }

18072 {
18073 /* set the operation mode of
18074 * previous operation mode*/
18075 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
18076 }

18078 return com_rslt;

18281 else
18282 {
18283 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18284 }
18285 }
18286
18287 return com_rslt;
18288}
18289
18304BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_y_durn(u8 gyro_highrate_y_durn_u8)
18305{
18306 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18307 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
18308 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18309 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
18310 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18311
18312 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
18313 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
18314 {
18315 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
18316 }
18317 else
18318 {
18319 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
18320 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
18321 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
18322 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
18323 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18324 {
18325 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18326 {
18327 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
18328 }
18329 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18330 {
18331 /* Write page as one */
18332 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
18333 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18334 {
18335 /* Write the value
18336 * of gyro highrate y duration*/
18337 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18338 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_DURN_REG,
18339 &data_u8r,
18340 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18341 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18342 {
18343 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_DURN, gyro_highrate_y_durn_u8);
18344 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18345 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Y_DURN_REG,
18346 &data_u8r,
18347 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18348 }
18349 }
18350 else
18351 {
18352 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18353 }
18354 }
18355 else
18356 {
18357 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18358 }
18359 }
18360 else
18361 {
18362 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18363 }
18364 }
18365 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18366 {
18367 /* set the operation mode of
18368 * previous operation mode*/
18369 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
18370 }
18371
18372 return com_rslt;
18373}
18374
18396BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_highrate_z_thres(u8 *gyro_highrate_z_thres_u8)
18397{
18398 /* Variable used to return value of
18399 * communication routine*/
18400 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18401 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
18402 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18403
18404 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
18405 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
18406 {
18407 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
18408 }
18409 else
18410 {
18411 /*condition check for page, gyro highrate z threshold is
18412 * available in the page one*/
18413 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
18414 {
18415 /* Write page as one */
18416 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
18417 }
18418 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
18419 {
18420 /* Read the value of gyro highrate z threshold*/
18421 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18422 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_THRES_REG,
18423 &data_u8r,
18424 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18425 *gyro_highrate_z_thres_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_THRES);
18426 }
18427 else
18428 {
18429 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18430 }
18431 }
18432
18433 return com_rslt;
18434}
18435
18457BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_z_thres(u8 gyro_highrate_z_thres_u8)
18458{
18459 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18460 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
18461 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18462 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
18463 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18464
18465 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
18466 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
18467 {
18468 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
18469 }
18470 else
18471 {
18472 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
18473 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
18474 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
18475 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
18476 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18477 {
18478 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18479 {
18480 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
18481 }
18482 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18483 {
18484 /* Write page as one */
18485 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
18486 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18487 {
18488 /* Write the value
18489 * of gyro highrate z threshold*/
18490 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18491 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_THRES_REG,
18492 &data_u8r,
18493 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18494 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18495 {
18496 data_u8r =
18497 BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_THRES, gyro_highrate_z_thres_u8);
18498 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18499 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_THRES_REG,
18500 &data_u8r,
18501 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18502 }
18503 }
18504 else
18505 {
18506 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18507 }
18508 }
18509 else
18510 {
18511 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18512 }
18513 }
18514 else
18515 {
18516 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18517 }
18518 }
18519 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18520 {
18521 /* set the operation mode of
18522 * previous operation mode*/
18523 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
18524 }
18525
18526 return com_rslt;
18527}

18563 }

18572 }

18613BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_highrate_z_hyst(u8 gyro_highrate_z_hyst_u8)
18614{
18615 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18616 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
18617 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18618 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
18619 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
18620

18622 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
18623 {
18624 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
18625 }
18626 else
18627 {
18628 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
18629 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
18630 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
18631 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
18632 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18633 {
18634 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18635 {
18636 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
18637 }
18638 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18639 {
18640 /* Write page as one */
18641 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
18642 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18643 {
18644 /* Write the value
18645 * of gyro highrate z hysteresis*/
18646 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18647 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_HYST_REG,
18648 &data_u8r,
18649 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18650 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18651 {
18652 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_HYST, gyro_highrate_z_hyst_u8);
18653 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
18654 BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_HYST_REG,
18655 &data_u8r,
18656 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
18657 }
18658 }
18659 else
18660 {
18661 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18662 }
18663 }
18664 else
18665 {
18666 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18667 }
18668 }
18669 else
18670 {
18671 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18672 }
18673 }
18674 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
18675 {
18676 /* set the operation mode of
18677 * previous operation mode*/
18678 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
18679 }
18680
18681 return com_rslt;

18762 {

18772 {

18776 }

18784 * gyro highrate z duration*/

18787 &data_u8r,

18789 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
18790 {
18791 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_HIGHRATE_Z_DURN, gyro_highrate_z_durn_u8);
18792 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,

18794 &data_u8r,

18796 }
18797 }
18798 else

18801 }
18802 }
18803 else

18806 }
18807 }
18808 else
18809 {

18811 }
18812 }

18816 * previous operation mode*/

18818 }

18941 {
18942 data_u8r =
18943 BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_ANY_MOTION_THRES, gyro_any_motion_thres_u8);

18949 }

18953 }

18963 }

18968 * previous operation mode*/

18994{
18995 /* Variable used to return value of
18996 * communication routine*/
18997 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
18998 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
18999 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19000

19002 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
19003 {
19004 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
19005 }
19006 else
19007 {
19008 /*condition check for page, gyro anymotion slope samples is
19009 * available in the page one*/
19010 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
19011 {
19012 /* Write page as one */
19013 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
19014 }
19015 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
19016 {
19017 /*Read the value of gyro anymotion slope samples*/
19018 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19019 BNO055_GYRO_SLOPE_SAMPLES_REG,
19020 &data_u8r,
19021 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19022 *gyro_any_motion_slope_samples_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_SLOPE_SAMPLES);
19023 }
19024 else
19025 {
19026 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19027 }
19028 }
19029
19030 return com_rslt;
19031}
19032
19051BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_any_motion_slope_samples(u8 gyro_any_motion_slope_samples_u8)
19052{
19053 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19054 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
19055 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19056 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19057 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
19058
19059 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
19060 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
19061 {
19062 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
19063 }
19064 else
19065 {
19066 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
19067 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
19068 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
19069 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
19070 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19071 {
19072 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
19073 {
19074 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
19075 }
19076 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19077 {
19078 /* Write page as one */
19079 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
19080 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19081 {
19082 /* Write the value of
19083 * gyro anymotion slope samples*/
19084 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19085 BNO055_GYRO_SLOPE_SAMPLES_REG,
19086 &data_u8r,
19087 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19088 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19089 {
19090 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r,
19091 BNO055_GYRO_SLOPE_SAMPLES,
19092 gyro_any_motion_slope_samples_u8);
19093 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19094 BNO055_GYRO_SLOPE_SAMPLES_REG,
19095 &data_u8r,
19096 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19097 }
19098 }
19099 else
19100 {
19101 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19102 }
19103 }
19104 else
19105 {
19106 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19107 }
19108 }
19109 else
19110 {
19111 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19112 }
19113 }
19114 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
19115 {
19116 /* set the operation mode of
19117 * previous operation mode*/
19118 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
19119 }
19120
19121 return com_rslt;
19122}
19123
19135BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_get_gyro_any_motion_awake_durn(u8 *gyro_awake_durn_u8)
19136{
19137 /* Variable used to return value of
19138 * communication routine*/
19139 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19140 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
19141 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19142
19143 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
19144 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
19145 {
19146 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
19147 }
19148 else
19149 {
19150 /*condition check for page, gyro anymotion awake duration is
19151 * available in the page one*/
19152 if (p_bno055->page_id != BNO055_PAGE_ONE)
19153 {
19154 /* Write page as one */
19155 stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
19156 }
19157 if ((stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS) || (p_bno055->page_id == BNO055_PAGE_ONE))
19158 {
19159 /* Read the value of gyro anymotion awake duration*/
19160 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19161 BNO055_GYRO_AWAKE_DURN_REG,
19162 &data_u8r,
19163 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19164 *gyro_awake_durn_u8 = BNO055_GET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_AWAKE_DURN);
19165 }
19166 else
19167 {
19168 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19169 }
19170 }
19171
19172 return com_rslt;
19173}
19174
19186BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_set_gyro_any_motion_awake_durn(u8 gyro_awake_durn_u8)
19187{
19188 BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19189 u8 data_u8r = BNO055_INIT_VALUE;
19190 s8 stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19191 s8 pg_stat_s8 = BNO055_ERROR;
19192 u8 prev_opmode_u8 = BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG;
19193
19194 /* Check the struct p_bno055 is empty */
19195 if (p_bno055 == NULL)
19196 {
19197 return BNO055_E_NULL_PTR;
19198 }
19199 else
19200 {
19201 /* The write operation effective only if the operation
19202 * mode is in config mode, this part of code is checking the
19203 * current operation mode and set the config mode */
19204 stat_s8 = bno055_get_operation_mode(&prev_opmode_u8);
19205 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19206 {
19207 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
19208 {
19209 stat_s8 += bno055_set_operation_mode(BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG);
19210 }
19211 if (stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19212 {
19213 /* Write page as one */
19214 pg_stat_s8 = bno055_write_page_id(BNO055_PAGE_ONE);
19215 if (pg_stat_s8 == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19216 {
19217 /* Write the value of gyro
19218 * anymotion awake duration*/
19219 com_rslt = p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_READ_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19220 BNO055_GYRO_AWAKE_DURN_REG,
19221 &data_u8r,
19222 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19223 if (com_rslt == BNO055_SUCCESS)
19224 {
19225 data_u8r = BNO055_SET_BITSLICE(data_u8r, BNO055_GYRO_AWAKE_DURN, gyro_awake_durn_u8);
19226 com_rslt += p_bno055->BNO055_BUS_WRITE_FUNC(p_bno055->dev_addr,
19227 BNO055_GYRO_AWAKE_DURN_REG,
19228 &data_u8r,
19229 BNO055_GEN_READ_WRITE_LENGTH);
19230 }
19231 }
19232 else
19233 {
19234 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19235 }
19236 }
19237 else
19238 {
19239 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19240 }
19241 }
19242 else
19243 {
19244 com_rslt = BNO055_ERROR;
19245 }
19246 }
19247 if (prev_opmode_u8 != BNO055_OPERATION_MODE_CONFIG)
19248 {
19249 /* set the operation mode
19250 * of previous operation mode*/
19251 com_rslt += bno055_set_operation_mode(prev_opmode_u8);
19252 }
19253
19254 return com_rslt;
19255}

BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_gyro_y_rps(float *gyro_y_f)
This API is used to convert the gyro y raw data to rps output as float.
bno055_convert_float_euler_p_deg
BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_euler_p_deg(float *euler_p_f)
This API is used to convert the Euler p raw data to degree output as float.
bno055_convert_double_accel_x_msq
BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_accel_x_msq(double *accel_x_d)
This API is used to convert the accel x raw data to meterpersecseq output as double.
bno055_convert_double_euler_r_rad
BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_double_euler_r_rad(double *euler_r_d)
This API is used to convert the Euler r raw data to radians output as double.
bno055_convert_float_linear_accel_xyz_msq
BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_linear_accel_xyz_msq(struct bno055_linear_accel_float_t *linear_accel_xyz)
This API is used to convert the linear accel xyz raw data to meterpersecseq output as float.
bno055_convert_float_temp_fahrenheit
BNO055_RETURN_FUNCTION_TYPE bno055_convert_float_temp_fahrenheit(float *temp_f)
This API is used to convert the temperature data to Fahrenheit output as float.
